BUILDING.BUILDING.STATUSITEMS.COMPLEXFABRICATOR.P: This building is carrying out its current production orders
BUILDING.BUILDING.STATUSITEMS.COMPLEXFABRICATOR.R: This building is currently conducting important research
BUILDING.BUILDING.STATUSITEMS.COMPLEXFABRICATOR.A: This building is currently analyzing a fascinating artifact
BUILDING.BUILDING.STATUSITEMS.COMPLEXFABRICATOR.U: Restoring {Duplicant} to a blissfully ignorant state
BUILDING.BUILDING.STATUSITEMS.COMPLEXFABRICATOR.T: This building is currently investigating the mysteries of space
BUILDING.BUILDING.STATUSITEMS.COMPLEXFABRICATOR.C: This building is currently studying a meteor
BUILDING.BUILDING.STATUSITEMS.REMOTEWORKERDEPOT.M: This building is currently assembling a remote worker drone
This building must be assigned a <style="KKeyword">Remote Worker Dock</style> in order to function
BUILDING.BUILDING.DETAILS.USE_COUNT_TOOLTIP: This building has been used {0} times

BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FOSSILSCULPTURE.NAME: <link="FOSSILSCULPTURE">Fossil Block</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FOSSILSCULPTURE.DESC: Duplicants who have learned art skills can produce more decorative sculptures.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FOSSILSCULPTURE.EFFECT:
Majorly increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be sculpted by a Duplicant.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CEILINGFOSSILSCULPTURE: Duplicants who have learned art skills can produce more decorative ceiling sculptures.

Majorly increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be sculpted by a Duplicant.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HEADQUARTERSCOMPLETE.U:
A clone of the cloning machine? What a novel thought.

Alas, it won't work.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EXOBASEHEADQUARTERS.DE: A quick and easy substitute, though it'll never live up to the original.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EXOBASEHEADQUARTERS.EF:
A portable bioprinter that produces new Duplicants or care packages containing resources.

Only one Printing Pod or Mini-Pod is permitted per Planetoid.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.AIRCONDITIONER.NAME: <link="AIRCONDITIONER">Thermo Regulator</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.AIRCONDITIONER.DESC: A thermo regulator doesn't remove heat, but relocates it to a new area.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.AIRCONDITIONER.EFFECT: Cools the <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> piped through it, but outputs <link="HEAT">Heat</link> in its immediate vicinity.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STATERPILLAREGG.NAME: <link="STATERPILLAREGG">Slug Egg</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STATERPILLAREGG.DESC: The electrifying egg of the <link="STATERPILLAR">Plug Slug</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STATERPILLAREGG.EFFECT: Slug Eggs can be connected to a <link="POWER">Power</link> circuit as an energy source.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BEEHIVE.NAME: <link="BEEHIVE">Beeta Hive</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BEEHIVE.DESC:
A moderately <link="RADIATION">Radioactive</link> nest made by <link="BEE">Beetas</link>.

Converts <link="URANIUMORE">Uranium Ore</link> into <link="ENRICHEDURANIUM">Enriched Uranium</link> when worked by a Beeta.
Will not function if ground below has been destroyed.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BEEHIVE.EFFECT: The cozy home of a Beeta.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ETHANOLDISTILLERY.NAME: <link="ETHANOLDISTILLERY">Ethanol Distiller</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ETHANOLDISTILLERY.DESC: Ethanol distillers convert <link="WOOD">Wood</link> into burnable <link="ETHANOL">Ethanol</link> fuel.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ALGAEDISTILLERY.NAME: <link="ALGAEDISTILLERY">Algae Distiller</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ALGAEDISTILLERY.DESC: Algae distillers convert disease-causing slime into algae for oxygen production.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GUNKEMPTIER.NAME: <link="GUNKEMPTIER">Gunk Extractor</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GUNKEMPTIER.DESC: Bionic Duplicants are much more relaxed after a visit to the gunk extractor.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GUNKEMPTIER.EFFECT: Cleanses stale <link="LIQUIDGUNK">Gunk</link> build-up from Duplicants' bionic parts.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OILCHANGER.NAME: <link="OILCHANGER">Lubrication Station</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OILCHANGER.DESC: A fresh supply of oil keeps the ol' joints from getting too creaky.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OILCHANGER.EFFECT: Uses <link="LUBRICATINGOIL">Gear Oil</link> to keep Duplicants' bionic parts running smoothly.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXYLITEREFINERY.NAME: <link="OXYLITEREFINERY">Oxylite Refinery</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXYLITEREFINERY.DESC: Oxylite is a solid and easily transportable source of consumable oxygen.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXYLITEREFINERY.EFFECT: Synthesizes <link="OXYROCK">Oxylite</link> using <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link> and a small amount of <link="GOLD">Gold</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXYSCONCE.NAME: <link="OXYSCONCE">Oxylite Sconce</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXYSCONCE.DESC: Sconces prevent diffused oxygen from being wasted inside storage bins.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXYSCONCE.EFFECT: Stores a small chunk of <link="OXYROCK">Oxylite</link> which gradually releases <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link> into the environment.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FERTILIZERMAKER.NAME: <link="FERTILIZERMAKER">Fertilizer Synthesizer</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FERTILIZERMAKER.DESC: Fertilizer synthesizers convert polluted dirt into fertilizer for domestic plants.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ALGAEHABITAT.NAME: <link="ALGAEHABITAT">Algae Terrarium</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ALGAEHABITAT.DESC: Algae colony, Duplicant colony... we're more alike than we are different.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ALGAEHABITAT.EFFECT:
Consumes <link="ALGAE">Algae</link> to produce <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link> and remove some <link="CARBONDIOXIDE">Carbon Dioxide</link>.

Gains a 10% efficiency boost in direct <link="LIGHT">Light</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BATTERY.NAME: <link="BATTERY">Battery</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BATTERY.DESC: Batteries allow power from generators to be stored for later.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BATTERY.EFFECT:
Stores <link="POWER">Power</link> from generators, then provides that power to buildings.

Loses charge over time.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLYINGCREATUREBAIT.DES: The type of critter attracted by critter bait depends on the construction material.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLYINGCREATUREBAIT.EFF:
Attracts one type of airborne critter.

Single use.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WATERTRAP.NAME: <link="WATERTRAP">Fish Trap</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WATERTRAP.DESC: Trapped fish will automatically be bagged for transport.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WATERTRAP.EFFECT:
Attracts and traps swimming <link="PACU">Pacu</link>.

Only Duplicants with the <link="RANCHING1">Critter Ranching I</link> skill can arm this trap. It's reusable!
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.REUSABLETRAP.LOGIC_POR: Sends a Green Signal when a critter has been trapped
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CREATUREAIRTRAP.NAME: <link="FLYINGCREATUREBAIT">Airborne Critter Trap</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CREATUREAIRTRAP.DESC: It needs to be armed prior to use.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CREATUREAIRTRAP.EFFECT:
Attracts and captures airborne <link="CREATURES">Critters</link>.

Only Duplicants with the <link="RANCHING1">Critter Ranching I</link> skill can arm this trap. It's reusable!
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.AIRBORNECREATURELURE.D: Lures can relocate Pufts or Shine Bugs to specific locations in my colony.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.AIRBORNECREATURELURE.E:
Attracts one type of airborne critter at a time.

Must be baited with <link="SLIMEMOLD">Slime</link> or <link="PHOSPHORITE">Phosphorite</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BATTERYMEDIUM.NAME: <link="BATTERYMEDIUM">Jumbo Battery</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BATTERYMEDIUM.DESC: Larger batteries hold more power and keep systems running longer before recharging.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BATTERYMEDIUM.EFFECT:
Stores <link="POWER">Power</link> from generators, then provides that power to buildings.

Slightly loses charge over time.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BATTERYSMART.NAME: <link="BATTERYSMART">Smart Battery</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BATTERYSMART.DESC: Smart batteries send a Green Signal when they require charging.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BATTERYSMART.EFFECT: Stores Power from generators, then provides that power to buildings. Sends a Green Signal or Red Signal based on the configuration of the Logic Activation Parameters. Very slightly loses charge over time.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BATTERYSMART.LOGIC_POR: Sends a Green Signal when battery is less than Low Threshold charged, until High Threshold is reached again
Sends a Red Signal when the battery is more than High Threshold charged, until Low Threshold is reached again
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BATTERYSMART.ACTIVATE_: Sends a Green Signal when battery is less than {0}% charged, until it is {1}% (High Threshold) charged
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BATTERYSMART.DEACTIVAT: Sends a Red Signal when battery is {0}% charged, until it is less than {1}% (Low Threshold) charged
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BED.NAME: <link="BED">Cot</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BED.DESC: Duplicants without a bed will develop sore backs from sleeping on the floor.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BED.EFFECT:
Gives one Duplicant a place to sleep.

Duplicants will automatically return to their cots to sleep at night.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BED.FACADES.STARCURTAI: Now Duplicants can sleep beneath the stars without wearing an Atmo Suit to bed.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BED.FACADES.SCIENCELAB: For the Duplicant who dreams of scientific discoveries.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BED.FACADES.STAYCATION: Like a weekend away, except... not.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BED.FACADES.STRINGLIGH: Wrapped in shiny gold stars, to help sleepy Duplicants feel accomplished.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BOTTLEEMPTIER.NAME: <link="BOTTLEEMPTIER">Bottle Emptier</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BOTTLEEMPTIER.DESC: A bottle emptier's Element Filter can be used to designate areas for specific liquid storage.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BOTTLEEMPTIER.EFFECT: Empties bottled <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquids</link> back into the world.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BOTTLEEMPTIERGAS.NAME: <link="BOTTLEEMPTIERGAS">Canister Emptier</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BOTTLEEMPTIERGAS.DESC: A canister emptier's Element Filter can designate areas for specific gas storage.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BOTTLEEMPTIERGAS.EFFEC: Empties <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> canisters back into the world.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BOTTLEEMPTIERCONDUITLI: A bottle drainer's Element Filter can be used to designate areas for specific liquid storage.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BOTTLEEMPTIERCONDUITGA: A canister drainer's Element Filter can designate areas for specific gas storage.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ARTIFACTCARGOBAY.NAME: <link="ARTIFACTCARGOBAY">Artifact Transport Module</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ARTIFACTCARGOBAY.EFFEC:
Allows Duplicants to store any artifacts they uncover during space missions.

Artifacts become available to the colony upon the rocket's return. 

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CARGOBAY.NAME: <link="CARGOBAY">Cargo Bay</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CARGOBAY.DESC: Duplicants will fill cargo bays with any resources they find during space missions.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CARGOBAY.EFFECT:
Allows Duplicants to store any <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid Materials</link> found during space missions.

Stored resources become available to the colony upon the rocket's return.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CARGOBAYCLUSTER.NAME: <link="CARGOBAY">Large Cargo Bay</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CARGOBAYCLUSTER.DESC: Holds more than a regular cargo bay.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CARGOBAYCLUSTER.EFFECT:
Allows Duplicants to store most of the <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid Materials</link> found during space missions.

Stored resources become available to the colony upon the rocket's return. 

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLIDCARGOBAYSMALL.DES: Duplicants will fill cargo bays with any resources they find during space missions.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLIDCARGOBAYSMALL.EFF:
Allows Duplicants to store some of the <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid Materials</link> found during space missions.

Stored resources become available to the colony upon the rocket's return. 

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SPECIALCARGOBAY.NAME: <link="SPECIALCARGOBAY">Biological Cargo Bay</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SPECIALCARGOBAY.DESC: Biological cargo bays allow Duplicants to retrieve alien plants and wildlife from space.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SPECIALCARGOBAY.EFFECT:
Allows Duplicants to store unusual or organic resources found during space missions.

Stored resources become available to the colony upon the rocket's return.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SPECIALCARGOBAYCLUSTER: Critters do not require feeding during transit.

Allows Duplicants to transport <link="CREATURES">Critters</link> through space.

Specimens can be released into the colony upon the rocket's return.

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.COMMANDMODULE.NAME: <link="COMMANDMODULE">Command Capsule</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.COMMANDMODULE.DESC: At least one astronaut must be assigned to the command module to pilot a rocket.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.COMMANDMODULE.EFFECT:
Contains passenger seating for Duplicant <link="ASTRONAUTING1">Astronauts</link>.

A Command Capsule must be the last module installed at the top of a rocket.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.COMMANDMODULE.LOGIC_PO: Sends a Green Signal when its rocket launch checklist is complete
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CLUSTERCOMMANDMODULE.L: Sends a Green Signal when its rocket launch checklist is complete
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CLUSTERCRAFTINTERIORDO: A hatch for getting in and out of the rocket.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROBOPILOTMODULE.NAME: <link="ROBOPILOTMODULE">Robo-Pilot Module</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROBOPILOTMODULE.DESC: Robo-pilot modules do not require a Duplicant astronaut.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROBOPILOTMODULE.EFFECT:
Enables rockets to travel swfitly without a <link="ROCKETCONTROLSTATION">Rocket Control Station</link>.

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROBOPILOTCOMMANDMODULE: Robo-pilot modules do not require a Duplicant astronaut.

Enables rockets to travel swiftly and safely without a <link="COMMANDMODULE">Command Capsule</link>.

A Robo-Pilot Capsule must be the last module installed at the top of a rocket.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKETCONTROLSTATION.D: Someone needs to be around to jiggle the controls when the screensaver comes on.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKETCONTROLSTATION.E:
Allows Duplicants to use pilot-operated rockets and control access to interior buildings.

Assigned Duplicants must have the <link="ROCKETPILOTING1">Rocket Piloting</link> skill.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKETCONTROLSTATION.L: Green Signal: Restrict access to interior buildings
Red Signal: Unrestrict access to interior buildings
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RESEARCHMODULE.NAME: <link="RESEARCHMODULE">Research Module</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RESEARCHMODULE.DESC: Data banks can be used at virtual planetariums to produce additional research.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RESEARCHMODULE.EFFECT:
Completes one <link="RESEARCH">Research Task</link> per space mission.

Produces a small Data Bank regardless of mission destination.

Generated <link="RESEARCH">Research Points</link> become available upon the rocket's return.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TOURISTMODULE.NAME: <link="TOURISTMODULE">Sight-Seeing Module</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TOURISTMODULE.DESC: An astronaut must accompany sight seeing Duplicants on rocket flights.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TOURISTMODULE.EFFECT:
Allows one non-Astronaut Duplicant to visit space.

Sight-Seeing Rocket flights decrease <link="STRESS">Stress</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SCANNERMODULE.NAME: <link="SCANNERMODULE">Cartographic Module</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SCANNERMODULE.DESC: Allows Duplicants to boldly go where other Duplicants haven't been yet.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SCANNERMODULE.EFFECT:
Automatically analyzes adjacent space while on a voyage. 

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HABITATMODULESMALL.DES: One lucky Duplicant gets the best view from the whole rocket.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HABITATMODULESMALL.EFF:
Functions as a Command Module and a Nosecone.

Holds one Duplicant traveller.

One Command Module may be installed per rocket.

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>. 

Must be built at the top of a rocket.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HABITATMODULEMEDIUM.DE: Allows Duplicants to survive space travel... Hopefully.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HABITATMODULEMEDIUM.EF:
Functions as a Command Module.

Holds up to ten Duplicant travellers.

One Command Module may be installed per rocket. 

Engine must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.NOSECONEBASIC.NAME: <link="NOSECONEBASIC">Basic Nosecone</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.NOSECONEBASIC.DESC: Every rocket requires a nosecone to fly.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.NOSECONEBASIC.EFFECT:
Protects a rocket during takeoff and entry, enabling space travel.

Engine must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>. 

Must be built at the top of a rocket.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.NOSECONEHARVEST.NAME: <link="NOSECONEHARVEST">Drillcone</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.NOSECONEHARVEST.EFFECT:
Enables a rocket to drill into interstellar debris and collect <link="ELEMENTSGAS">gas</link>, <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">liquid</link> and <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">solid</link> resources from space.

Engine must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>. 

Must be built at the top of a rocket with <link="ELEMENTSGAS">gas</link>, <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">liquid</link> or <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">solid</link> Cargo Module attached to store the appropriate resources.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CO2ENGINE.NAME: <link="CO2ENGINE">Carbon Dioxide Engine</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CO2ENGINE.DESC: Rockets can be used to send Duplicants into space and retrieve rare resources.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CO2ENGINE.EFFECT:
Uses pressurized <link="CARBONDIOXIDE">Carbon Dioxide</link> to propel rockets for short range space exploration.

Carbon Dioxide Engines are relatively fast engine for their size but with limited height restrictions.

Engine must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>. 

Once the engine has been built, more rocket modules can be added.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.KEROSENEENGINE.NAME: <link="KEROSENEENGINE">Petroleum Engine</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.KEROSENEENGINE.DESC: Rockets can be used to send Duplicants into space and retrieve rare resources.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.KEROSENEENGINE.EFFECT:
Burns <link="PETROLEUM">Petroleum</link> to propel rockets for mid-range space exploration.

Petroleum Engines have generous height restrictions, ideal for hauling many modules.

The engine must be built first before more rocket modules can be added.
More powerful rocket engines can propel heavier burdens.

Burns <link="PETROLEUM">Petroleum</link> to propel rockets for mid-range space exploration.

Petroleum Engines have generous height restrictions, ideal for hauling many modules.

Engine must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>. 

Once the engine has been built, more rocket modules can be added.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.KEROSENEENGINECLUSTERS: Rockets can be used to send Duplicants into space and retrieve rare resources.

Burns <link="PETROLEUM">Petroleum</link> to propel rockets for mid-range space exploration.

Small Petroleum Engines possess the same speed as a <link="KEROSENEENGINE">Petroleum Engines</link> but have smaller height restrictions.

Engine must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>. 

Once the engine has been built, more rocket modules can be added.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HYDROGENENGINE.NAME: <link="HYDROGENENGINE">Hydrogen Engine</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HYDROGENENGINE.DESC: Hydrogen engines can propel rockets further than steam or petroleum engines.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HYDROGENENGINE.EFFECT:
Burns <link="LIQUIDHYDROGEN">Liquid Hydrogen</link> to propel rockets for long-range space exploration.

Hydrogen Engines have the same generous height restrictions as <link="KEROSENEENGINE">Petroleum Engines</link> but are slightly faster.

The engine must be built first before more rocket modules can be added.
Hydrogen engines can propel rockets further than steam or petroleum engines.

Burns <link="LIQUIDHYDROGEN">Liquid Hydrogen</link> to propel rockets for long-range space exploration.

Hydrogen Engines have the same generous height restrictions as <link="KEROSENEENGINE">Petroleum Engines</link> but are slightly faster.

Engine must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.

Once the engine has been built, more rocket modules can be added.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUGARENGINE.NAME: <link="SUGARENGINE">Sugar Engine</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUGARENGINE.DESC: Not the most stylish way to travel space, but certainly the tastiest.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUGARENGINE.EFFECT:
Burns <link="SUCROSE">Sucrose</link> to propel rockets for short range space exploration.

Sugar Engines have higher height restrictions than <link="CO2ENGINE">Carbon Dioxide Engines</link>, but move slower.

Engine must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>. 

Once the engine has been built, more rocket modules can be added.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HEPENGINE.NAME: <link="HEPENGINE">Radbolt Engine</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HEPENGINE.DESC: Radbolt-fueled rockets support few modules, but travel exceptionally far.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HEPENGINE.EFFECT:
Injects <link="RADIATION">Radbolts</link> into a reaction chamber to propel rockets for long-range space exploration.

Radbolt Engines are faster than <link="HYDROGENENGINE">Hydrogen Engines</link> but with a more restrictive height allowance.

Engine must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>. 

Once the engine has been built, more rocket modules can be added.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HEPENGINE.LOGIC_PORT_S: Sends a Green Signal when its Radbolt Storage is full
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ORBITALCARGOMODULE.DES: It's a generally good idea to pack some supplies when exploring unknown worlds.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ORBITALCARGOMODULE.EFF:
Delivers cargo to the surface of Planetoids that do not yet have a <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>. 

Must be built via Rocket Platform.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BATTERYMODULE.NAME: <link="BATTERYMODULE">Battery Module</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BATTERYMODULE.DESC: Charging a battery module before takeoff makes it easier to power buildings during flight.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BATTERYMODULE.EFFECT:
Stores the excess <link="POWER">Power</link> generated by a Rocket Engine or <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.

Provides stored power to <link="ROCKETINTERIORPOWERPLUG">Interior Rocket Outlets</link>.

Loses charge over time. 

Must be built via Rocket Platform.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PIONEERMODULE.NAME: <link="PIONEERMODULE">Trailblazer Module</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PIONEERMODULE.DESC: That's one small step for Dupekind.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PIONEERMODULE.EFFECT:
Enables travel to Planetoids that do not yet have a <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.

Can hold one Duplicant traveller.

Deployment is available while in a Starmap hex adjacent to a Planetoid. 

Must be built via Rocket Platform.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLARPANELMODULE.NAME: <link="SOLARPANELMODULE">Solar Panel Module</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLARPANELMODULE.DESC: Collect solar energy before takeoff and during flight.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLARPANELMODULE.EFFEC:
Converts <link="LIGHT">Sunlight</link> into electrical <link="POWER">Power</link> for use on rockets.

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>. 

Must be exposed to space.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SCOUTMODULE.NAME: <link="SCOUTMODULE">Rover's Module</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SCOUTMODULE.DESC: Rover can conduct explorations of planetoids that don't have rocket platforms built.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SCOUTMODULE.EFFECT:
Deploys one <link="SCOUT">Rover Bot</link> for remote Planetoid exploration.

Deployment is available while in a Starmap hex adjacent to a Planetoid. 

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PIONEERLANDER.NAME: <link="PIONEERLANDER">Trailblazer Lander</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PIONEERLANDER.DESC: Lands a Duplicant on a Planetoid from an orbiting <link="PIONEERMODULE">Trailblazer Module</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SCOUTLANDER.NAME: <link="SCOUTLANDER">Rover's Lander</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SCOUTLANDER.DESC: Lands <link="SCOUT">Rover</link> on a Planetoid when <link="SCOUTMODULE">Rover's Module</link> is in orbit.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GANTRY.NAME: <link="GANTRY">Gantry</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GANTRY.DESC: A gantry can be built over rocket pieces where ladders and tile cannot.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GANTRY.EFFECT: Provides scaffolding across rocket modules to allow Duplicant access.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GANTRY.LOGIC_PORT_ACTI: Extends gantry when a Green Signal signal is received
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GANTRY.LOGIC_PORT_INAC: Retracts gantry when a Red Signal signal is received
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKETINTERIORPOWERPLU: Outlets conveniently power buildings inside a cockpit using their rocket's power stores.

Provides <link="POWER">Power</link> to connected buildings.

Pulls power from <link="BATTERYMODULE">Battery Modules</link> and Rocket Engines.

Must be built within the interior of a Rocket Module.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKETINTERIORLIQUIDIN:
Allows <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquids</link> to be pumped into rocket storage via <link="LIQUIDCONDUIT">Pipes</link>.

Sends liquid to the first Rocket Module with available space.

Must be built within the interior of a Rocket Module.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKETINTERIORLIQUIDOU: Now if only we had some water balloons...

Allows <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquids</link> to be drawn from rocket storage via <link="LIQUIDCONDUIT">Pipes</link>.

Draws liquid from the first Rocket Module with the requested material.

Must be built within the interior of a Rocket Module.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKETINTERIORGASINPUT:
Allows <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gases</link> to be pumped into rocket storage via <link="GASCONDUIT">Pipes</link>.

Sends gas to the first Rocket Module with available space.

Must be built within the interior of a Rocket Module.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKETINTERIORGASOUTPU:
Allows <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gases</link> to be drawn from rocket storage via <link="GASCONDUIT">Pipes</link>.

Draws gas from the first Rocket Module with the requested material.

Must be built within the interior of a Rocket Module.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKETINTERIORSOLIDINP: Why organize your shelves when you can just shove everything in here?

Allows <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid Materials</link> to be moved into rocket storage via <link="SOLIDCONDUIT">Conveyor Rails</link>.

Sends solid material to the first Rocket Module with available space.

Must be built within the interior of a Rocket Module.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKETINTERIORSOLIDOUT: For accessing your stored luggage mid-flight.

Allows <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid Materials</link> to be moved out of rocket storage via <link="SOLIDCONDUIT">Conveyor Rails</link>.

Draws solid material from the first Rocket Module with the requested material.

Must be built within the interior of a Rocket Module.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WATERCOOLER.NAME: <link="WATERCOOLER">Water Cooler</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WATERCOOLER.DESC: Chatting with friends improves Duplicants' moods and reduces their stress.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WATERCOOLER.EFFECT:
Provides a gathering place for Duplicants during Downtime.

Improves Duplicant <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WATERCOOLER.FACADES.RO: It really classes up a breakroom.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WATERCOOLER.FACADES.YE: Did someone boil eggs in this water?
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WATERCOOLER.FACADES.RE: Rose-colored paper cups: the shatter-proof alternative to rose-colored glasses.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WATERCOOLER.FACADES.GR: Ideal for post-Mush Bar palate cleansing.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WATERCOOLER.FACADES.PU: Most Duplicants agree that it really should dispense juice.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ARCADEMACHINE.NAME: <link="ARCADEMACHINE">Arcade Cabinet</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ARCADEMACHINE.DESC:
Komet Kablam-O!
For up to two players.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ARCADEMACHINE.EFFECT:
Allows Duplicants to play video games on their breaks.

Increases Duplicant <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SINGLEPLAYERARCADE.DES: Space Brawler IV! For one player.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SINGLEPLAYERARCADE.EFF:
Allows a Duplicant to play video games solo on their breaks.

Increases Duplicant <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PHONOBOX.NAME: <link="PHONOBOX">Jukebot</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PHONOBOX.DESC: Dancing helps Duplicants get their innermost feelings out.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PHONOBOX.EFFECT:
Plays music for Duplicants to dance to on their breaks.

Increases Duplicant <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.JUICER.NAME: <link="JUICER">Juicer</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.JUICER.DESC: Fruity juice can really brighten a Duplicant's breaktime
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.JUICER.EFFECT:
Provides refreshment for Duplicants on their breaks.

Drinking juice increases Duplicant <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ESPRESSOMACHINE.NAME: <link="ESPRESSOMACHINE">Espresso Machine</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ESPRESSOMACHINE.DESC: A shot of espresso helps Duplicants relax after a long day.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ESPRESSOMACHINE.EFFECT:
Provides refreshment for Duplicants on their breaks.

Increases Duplicant <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TELEPHONE.NAME: <link="TELEPHONE">Party Line Phone</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TELEPHONE.DESC: You never know who you'll meet on the other line.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TELEPHONE.EFFECT:
Can be used by one Duplicant to chat with themselves or with other Duplicants in different locations.

Chatting increases Duplicant <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TELEPHONE.EFFECT_BABBL: Duplicants will gain {amount} {attrib} if they chat only with themselves.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TELEPHONE.EFFECT_CHAT_: Duplicants will gain {amount} {attrib} if they chat with at least one other Duplicant.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TELEPHONE.EFFECT_LONG_: Duplicants will gain {amount} {attrib} if they chat with at least one other Duplicant across space.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MODULARLIQUIDINPUT.DES: A hub from which to input <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquids</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MODULARSOLIDINPUT.NAME: <link="MODULARSOLIDINPUT">Solid Input Hub</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MODULARSOLIDINPUT.DESC: A hub from which to input <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solids</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MODULARGASINPUT.NAME: <link="MODULARGASINPUT">Gas Input Hub</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MODULARGASINPUT.DESC: A hub from which to input <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MECHANICALSURFBOARD.DE: Mechanical waves make for radical relaxation time.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MECHANICALSURFBOARD.EF:
Increases Duplicant <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Some <link="WATER">Water</link> gets splashed on the floor during use.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MECHANICALSURFBOARD.WA: This building must be filled with {amount} {element} in order to function.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MECHANICALSURFBOARD.LE: This building will spill {amount} of its contents on to the floor during use, which must be replenished.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SAUNA.NAME: <link="SAUNA">Sauna</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SAUNA.DESC: A steamy sauna soothes away all the aches and pains.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SAUNA.EFFECT:
Uses <link="STEAM">Steam</link> to create a relaxing atmosphere.

Increases Duplicant <link="MORALE">Morale</link> and provides a lingering sense of warmth.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BEACHCHAIR.NAME: <link="BEACHCHAIR">Beach Chair</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BEACHCHAIR.DESC: Soak up some relaxing sun rays.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BEACHCHAIR.EFFECT:
Duplicants can relax by lounging in <link="LIGHT">Sunlight</link>.

Increases Duplicant <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BEACHCHAIR.LIGHTEFFECT: Duplicants will gain {amount} {attrib} if this building is in light dimmer than {lux}.
Duplicants will gain {amount} {attrib} if this building is in at least {lux} light.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUNLAMP.NAME: <link="SUNLAMP">Sun Lamp</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUNLAMP.EFFECT:
Gives off <link="LIGHT">Sunlight</link> level Lux.

Can be paired with <link="BEACHCHAIR">Beach Chairs</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.VERTICALWINDTUNNEL.DES: Duplicants love the feeling of high-powered wind through their hair.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.VERTICALWINDTUNNEL.EFF:
Must be connected to a <link="POWER">Power Source</link>. To properly function, the area under this building must be left vacant.

Increases Duplicants <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.VERTICALWINDTUNNEL.DIS: This building will displace {amount} Gas while in use.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TELEPORTALPAD.NAME: Teleporter Pad
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TELEPORTALPAD.DESC: Duplicants are just atoms as far as the pad's concerned.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TELEPORTALPAD.EFFECT: Instantly transports Duplicants and items to another portal with the same portal code.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CHECKPOINT.NAME: <link="CHECKPOINT">Duplicant Checkpoint</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CHECKPOINT.DESC: Checkpoints can be connected to automated sensors to determine when it's safe to enter.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CHECKPOINT.EFFECT: Allows Duplicants to pass when receiving a Green Signal. Prevents Duplicants from passing when receiving a Red Signal.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FIREPOLE.NAME: <link="FIREPOLE">Fire Pole</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FIREPOLE.DESC: Build these in addition to ladders for efficient upward and downward movement.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FIREPOLE.EFFECT:
Allows rapid Duplicant descent.

Significantly slows upward climbing.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOORSWITCH.NAME: <link="FLOORSWITCH">Weight Plate</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOORSWITCH.DESC: Weight plates can be used to turn on amenities only when Duplicants pass by.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOORSWITCH.EFFECT: Sends a Green Signal when an object or Duplicant is placed atop of it. Cannot be triggered by Gas or Liquids.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.KILN.NAME: <link="KILN">Kiln</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.KILN.EFFECT:
Fires <link="CLAY">Clay</link> to produce <link="CERAMIC">Ceramic</link>, and <link="CARBON">Coal</link> or <link="WOOD">Wood</link> to produce <link="REFINEDCARBON">Refined Carbon</link>.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDFUELTANK.NAME: <link="LIQUIDFUELTANK">Liquid Fuel Tank</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDFUELTANK.DESC: Storing additional fuel increases the distance a rocket can travel before returning.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDFUELTANK.EFFECT:
Stores the <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> fuel piped into it to supply rocket engines.

The stored fuel type is determined by the rocket engine it is built upon.
Storing additional fuel increases the distance a rocket can travel before returning.

Stores the <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> fuel piped into it to supply rocket engines.

The stored fuel type is determined by the rocket engine it is built upon. 

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LANDING_POD.NAME: Spacefarer Deploy Pod
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LANDING_POD.EFFECT:
Contains a Duplicant deployed from orbit.

Pod will disintegrate on arrival.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKETPOD.NAME: <link="ROCKETPOD">Trailblazer Deploy Pod</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKETPOD.DESC: The Duplicant inside is equal parts nervous and excited.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKETPOD.EFFECT:
Contains a Duplicant deployed from orbit by a <link="PIONEERMODULE">Trailblazer Module</link>.

Pod will disintegrate on arrival.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SCOUTROCKETPOD.NAME: <link="SCOUTROCKETPOD">Rover's Doghouse</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SCOUTROCKETPOD.EFFECT:
Contains a <link="SCOUT">Rover</link> deployed from an orbiting <link="SCOUTMODULE">Rover's Module</link>.

Pod will disintegrate on arrival.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKETCOMMANDCONSOLE.E:
Allows a Duplicant to pilot a rocket.

Cargo rockets must possess a Rocket Cockpit in order to function.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKETENVELOPEWINDOWTI: I can see my asteroid from here!
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKETWALLTILE.NAME: <link="ROCKETENVELOPETILE">Rocket Wall</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SMALLOXIDIZERTANK.NAME: <link="SMALLOXIDIZERTANK">Small Solid Oxidizer Tank</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SMALLOXIDIZERTANK.DESC: Solid oxidizers allows rocket fuel to be efficiently burned in the vacuum of space.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SMALLOXIDIZERTANK.EFFE:
Stores <link="FERTILIZER">Fertilizer</link> and <link="OXYROCK">Oxylite</link> for burning rocket fuels. 

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXIDIZERTANK.NAME: <link="OXIDIZERTANK">Solid Oxidizer Tank</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXIDIZERTANK.DESC: Solid oxidizers allows rocket fuel to be efficiently burned in the vacuum of space.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXIDIZERTANK.EFFECT: Stores <link="OXYROCK">Oxylite</link> and other oxidizers for burning rocket fuels.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXIDIZERTANKCLUSTER.DE: Solid oxidizers allows rocket fuel to be efficiently burned in the vacuum of space.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXIDIZERTANKCLUSTER.EF:
Stores <link="OXYROCK">Oxylite</link> and other oxidizers for burning rocket fuels.

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXIDIZERTANKLIQUID.DES: Liquid oxygen improves the thrust-to-mass ratio of rocket fuels.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXIDIZERTANKLIQUID.EFF: Stores <link="LIQUIDOXYGEN">Liquid Oxygen</link> for burning rocket fuels.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXIDIZERTANKLIQUIDCLUS: Liquid oxygen improves the thrust-to-mass ratio of rocket fuels.

Stores <link="LIQUIDOXYGEN">Liquid Oxygen</link> for burning rocket fuels. 

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCONDITIONER.NAME: <link="LIQUIDCONDITIONER">Thermo Aquatuner</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCONDITIONER.DESC: A thermo aquatuner cools liquid and outputs the heat elsewhere.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCONDITIONER.EFFE: Cools the <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> piped through it, but outputs <link="HEAT">Heat</link> in its immediate vicinity.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCARGOBAY.NAME: <link="LIQUIDCARGOBAY">Liquid Cargo Tank</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCARGOBAY.DESC: Duplicants will fill cargo bays with any resources they find during space missions.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCARGOBAY.EFFECT:
Allows Duplicants to store any <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> resources found during space missions.

Stored resources become available to the colony upon the rocket's return.
Holds more than a regular cargo tank.

Allows Duplicants to store most of the <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> resources found during space missions.

Stored resources become available to the colony upon the rocket's return.

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCARGOBAYSMALL.DE: Duplicants will fill cargo tanks with whatever resources they find during space missions.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCARGOBAYSMALL.EF:
Allows Duplicants to store some of the <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> resources found during space missions.

Stored resources become available to the colony upon the rocket's return. 

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LUXURYBED.NAME: <link="LUXURYBED">Comfy Bed</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LUXURYBED.DESC: Duplicants prefer comfy beds to cots and wake up more rested after sleeping in them.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LUXURYBED.EFFECT:
Provides a sleeping area for one Duplicant and restores additional stamina.

Duplicants will automatically sleep in their assigned beds at night.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LUXURYBED.FACADES.GRAN: Where every Duplicant wakes up a winner.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LUXURYBED.FACADES.ROCK: Launches sleepy Duplicants into a deep-space slumber.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LUXURYBED.FACADES.BOUN: An inflatable party prop makes a surprisingly good bed.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LUXURYBED.FACADES.PUFT: A comfy, if somewhat 'fragrant', place to sleep.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LUXURYBED.FACADES.HAND: It's so nice to be held.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LUXURYBED.FACADES.RUBI: A little pattern recognition at bedtime soothes the mind.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LUXURYBED.FACADES.RED_: A pink-hued bed for rosy dreams.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LUXURYBED.FACADES.GREE: The mattress is so soft, it's almost impossible to climb out of.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LUXURYBED.FACADES.YELL: When life is icky, bed rest is the only answer.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LUXURYBED.FACADES.PURP: A soft landing spot for swooners.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LADDERBED.NAME: <link="LADDERBED">Ladder Bed</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LADDERBED.DESC: Duplicant's sleep will be interrupted if another Duplicant uses the ladder.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LADDERBED.EFFECT:
Provides a sleeping area for one Duplicant and also functions as a ladder.

Duplicants will automatically sleep in their assigned beds at night.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MEDICALCOT.NAME: <link="MEDICALCOT">Triage Cot</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MEDICALCOT.DESC: Duplicants use triage cots to recover from physical injuries and receive aid from peers.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MEDICALCOT.EFFECT:
Accelerates <link="HEALTH">Health</link> restoration and the healing of physical injuries.

Revives incapacitated Duplicants.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DOCTORSTATION.NAME: <link="DOCTORSTATION">Sick Bay</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DOCTORSTATION.DESC: Sick bays can be placed in hospital rooms to decrease the likelihood of disease spreading.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DOCTORSTATION.EFFECT:
Allows Duplicants to administer basic treatments to sick Duplicants.

Duplicants must possess the Bedside Manner <link="ROLES">Skill</link> to treat peers.
Disease clinics require power, but treat more serious illnesses than sick bays alone.

Allows Duplicants to administer powerful treatments to sick Duplicants.

Duplicants must possess the Advanced Medical Care <link="ROLES">Skill</link> to treat peers.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MASSAGETABLE.NAME: <link="MASSAGETABLE">Massage Table</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MASSAGETABLE.DESC: Massage tables quickly reduce extreme stress, at the cost of power production.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MASSAGETABLE.EFFECT:
Rapidly reduces <link="STRESS">Stress</link> for the Duplicant user.

Duplicants will automatically seek a massage table when <link="STRESS">Stress</link> exceeds breaktime range.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MASSAGETABLE.ACTIVATE_: Duplicants must take a massage break when their <style="KKeyword">Stress</style> reaches {0}%
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MASSAGETABLE.DEACTIVAT: Breaktime ends when <style="KKeyword">Stress</style> is reduced to {0}%
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MASSAGETABLE.FACADES.D: Massage tables quickly reduce extreme stress, at the cost of power production.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CEILINGLIGHT.NAME: <link="CEILINGLIGHT">Ceiling Light</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CEILINGLIGHT.DESC: Light reduces Duplicant stress and is required to grow certain plants.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CEILINGLIGHT.EFFECT:
Provides <link="LIGHT">Light</link> when <link="POWER">Powered</link>.

Increases Duplicant workspeed within light radius.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CEILINGLIGHT.FACADES.D: It does not go on the floor.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CEILINGLIGHT.FACADES.L: For best results, do not fill with liquids.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CEILINGLIGHT.FACADES.F: The height of plumbing-inspired interior design.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CEILINGLIGHT.FACADES.M: The protective cage makes it the safest choice for underground parties.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CEILINGLIGHT.FACADES.B: For Duplicants who can't keep real plants alive.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CEILINGLIGHT.FACADES.P: A fun lampshade for fun spaces.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CEILINGLIGHT.FACADES.R: The initials E.R. are sewn into the lampshade.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MERCURYCEILINGLIGHT.DE: Mercury ceiling lights take a while to reach full brightness, but once they do...zowie!
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MERCURYCEILINGLIGHT.EF:
Uses <link="MERCURY">Mercury</link> and <link="POWER">Power</link> to produce <link="LIGHT">Light</link>.

Light reduces Duplicant stress and is required to grow certain plants.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.AIRFILTER.NAME: <link="AIRFILTER">Deodorizer</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.AIRFILTER.EFFECT: Uses <link="SAND">Sand</link> to filter <link="CONTAMINATEDOXYGEN">Polluted Oxygen</link> from the air, reducing <link="DISEASE">Disease</link> spread.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ARTIFACTANALYSISSTATIO: Discover the mysteries of the past.
Analyses and extracts <link="UNOBTANIUM">Neutronium</link> from artifacts of interest.
This artifact has a {chance} to drop a Vacillator Recharge when analyzed at the <link="ARTIFACTANALYSISSTATION">Artifact Analysis Station</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVAS.NAME: <link="CANVAS">Blank Canvas</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVAS.DESC: Once built, a Duplicant can paint a blank canvas to produce a decorative painting.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVAS.EFFECT:
Increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be painted by a Duplicant.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVAS.FACADES.ART_A.D: A sweet, amateurish interpretation of the Duplicant form.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVAS.FACADES.ART_B.D: The fast-food equivalent of high art.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVAS.FACADES.ART_C.D: Some viewers swear they've seen it blink.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVAS.FACADES.ART_D.D: If art could speak, this piece would be far less popular.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVAS.FACADES.ART_E.D: Scratching and sniffing the flower yields no scent.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVAS.FACADES.ART_F.D: Portrait of a leader astride their mighty steed.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVAS.FACADES.ART_G.D: The raw emotion conveyed here often renders viewers speechless.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVAS.FACADES.ART_H.D: A candid moment of affection between two organisms.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVAS.FACADES.ART_I.D: A multi-layered exploration of the artist as a subject.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVAS.FACADES.ART_J.D: A painting that captures the true nature of hunger.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVAS.FACADES.ART_K.D: The perfect painting for dark, dank spaces.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVAS.FACADES.ART_L.D: The furry hat helped keep the artist's bandage on.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVAS.FACADES.ART_N.D: Most Duplicants believe that the balloon in this image is about to be caught.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVAS.FACADES.ART_P.D: It is a cruel guest who does not RSVP.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVAS.FACADES.ART_Q.D: The only kind of gift that poorly behaved Duplicants can expect to receive.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVAS.FACADES.ART_R.D: It combines two things that everyone loves: pips and lasers.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVASWIDE.NAME: <link="CANVASWIDE">Landscape Canvas</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVASWIDE.DESC: Once built, a Duplicant can paint a blank canvas to produce a decorative painting.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVASWIDE.EFFECT:
Moderately increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be painted by a Duplicant.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVASWIDE.FACADES.ART: <link="ARTWIDEA">The Twins</link>
The effort is admirable, though the execution is not.
<link="ARTWIDEB">Ground Zero</link>
Every story has its origin.
<link="ARTWIDEC">Still Life with Barbeque and Frost Bun</link>
Food this good deserves to be immortalized.
<link="ARTWIDED">Composition with Three Colors</link>
All the other colors in the artist's palette had dried up.
<link="ARTWIDEE">Behold, A Fork</link>
Each tine represents a branch of science.
<link="ARTWIDEF">The Astronomer at Home</link>
Its companion piece, "The Astronomer at Work" was lost in a meteor shower.
<link="ARTWIDEG">Iconic Iteration</link>
For the art collector who doesn't mind a bit of repetition.
<link="ARTWIDEH">La Belle Meep</link>
A daring piece, guaranteed to cause a stir.
<link="ARTWIDEI">Glorious Vole</link>
A moody study of the renowned tunneler.
<link="ARTWIDEJ">The Swell Swell</link>
As far as wave-themed art goes, it's great.
<link="ARTWIDEK">Flight of the Slicksters</link>
The delight on the subjects' faces is contagious.
<link="ARTWIDEL">The Shiny Night</link>
A dreamy abundance of swirls, whirls and whorls.
<link="ARTWIDEM">Hot Afternoon</link>
Things get a bit melty if they're forgotten in the sun.
<link="ARTWIDEO">Super Old Mural</link>
Even just exhaling nearby could damage this historical work.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVASTALL.NAME: <link="CANVASTALL">Portrait Canvas</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVASTALL.DESC: Once built, a Duplicant can paint a blank canvas to produce a decorative painting.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVASTALL.EFFECT:
Moderately increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be painted by a Duplicant.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CANVASTALL.FACADES.ART: Even amateur art is essential to life.
It doesn't have to taste good, it's art.
Rumor has it that the model was self-conscious about their uneven eyebrows.
A poetic ink painting depicting the beginning of an end.
The type of painting that ambitious Duplicants gravitate to.
When the future calls, Duplicants answer.
A poster for a blockbuster film that was never made.
The glass and frame are hydrophobic, for easy cleaning.
No one likes being interrupted when they're waiting for inspiration to strike.
Nearby, a companion animal waited for the object to be thrown.
There were greasy fingerprints on the canvas even before the paint had dried.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CO2SCRUBBER.NAME: <link="CO2SCRUBBER">Carbon Skimmer</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CO2SCRUBBER.DESC: Skimmers remove large amounts of carbon dioxide, but produce no breathable air.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CO2SCRUBBER.EFFECT: Uses <link="WATER">Water</link> to filter <link="CARBONDIOXIDE">Carbon Dioxide</link> from the air.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.COMPOST.NAME: <link="COMPOST">Compost</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.COMPOST.DESC: Composts safely deal with biological waste, producing fresh dirt.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.COMPOST.EFFECT: Reduces <link="TOXICSAND">Polluted Dirt</link>, rotting <link="FOOD">Foods</link>, and discarded organics down into <link="DIRT">Dirt</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.COOKINGSTATION.NAME: <link="COOKINGSTATION">Electric Grill</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.COOKINGSTATION.DESC: Proper cooking eliminates foodborne disease and produces tasty, stress-relieving meals.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.COOKINGSTATION.EFFECT:
Cooks a wide variety of improved <link="FOOD">Foods</link>.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CRYOTANK.NAME: <link="CRYOTANK">Cryotank 3000</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CRYOTANK.DESC:
The tank appears impossibly old, but smells crisp and brand new.

A silhouette just barely visible through the frost of the glass.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CRYOTANK.DEFROSTBUTTON: A new pal is just an icebreaker away
Luxury meals increase Duplicants' morale and prevents them from becoming stressed.

Cooks a wide variety of quality <link="FOOD">Foods</link>.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DININGTABLE.NAME: <link="DININGTABLE">Mess Table</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DININGTABLE.DESC: Duplicants prefer to dine at a table, rather than eat off the floor.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DININGTABLE.EFFECT:
Gives one Duplicant a place to eat.

Duplicants will automatically eat at their assigned table when hungry.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DOOR.NAME: <link="DOOR">Pneumatic Door</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DOOR.DESC: Door controls can be used to prevent Duplicants from entering restricted areas.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DOOR.EFFECT:
Encloses areas without blocking <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> or <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> flow.

Wild <link="CREATURES">Critters</link> cannot pass through doors.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DOOR.CONTROL_STATE.AUT: Duplicants open and close this door as needed
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ELECTROBANKCHARGER.DES: Bionic Duplicants rely on a steady supply of power to function.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ELECTROBANKCHARGER.EFF: Converts empty <link="ELECTROBANK">Eco Power Banks</link> into fully charged units ready for reuse.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SMALLELECTROBANKDISCHA: A small standalone power center that can be mounted on the floor or wall.
Converts stored energy from <link="ELECTROBANK">Power Banks</link> into power for connected buildings.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LARGEELECTROBANKDISCHA: It's basically its own power grid.
Efficiently converts stored energy from <link="ELECTROBANK">Power Banks</link> into power for connected buildings.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ELECTROLYZER.NAME: <link="ELECTROLYZER">Electrolyzer</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ELECTROLYZER.DESC: Water goes in one end, life sustaining oxygen comes out the other.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ELECTROLYZER.EFFECT:
Converts <link="WATER">Water</link> into <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link> and <link="HYDROGEN">Hydrogen Gas</link>.

Becomes idle when the area reaches maximum pressure capacity.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RUSTDEOXIDIZER.NAME: <link="RUSTDEOXIDIZER">Rust Deoxidizer</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RUSTDEOXIDIZER.DESC: Rust and salt goes in, oxygen comes out.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RUSTDEOXIDIZER.EFFECT:
Converts <link="RUST">Rust</link> into <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link> and <link="CHLORINE">Chlorine Gas</link>.

Becomes idle when the area reaches maximum pressure capacity.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DESALINATOR.NAME: <link="DESALINATOR">Desalinator</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DESALINATOR.DESC: Salt can be refined into table salt for a mealtime morale boost.
Limiting the power drawn by wires prevents them from incurring overload damage.

Limits <link="POWER">Power</link> flowing through the Transformer to 1000 W.

Connect <link="BATTERY">Batteries</link> on the large side to act as a valve and prevent <link="WIRE">Wires</link> from drawing more than 1000 W.

Can be rotated before construction.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.POWERTRANSFORMER.NAME: <link="POWERTRANSFORMER">Large Power Transformer</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.POWERTRANSFORMER.DESC: It's a power transformer, but larger.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.POWERTRANSFORMER.EFFEC:
Limits <link="POWER">Power</link> flowing through the Transformer to 4 kW.

Connect <link="BATTERY">Batteries</link> on the large side to act as a valve and prevent <link="WIRE">Wires</link> from drawing more than 4 kW.

Can be rotated before construction.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOORLAMP.NAME: <link="FLOORLAMP">Lamp</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOORLAMP.DESC: Any building's light emitting radius can be viewed in the light overlay.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOORLAMP.EFFECT:
Provides <link="LIGHT">Light</link> when <link="POWER">Powered</link>.

Increases Duplicant workspeed within light radius.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOORLAMP.FACADES.DEFA: Any building's light emitting radius can be viewed in the light overlay.
This lamp blazes forth in unparalleled glory.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOORLAMP.FACADES.BRIS: It's a bit prickly, but it casts a festive glow.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOWERVASE.NAME: <link="FLOWERVASE">Flower Pot</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOWERVASE.DESC: Flower pots allow decorative plants to be moved to new locations.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOWERVASE.EFFECT:
Houses a single <link="PLANTS">Plant</link> when sown with a <link="PLANTS">Seed</link>.

Increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOWERVASE.FACADES.DEF: The original container for plants on the move.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOWERVASE.FACADES.RET: A funky yellow flower pot for plants on the move.
A funky red flower pot for plants on the move.
A funky green flower pot for plants on the move.
A funky blue flower pot for plants on the move.
A funky white flower pot for plants on the move.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOWERVASEWALL.NAME: <link="FLOWERVASEWALL">Wall Pot</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOWERVASEWALL.DESC: Placing a plant in a wall pot can add a spot of Decor to otherwise bare walls.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOWERVASEWALL.EFFECT:
Houses a single <link="PLANTS">Plant</link> when sown with a <link="PLANTS">Seed</link>.

Increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be hung from a wall.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOWERVASEHANGING.NAME: <link="FLOWERVASEHANGING">Hanging Pot</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOWERVASEHANGING.DESC: Hanging pots can add some Decor to a room, without blocking buildings on the floor.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOWERVASEHANGING.EFFE:
Houses a single <link="PLANTS">Plant</link> when sown with a <link="PLANTS">Seed</link>.

Increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be hung from a ceiling.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOWERVASEHANGING.FACA: Suspended vessels really elevate a plant display.
Suspended vessels really elevate a plant display.
Suspended vessels really elevate a plant display.
Suspended vessels really elevate a plant display.
Suspended vessels really elevate a plant display.
A measured approach to indoor plant decor.
The real puzzle is how to keep indoor plants alive.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLOWERVASEHANGINGFANCY: Aero pots can be hung from the ceiling and have extremely high Decor.

Houses a single <link="PLANTS">Plant</link> when sown with a <link="PLANTS">Seed</link>.

Increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be hung from a ceiling.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLUSHTOILET.NAME: <link="FLUSHTOILET">Lavatory</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLUSHTOILET.DESC: Lavatories transmit fewer germs to Duplicants' skin and require no emptying.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLUSHTOILET.EFFECT:
Gives Duplicants a place to relieve themselves.

Spreads very few <link="DISEASE">Germs</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLUSHTOILET.FACADES.DE: Lavatories transmit fewer germs to Duplicants' skin and require no emptying.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLUSHTOILET.FACADES.PO: For those who've really got to a-go-go.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLUSHTOILET.FACADES.PU: It's like pooping inside Hexalent fruit!
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLUSHTOILET.FACADES.YE: Someone thought it'd be a good idea to have the outside match the inside.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLUSHTOILET.FACADES.RE: The scented pink toilet paper smells like a rosebush in a sewage plant.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FLUSHTOILET.FACADES.BL: A private place to feel big feelings.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SHOWER.NAME: <link="SHOWER">Shower</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SHOWER.DESC: Regularly showering will prevent Duplicants spreading germs to the things they touch.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CONDUIT.STATUS_ITEM.TO: Awaiting a <link="PLUMBER">Plumber</link> to clear this pipe
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MORBROVERMAKER.NAME: <link="STORYTRAITMORBROVER">Biobot Builder</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MORBROVERMAKER.DESC: Allows a skilled Duplicant to manufacture a steady supply of icky yet effective bots.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MORBROVERMAKER.EFFECT:
Uses <link="ZOMBIESPORES">Zombie Spores</link> and <link="STEEL">Steel</link> to craft biofueled machines that can be sent into hostile environments.

Defunct <link="STORYTRAITMORBROVER">Biobots</link> drop harvestable <link="STEEL">Steel</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FOSSILDIG.NAME: Ancient Specimen
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FOSSILDIG.EFFECT:
Contains a partial <link="FOSSIL">Fossil</link> left behind by a giant critter.

Studying the full skeleton could yield the information required to access a valuable new resource.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FOSSILDIG_COMPLETED.DE: There sure are a lot of old bones in this area.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FOSSILDIG_COMPLETED.EF: Contains a deep cache of harvestable <link="FOSSIL">Fossils</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GAMMARAYOVEN.NAME: <link="GAMMARAYOVEN">Gamma Ray Oven</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GAMMARAYOVEN.EFFECT:
Cooks a variety of <link="FOOD">Foods</link>.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCARGOBAY.NAME: <link="GASCARGOBAY">Gas Cargo Canister</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCARGOBAY.DESC: Duplicants will fill cargo bays with any resources they find during space missions.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCARGOBAY.EFFECT:
Allows Duplicants to store any <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> resources found during space missions.

Stored resources become available to the colony upon the rocket's return.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCARGOBAYCLUSTER.DES: Holds more than a typical gas cargo canister.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCARGOBAYCLUSTER.EFF:
Allows Duplicants to store most of the <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> resources found during space missions.

Stored resources become available to the colony upon the rocket's return.

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCARGOBAYSMALL.NAME: <link="GASCARGOBAYSMALL">Gas Cargo Canister</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCARGOBAYSMALL.DESC: Duplicants fill cargo canisters with any resources they find during space missions.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCARGOBAYSMALL.EFFEC:
Allows Duplicants to store some of the <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> resources found during space missions.

Stored resources become available to the colony upon the rocket's return. 

Must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCONDUIT.NAME: <link="GASCONDUIT">Gas Pipe</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCONDUIT.DESC: Gas pipes are used to connect the inputs and outputs of ventilated buildings.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCONDUIT.EFFECT:
Carries <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> between <link="GASPIPING">Outputs</link> and <link="GASPIPING">Intakes</link>.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCONDUITBRIDGE.NAME: <link="GASCONDUITBRIDGE">Gas Bridge</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCONDUITBRIDGE.DESC: Separate pipe systems prevent mingled contents from causing building damage.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCONDUITBRIDGE.EFFEC:
Runs one <link="GASPIPING">Gas Pipe</link> section over another without joining them.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCONDUITPREFERENTIAL: Priority flows ensure important buildings are filled first when on a system with other buildings.
Diverts <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> to a secondary input when its primary input overflows.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCONDUITPREFERENT: Priority flows ensure important buildings are filled first when on a system with other buildings.
Diverts <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> to a secondary input when its primary input overflows.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCONDUITOVERFLOW.DES: Overflow valves can be used to prioritize which buildings should receive precious resources first.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCONDUITOVERFLOW.EFF: Fills a secondary<link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> output only when its primary output is blocked.
Overflow valves can be used to prioritize which buildings should receive precious resources first.
Fills a secondary<link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> output only when its primary output is blocked.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LAUNCHPAD.NAME: <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LAUNCHPAD.DESC: A platform from which rockets can be launched and on which they can land.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LAUNCHPAD.EFFECT:
Precursor to construction of all other Rocket modules.

Allows Rockets to launch from or land on the host Planetoid.

Automatically links up to <link="MODULARLAUNCHPADPORTSOLID">Rocket Port</link><link="MODULARLAUNCHPADPORTSOLID">s</link> built to either side of the platform.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LAUNCHPAD.LOGIC_PORT_R: Sends a Green Signal when its rocket is ready for flight
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LAUNCHPAD.LOGIC_PORT_L: Sends a Green Signal when its rocket is on the <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASFILTER.NAME: <link="GASFILTER">Gas Filter</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASFILTER.DESC: All gases are sent into the building's output pipe, except the gas chosen for filtering.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASFILTER.EFFECT: Sieves one <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> from the air, sending it into a dedicated <link="GASPIPING">Pipe</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLIDFILTER.NAME: <link="SOLIDFILTER">Solid Filter</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLIDFILTER.DESC: All solids are sent into the building's output conveyor, except the solid chosen for filtering.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLIDFILTER.EFFECT: Separates one <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid Material</link> from the conveyor, sending it into a dedicated <link="SOLIDCONDUIT">Conveyor Rail</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASPERMEABLEMEMBRANE.D: Building with airflow tile promotes better gas circulation within a colony.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASPERMEABLEMEMBRANE.E:
Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.

Blocks <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> flow without obstructing <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DEVPUMPGAS.NAME: Dev Pump Gas
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DEVPUMPGAS.DESC: Piping a pump's output to a building's intake will send gas to that building.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DEVPUMPGAS.EFFECT:
Draws in <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> and runs it through <link="GASPIPING">Pipes</link>.

Must be immersed in <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASPUMP.NAME: <link="GASPUMP">Gas Pump</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASPUMP.DESC: Piping a pump's output to a building's intake will send gas to that building.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASPUMP.EFFECT:
Draws in <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> and runs it through <link="GASPIPING">Pipes</link>.

Must be immersed in <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASMINIPUMP.NAME: <link="GASMINIPUMP">Mini Gas Pump</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASMINIPUMP.DESC: Mini pumps are useful for moving small quantities of gas with minimum power.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASMINIPUMP.EFFECT:
Draws in a small amount of <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> and runs it through <link="GASPIPING">Pipes</link>.

Must be immersed in <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASVALVE.NAME: <link="GASVALVE">Gas Valve</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASVALVE.DESC: Valves control the amount of gas that moves through pipes, preventing waste.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASLOGICVALVE.NAME: <link="GASLOGICVALVE">Gas Shutoff</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASLOGICVALVE.DESC: Automated piping saves power and time by removing the need for Duplicant input.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASLOGICVALVE.EFFECT: Connects to an <link="LOGIC">Automation</link> grid to automatically turn <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> flow on or off.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASLIMITVALVE.NAME: <link="GASLIMITVALVE">Gas Meter Valve</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASLIMITVALVE.DESC: Meter Valves let an exact amount of gas pass through before shutting off.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASLIMITVALVE.EFFECT: Connects to an <link="LOGIC">Automation</link> grid to automatically turn <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> flow off when the specified amount has passed through it.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASLIMITVALVE.OUTPUT_P: Sends a Green Signal if limit has been reached
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASVENT.NAME: <link="GASVENT">Gas Vent</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASVENT.DESC: Vents are an exit point for gases from ventilation systems.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASVENTHIGHPRESSURE.DE: High pressure vents can expel gas into more highly pressurized environments.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASVENTHIGHPRESSURE.EF: Releases <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> from <link="GASPIPING">Gas Pipes</link> into high pressure locations.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASBOTTLER.NAME: <link="GASBOTTLER">Canister Filler</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASBOTTLER.DESC: Canisters allow Duplicants to manually deliver gases from place to place.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASBOTTLER.EFFECT: Automatically stores piped <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gases</link> into canisters for manual transport.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDBOTTLER.NAME: <link="LIQUIDBOTTLER">Bottle Filler</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDBOTTLER.DESC: Bottle fillers allow Duplicants to manually deliver liquids from place to place.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDBOTTLER.EFFECT: Automatically stores piped <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquids</link> into bottles for manual transport.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GENERATOR.NAME: <link="GENERATOR">Coal Generator</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GENERATOR.DESC: Burning coal produces more energy than manual power, but emits heat and exhaust.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GENETICANALYSISSTATION: Would a mutated rose still smell as sweet?
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DEVGENERATOR.NAME: Dev Generator
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DEVGENERATOR.EFFECT: Generates testing power for late nights.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DEVLIFESUPPORT.NAME: Dev Life Support
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DEVLIGHTGENERATOR.NAME: Dev Light Source
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DEVLIGHTGENERATOR.DESC: Brightens up a dev's darkest hours.
Generates on-demand radiation to keep things clear. Nu-clear.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DEVHEATER.NAME: Dev Heater
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DEVHEATER.EFFECT: Generates on-demand heat for testing toastiness.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GENERICFABRICATOR.NAME: <link="GENERICFABRICATOR">Omniprinter</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GENERICFABRICATOR.DESC: Omniprinters are incapable of printing organic matter.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GENERICFABRICATOR.EFFE: Converts <link="RAWMINERAL">Raw Mineral</link> into unique materials and objects.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GEOTUNER.NAME: <link="GEOTUNER">Geotuner</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GEOTUNER.DESC: The targeted geyser receives stored amplification data when it is erupting.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GEOTUNER.EFFECT:
Increases the <link="HEAT">Temperature</link> and output of an analyzed <link="GEYSERS">Geyser</link>.

Multiple Geotuners can be directed at a single <link="GEYSERS">Geyser</link> anywhere on an asteroid.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GEOTUNER.LOGIC_PORT_AC: Sends a Green Signal when geyser is erupting
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GRAVE.NAME: <link="GRAVE">Tasteful Memorial</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GRAVE.DESC: Burying dead Duplicants reduces health hazards and stress on the colony.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GRAVE.EFFECT:
Provides a final resting place for deceased Duplicants.

Living Duplicants will automatically place an unburied corpse inside.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HEADQUARTERS.NAME: <link="HEADQUARTERS">Printing Pod</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HEADQUARTERS.DESC: New Duplicants come out here, but thank goodness, they never go back in.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HEADQUARTERS.EFFECT:
An exceptionally advanced bioprinter of unknown origin.

It periodically produces new Duplicants or care packages containing resources.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HYDROGENGENERATOR.NAME: <link="HYDROGENGENERATOR">Hydrogen Generator</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HYDROGENGENERATOR.DESC: Hydrogen generators are extremely efficient, emitting next to no waste.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.METHANEGENERATOR.NAME: <link="METHANEGENERATOR">Natural Gas Generator</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.METHANEGENERATOR.DESC: Natural gas generators leak polluted water and are best built above a waste reservoir.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.METHANEGENERATOR.EFFEC:
Converts <link="METHANE">Natural Gas</link> into electrical <link="POWER">Power</link>.

Produces <link="CARBONDIOXIDE">Carbon Dioxide</link> and <link="DIRTYWATER">Polluted Water</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.NUCLEARREACTOR.NAME: <link="NUCLEARREACTOR">Research Reactor</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.NUCLEARREACTOR.DESC: Radbolt generators and reflectors make radiation useable by other buildings.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.NUCLEARREACTOR.EFFECT:
Uses <link="ENRICHEDURANIUM">Enriched Uranium</link> to produce <link="RADIATION">Radiation</link> for Radbolt production.

Generates a massive amount of <link="HEAT">Heat</link>. Overheating will result in an explosive meltdown.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WOODGASGENERATOR.NAME: <link="WOODGASGENERATOR">Wood Burner</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WOODGASGENERATOR.DESC: Wood burners are small and easy to maintain, but produce a fair amount of heat.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WOODGASGENERATOR.EFFEC:
Burns <link="WOOD">Wood</link> to produce electrical <link="POWER">Power</link>.

Produces <link="CARBONDIOXIDE">Carbon Dioxide</link> and <link="HEAT">Heat</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PEATGENERATOR.NAME: <link="PEATGENERATOR">Peat Burner</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PEATGENERATOR.DESC: It gives off an aroma that some Duplicants find inexplicably nostalgic.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PEATGENERATOR.EFFECT:
Burns <link="PEAT">Peat</link> to produce electrical <link="POWER">Power</link>.

Produces a small amount of <link="CARBONDIOXIDE">Carbon Dioxide</link> and <link="DIRTYWATER">Polluted Water</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PETROLEUMGENERATOR.DES: Petroleum generators have a high energy output but produce a great deal of waste.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PETROLEUMGENERATOR.EFF:
Converts <link="PETROLEUM">Petroleum</link>, <link="ETHANOL">Ethanol</link> or <link="REFINEDLIPID">Biodiesel</link> into electrical <link="POWER">Power</link>.

Produces <link="CARBONDIOXIDE">Carbon Dioxide</link> and <link="DIRTYWATER">Polluted Water</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HYDROPONICFARM.NAME: <link="HYDROPONICFARM">Hydroponic Farm</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HYDROPONICFARM.DESC: Hydroponic farms reduce Duplicant traffic by automating irrigating crops.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HYDROPONICFARM.EFFECT:
Grows one <link="PLANTS">Plant</link> from a <link="PLANTS">Seed</link>.

Can be used as floor tile and rotated before construction.

Must be irrigated through <link="LIQUIDPIPING">Liquid Piping</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.INSULATEDGASCONDUIT.DE: Pipe insulation prevents gas contents from significantly changing temperature in transit.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.INSULATEDGASCONDUIT.EF:
Carries <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> with minimal change in <link="HEAT">Temperature</link>.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCONDUITRADIANT.NAME: <link="GASCONDUITRADIANT">Radiant Gas Pipe</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCONDUITRADIANT.DESC: Radiant pipes pumping cold gas can be run through hot areas to help cool them down.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASCONDUITRADIANT.EFFE:
Carries <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link>, allowing extreme <link="HEAT">Temperature</link> exchange with the surrounding environment.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.INSULATEDLIQUIDCONDUIT: Pipe insulation prevents liquid contents from significantly changing temperature in transit.

Carries <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> with minimal change in <link="HEAT">Temperature</link>.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCONDUITRADIANT.D: Radiant pipes pumping cold liquid can be run through hot areas to help cool them down.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCONDUITRADIANT.E:
Carries <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link>, allowing extreme <link="HEAT">Temperature</link> exchange with the surrounding environment.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CONTACTCONDUCTIVEPIPEB: It can transfer heat effectively even if no liquid is passing through.

Carries <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link>, allowing extreme <link="HEAT">Temperature</link> exchange with overlapping buildings.

Can function in a vacuum.

Can be run through wall and floor tiles.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.INSULATEDWIRE.NAME: <link="INSULATEDWIRE">Insulated Wire</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.INSULATEDWIRE.DESC: This stuff won't go melting if things get heated.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.INSULATEDWIRE.EFFECT:
Connects buildings to <link="POWER">Power</link> sources in extreme <link="HEAT">Heat</link>.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.INSULATIONTILE.NAME: <link="INSULATIONTILE">Insulated Tile</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.INSULATIONTILE.DESC: The low thermal conductivity of insulated tiles slows any heat passing through them.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.INSULATIONTILE.EFFECT:
Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.

Reduces <link="HEAT">Heat</link> transfer between walls, retaining ambient heat in an area.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EXTERIORWALL.NAME: <link="EXTERIORWALL">Drywall</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EXTERIORWALL.DESC: Drywall can be used in conjunction with tiles to build airtight rooms on the surface.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EXTERIORWALL.EFFECT:
Prevents <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> and <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> loss in space.

Builds an insulating backwall behind buildings.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EXTERIORWALL.FACADES.S: A wallpaper as unique as my colony.
