BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EXTERIORWALL.FACADES.B: It's just so fresh and so clean.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EXTERIORWALL.FACADES.D: A red wallpaper with a diagonal stripe.
An orange wallpaper with a diagonal stripe.
A radiation-free wallpaper with a diagonal stripe.
A slippery wallpaper with a diagonal stripe.
A damp wallpaper with a diagonal stripe.
A pink wallpaper with a diagonal stripe.
A sleek wallpaper with a diagonal stripe.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EXTERIORWALL.FACADES.C: It can be arranged into giant red polka dots.
It can be arranged into giant orange polka dots.
A radiation-free pattern that can be arranged into giant polka dots.
It can be arranged into giant green polka dots.
It can be arranged into giant blue polka dots.
It can be arranged into giant pink polka dots.
It can be arranged into giant shadowy polka dots.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EXTERIORWALL.FACADES.B: It doesn't cure the blues, so much as emphasize them.
It's cheaper than having a garden.
Less fruit-forward, but just as fresh.
A bold statement, for bold Duplicants.
It really spices up dull walls.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EXTERIORWALL.FACADES.S: Adds some much-needed zest to the room.
Fruity freckles for naturally sweet spaces.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EXTERIORWALL.FACADES.W: Far more practical than gluing real fruit on a wall.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EXTERIORWALL.FACADES.T: The original scratch-and-sniff version was immediately recalled.
Softly undulating lines create an undeniable air of loo-xury.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EXTERIORWALL.FACADES.S: Thick stripes in alternating shades of blue.
Inspired by the ties worn during intraoffice sports.
A stripe that curves to the right.
Every tile feels like four tiles!
Any brighter, and they'd be radioactive!
Now with real simulated algae color!
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EXTERIORWALL.FACADES.P: It's futuristic, so it must be good.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EXTERIORWALL.FACADES.S: Vertical stripes make it quite obvious when nearby objects are askew.
Some describe this color as "squashed bug."
It's pronounced "peeyoo-ss," a sound that Duplicants just can't seem to reproduce.
The kind of green that makes one feel slightly nauseated.
Diagonal stripes in alternating shades of mush bar.
This wallpaper, like this colony's journey, is full of twists and turns.
Vertical stripes make it quite obvious when nearby objects are askew.
Diagonal stripes in alternating shades of yellow.
This wallpaper, like this colony's journey, is full of twists and turns.
Vertical stripes make it quite obvious when nearby objects are askew.
Diagonal stripes in alternating shades of purple.
This wallpaper, like this colony's journey, is full of twists and turns.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EXTERIORWALL.FACADES.F: A fun blue print in honor of information storage.
A chic black-and-white print in honor of information storage.
A fun green print in honor of information storage.
A fun orange print in honor of information storage.
A fun red print in honor of information storage.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EXTERIORWALL.FACADES.O: If the liquids never hit the floor, is it really a spill?
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EXTERIORWALL.FACADES.P: There are no mistakes, only cheerful little splotches.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.EXTERIORWALL.FACADES.T: A crisp black 'O' on a clean white background. Ideal for monochromatic games rooms.
A crisp black 'X' on a clean white background. Ideal for monochromatic games rooms.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FARMTILE.NAME: <link="FARMTILE">Farm Tile</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FARMTILE.DESC: Duplicants can deliver fertilizer and liquids to farm tiles, accelerating plant growth.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FARMTILE.EFFECT:
Grows one <link="PLANTS">Plant</link> from a <link="PLANTS">Seed</link>.

Can be used as floor tile and rotated before construction.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LADDER.NAME: <link="LADDER">Ladder</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LADDERFAST.NAME: <link="LADDERFAST">Plastic Ladder</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LADDERFAST.DESC: Plastic ladders are mildly antiseptic and can help limit the spread of germs in a colony.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCONDUIT.NAME: <link="LIQUIDCONDUIT">Liquid Pipe</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCONDUIT.DESC: Liquid pipes are used to connect the inputs and outputs of plumbed buildings.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCONDUIT.EFFECT:
Carries <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> between <link="LIQUIDPIPING">Outputs</link> and <link="LIQUIDPIPING">Intakes</link>.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCONDUITBRIDGE.DE: Separate pipe systems help prevent building damage caused by mingled pipe contents.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCONDUITBRIDGE.EF:
Runs one <link="LIQUIDPIPING">Liquid Pipe</link> section over another without joining them.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ICECOOLEDFAN.NAME: <link="ICECOOLEDFAN">Ice-E Fan</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ICECOOLEDFAN.DESC: A Duplicant can work an Ice-E fan to temporarily cool small areas as needed.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ICECOOLEDFAN.EFFECT: Uses <link="ICEORE">Ice</link> to dissipate a small amount of the <link="HEAT">Heat</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ICEMACHINE.NAME: <link="ICEMACHINE">Ice Maker</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ICEMACHINE.DESC: Ice makers can be used as a small renewable source of ice and snow.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCOOLEDFAN.NAME: <link="LIQUIDCOOLEDFAN">Hydrofan</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCOOLEDFAN.DESC: A Duplicant can work a hydrofan to temporarily cool small areas as needed.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDCOOLEDFAN.EFFECT: Dissipates a small amount of the <link="HEAT">Heat</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CREATURETRAP.NAME: <link="CREATURETRAP">Critter Trap</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CREATURETRAP.DESC: Critter traps cannot catch swimming or flying critters.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CREATURETRAP.EFFECT:
Captures a living <link="CREATURES">Critter</link> for transport.

Single use.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CREATUREGROUNDTRAP.DES: It's designed for land critters, but flopping fish sometimes find their way in too.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CREATUREGROUNDTRAP.EFF:
Captures a living <link="CREATURES">Critter</link> for transport.

Only Duplicants with the <link="RANCHING1">Critter Ranching I</link> skill can arm this trap. It's reusable!
Duplicants automatically bring captured critters to these relocation points for release.

Releases trapped <link="CREATURES">Critters</link> back into the world.

Can be used multiple times.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CRITTERPICKUP.NAME: <link="CRITTERPICKUP">Critter Pick-Up</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CRITTERPICKUP.DESC: Duplicants will automatically wrangle excess critters.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CRITTERPICKUP.EFFECT:
Ensures the prompt relocation of <link="CREATURES">Critters</link> that exceed the maximum amount set.

Monitoring and pick-up are limited to the specified species.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CRITTERDROPOFF.NAME: <link="CRITTERDROPOFF">Critter Drop-Off</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CRITTERDROPOFF.DESC: Duplicants automatically bring captured critters to these relocation points for release.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CRITTERDROPOFF.EFFECT:
Releases trapped <link="CREATURES">Critters</link> back into the world.

Monitoring and drop-off are limited to the specified species.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDFILTER.NAME: <link="LIQUIDFILTER">Liquid Filter</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDFILTER.DESC: All liquids are sent into the building's output pipe, except the liquid chosen for filtering.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDFILTER.EFFECT:
Sieves one <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> out of a mix, sending it into a dedicated <link="LIQUIDPIPING">Filtered Output Pipe</link>.

Can only filter one liquid type at a time.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DEVPUMPLIQUID.NAME: Dev Pump Liquid
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DEVPUMPLIQUID.DESC: Piping a pump's output to a building's intake will send liquid to that building.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DEVPUMPLIQUID.EFFECT:
Draws in <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> and runs it through <link="LIQUIDPIPING">Pipes</link>.

Must be submerged in <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDPUMP.NAME: <link="LIQUIDPUMP">Liquid Pump</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDPUMP.DESC: Piping a pump's output to a building's intake will send liquid to that building.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDPUMP.EFFECT:
Draws in <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> and runs it through <link="LIQUIDPIPING">Pipes</link>.

Must be submerged in <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDMINIPUMP.NAME: <link="LIQUIDMINIPUMP">Mini Liquid Pump</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDMINIPUMP.DESC: Mini pumps are useful for moving small quantities of liquid with minimum power.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDMINIPUMP.EFFECT:
Draws in a small amount of <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> and runs it through <link="LIQUIDPIPING">Pipes</link>.

Must be submerged in <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDPUMPINGSTATION.D: Pitcher pumps allow Duplicants to bottle and deliver liquids from place to place.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDPUMPINGSTATION.E:
Manually pumps <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> into bottles for transport.

Duplicants can only carry liquids that are bottled.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDVALVE.NAME: <link="LIQUIDVALVE">Liquid Valve</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDVALVE.DESC: Valves control the amount of liquid that moves through pipes, preventing waste.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDLOGICVALVE.NAME: <link="LIQUIDLOGICVALVE">Liquid Shutoff</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDLOGICVALVE.DESC: Automated piping saves power and time by removing the need for Duplicant input.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDLOGICVALVE.EFFEC: Connects to an <link="LOGIC">Automation</link> grid to automatically turn <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> flow on or off.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDLIMITVALVE.NAME: <link="LIQUIDLIMITVALVE">Liquid Meter Valve</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDLIMITVALVE.DESC: Meter Valves let an exact amount of liquid pass through before shutting off.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDLIMITVALVE.EFFEC: Connects to an <link="LOGIC">Automation</link> grid to automatically turn <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> flow off when the specified amount has passed through it.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDLIMITVALVE.OUTPU: Sends a Green Signal if limit has been reached
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDVENT.NAME: <link="LIQUIDVENT">Liquid Vent</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDVENT.DESC: Vents are an exit point for liquids from plumbing systems.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MANUALGENERATOR.NAME: <link="MANUALGENERATOR">Manual Generator</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MANUALGENERATOR.DESC: Watching Duplicants run on it is adorable... the electrical power is just an added bonus.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MANUALPRESSUREDOOR.DES: Airlocks can quarter off dangerous areas and prevent gases from seeping into the colony.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MANUALPRESSUREDOOR.EFF:
Blocks <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> and <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> flow, maintaining pressure between areas.

Wild <link="CREATURES">Critters</link> cannot pass through doors.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MESHTILE.NAME: <link="MESHTILE">Mesh Tile</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MESHTILE.DESC: Mesh tile can be used to make Duplicant pathways in areas where liquid flows.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MESHTILE.EFFECT:
Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.

Does not obstruct <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> or <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> flow.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PLASTICTILE.NAME: <link="PLASTICTILE">Plastic Tile</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PLASTICTILE.DESC: Plastic tile is mildly antiseptic and can help limit the spread of germs in a colony.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PLASTICTILE.EFFECT:
Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.

Significantly increases Duplicant runspeed.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GLASSTILE.NAME: <link="GLASSTILE">Window Tile</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GLASSTILE.DESC: Window tiles provide a barrier against liquid and gas and are completely transparent.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GLASSTILE.EFFECT:
Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.

Allows <link="LIGHT">Light</link> and <link="DECOR">Decor</link> to pass through.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.METALTILE.NAME: <link="METALTILE">Metal Tile</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.METALTILE.DESC: Heat travels much more quickly through metal tile than other types of flooring.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.METALTILE.EFFECT:
Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.

Significantly increases Duplicant runspeed.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BUNKERTILE.NAME: <link="BUNKERTILE">Bunker Tile</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BUNKERTILE.DESC: Bunker tile can build strong shelters in otherwise dangerous environments.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BUNKERTILE.EFFECT:
Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.

Can withstand extreme pressures and impacts.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STORAGETILE.NAME: <link="STORAGETILE">Storage Tile</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STORAGETILE.DESC: Storage tiles keep selected non-edible solids out of the way.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STORAGETILE.EFFECT:
Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.

Provides built-in storage for small spaces.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CARPETTILE.NAME: <link="CARPETTILE">Carpeted Tile</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CARPETTILE.EFFECT:
Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.

Increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MOULDINGTILE.NAME: <link="MOUDLINGTILE">Trimming Tile</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MOULDINGTILE.DESC: Trimming is used as purely decorative lining for walls and structures.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MOULDINGTILE.EFFECT:
Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.

Increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MONUMENTBOTTOM.NAME: <link="MONUMENTBOTTOM">Monument Base</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MONUMENTBOTTOM.DESC: The base of a monument must be constructed first.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MONUMENTBOTTOM.EFFECT:
Builds the bottom section of a Great Monument.

Can be customized.

A Great Monument must be built to achieve the Colonize Imperative.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MONUMENTBOTTOM.FACADES: One knee tucked toward the other.
Atop a pair of conquered critters.
One must give the soul time to truly hatch.
In honor of the sugar engine.
Riding a carbon dioxide rocket engine to glory.
Atop a small petroleum rocket engine.
Atop a solo spacefarer rocket nosecone.
Atop a happy lil' Sweepy bot.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MONUMENTMIDDLE.NAME: <link="MONUMENTMIDDLE">Monument Midsection</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MONUMENTMIDDLE.DESC: Customized sections of a Great Monument can be mixed and matched.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MONUMENTMIDDLE.EFFECT:
Builds the middle section of a Great Monument.

Can be customized.

A Great Monument must be built to achieve the Colonize Imperative.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MONUMENTMIDDLE.FACADES: Makes the torso seem bigger and more intimidating than it is.
Sometimes things are good enough just as they are.
Hands hover slightly away from the body, as though raised in wonder.
Cradling a couple of smooth lil' critter babies.
An armful of chonky lil' critter babies.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MONUMENTTOP.NAME: <link="MONUMENTTOP">Monument Top</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MONUMENTTOP.DESC: Building a Great Monument will declare to the universe that this hunk of rock is your own.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MONUMENTTOP.EFFECT:
Builds the top section of a Great Monument.

Can be customized.

A Great Monument must be built to achieve the Colonize Imperative.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MONUMENTTOP.FACADES.OP: A massive replica of Leira's smiling face.
A massive replica of Gossmann's determined gaze.
A massive replica of Nikola's post-explosion expression.
A massive replica of Burt's critter-spotting expression.
A massive replica of Rowan's serene smile.
A massive replica of Nisbet when she sees someone whose name she's forgotten.
A massive replica of Ashkan's fossil-discovering expression.
A massive replica of Ren's smoochy face.
A great-monument-sized Gassy Moo. Gassier and moo-ier than ever.
A great-monument-sized Plug Slug. Does not require a power source.
It has no mouth, but still looks like it's smiling.
A visual reminder about radiation safety.
A cautionary tale for careless Duplicants.
Excellent choice of decor for the entrance to highly radioactive site.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MICROBEMUSHER.NAME: <link="MICROBEMUSHER">Microbe Musher</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MICROBEMUSHER.DESC: Musher recipes will keep Duplicants fed, but may impact health and morale over time.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MICROBEMUSHER.EFFECT:
Produces low quality <link="FOOD">Food</link> using common ingredients.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
Musher recipes will keep Duplicants fed, but may impact health and morale over time.
A colorful distraction from the actual quality of the food.
Makes meals that are memorable for all the wrong reasons.
Hunger strikes are not an option, but color-coordination is.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MINERALDEOXIDIZER.NAME: <link="MINERALDEOXIDIZER">Oxygen Diffuser</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MINERALDEOXIDIZER.DESC: Oxygen diffusers are inefficient, but output enough oxygen to keep a colony breathing.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MINERALDEOXIDIZER.EFFE:
Converts large amounts of <link="ALGAE">Algae</link> into <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link>.

Becomes idle when the area reaches maximum pressure capacity.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUBLIMATIONSTATION.DES: Sublimation is the sublime process by which solids convert directly into gas.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUBLIMATIONSTATION.EFF:
Speeds up the conversion of <link="TOXICSAND">Polluted Dirt</link> into <link="CONTAMINATEDOXYGEN">Polluted Oxygen</link>.

Becomes idle when the area reaches maximum pressure capacity.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WOODTILE.NAME: Wood Tile
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WOODTILE.DESC: Rooms built with wood tile are cozy and pleasant.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WOODTILE.EFFECT:
Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.

Provides good insulation and boosts <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SNOWTILE.NAME: Snow Tile
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SNOWTILE.DESC: Snow tiles have low thermal conductivity, but will melt if temperatures get too high.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SNOWTILE.EFFECT:
Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.

Insulates rooms to reduce <link="HEAT">Heat</link> loss in cold climates.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CAMPFIRE.NAME: <link="CAMPFIRE">Wood Heater</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CAMPFIRE.DESC: Wood heaters dry out soggy feet and help Duplicants forget how cold they are.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CAMPFIRE.EFFECT: Consumes <link="WOOD">Wood</link> in order to <link="HEAT">Heat</link> chilly surroundings.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ICEKETTLE.NAME: <link="ICEKETTLE">Ice Liquefier</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ICEKETTLE.DESC: The water never gets hot enough to burn the tongue.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ICEKETTLE.EFFECT: Consumes <link="WOOD">Wood</link> to melt <link="ICE">Ice</link> into <link="WATER">Water</link>, which can be bottled for transport.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WOODSTORAGE.NAME: Wood Pile
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WOODSTORAGE.DESC: Once it's empty, there's no use pining for more.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WOODSTORAGE.EFFECT: Stores a finite supply of <link="WOOD">Wood</link>, which can be used for construction or to produce <link="HEAT">Heat</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DLC2POITECHUNLOCKS.DES:
A functional research decrypter with one transmission remaining.

It was designed to support colony survival.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DLC4POITECHUNLOCKS.DES:
A functional research decrypter with one transmission remaining.

It was designed to support colony survival.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DEEPFRYER.NAME: <link="DEEPFRYER">Deep Fryer</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DEEPFRYER.DESC: Everything tastes better when it's deep-fried.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DEEPFRYER.EFFECT:
Uses <link="TALLOW">Tallow</link> to cook a wide variety of improved <link="FOOD">Foods</link>.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
This building must be in a Kitchen before it can be used
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ORESCRUBBER.NAME: <link="ORESCRUBBER">Ore Scrubber</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ORESCRUBBER.DESC: Scrubbers sanitize freshly mined materials before they're brought into the colony.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ORESCRUBBER.EFFECT: Kills a significant amount of <link="DISEASE">Germs</link> present on <link="RAWMINERAL">Raw Ore</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OUTHOUSE.NAME: <link="OUTHOUSE">Outhouse</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OUTHOUSE.DESC: The colony that eats together, excretes together.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OUTHOUSE.EFFECT:
Gives Duplicants a place to relieve themselves.

Requires no <link="LIQUIDPIPING">Piping</link>.

Must be periodically emptied of <link="TOXICSAND">Polluted Dirt</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.APOTHECARY.NAME: <link="APOTHECARY">Apothecary</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.APOTHECARY.DESC: Some medications help prevent diseases, while others aim to alleviate existing illness.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.APOTHECARY.EFFECT:
Produces <link="MEDICINE">Medicine</link> to cure most basic <link="DISEASE">Diseases</link>.

Duplicants must possess the Medicine Compounding <link="ROLES">Skill</link> to fabricate medicines.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ADVANCEDAPOTHECARY.DES: Some medications help prevent diseases, while others aim to alleviate existing illness.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ADVANCEDAPOTHECARY.EFF:
Produces <link="MEDICINE">Medicine</link> to cure most basic <link="DISEASE">Diseases</link>.

Duplicants must possess the Medicine Compounding <link="ROLES">Skill</link> to fabricate medicines.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PLANTERBOX.NAME: <link="PLANTERBOX">Planter Box</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PLANTERBOX.DESC: Domestically grown seeds mature more quickly than wild plants.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PLANTERBOX.FACADES.DEF: Domestically grown seeds mature more quickly than wild plants.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PLANTERBOX.FACADES.BRI: The interior is lined with tiny barbs.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PLANTERBOX.FACADES.SLE: The thick paint drips are invisible from a distance.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PLANTERBOX.FACADES.SAL: It's not exactly a subtle color.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PRESSUREDOOR.NAME: <link="PRESSUREDOOR">Mechanized Airlock</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PRESSUREDOOR.DESC: Mechanized airlocks open and close more quickly than other types of door.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PRESSUREDOOR.EFFECT:
Blocks <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> and <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> flow, maintaining pressure between areas.

Functions as a <link="MANUALPRESSUREDOOR">Manual Airlock</link> when no <link="POWER">Power</link> is available.

Wild <link="CREATURES">Critters</link> cannot pass through doors.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BUNKERDOOR.NAME: <link="BUNKERDOOR">Bunker Door</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BUNKERDOOR.DESC: A massive, slow-moving door which is nearly indestructible.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.BUNKERDOOR.EFFECT:
Blocks <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> and <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> flow, maintaining pressure between areas.

Can withstand extremely high pressures and impacts.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RATIONBOX.NAME: <link="RATIONBOX">Ration Box</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RATIONBOX.DESC: Ration boxes keep food safe from hungry critters, but don't slow food spoilage.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RATIONBOX.EFFECT:
Stores a small amount of <link="FOOD">Food</link>.

Food must be delivered to boxes by Duplicants.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PARKSIGN.NAME: <link="PARKSIGN">Park Sign</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PARKSIGN.DESC: Passing through parks will increase Duplicant Morale.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PARKSIGN.EFFECT: Classifies an area as a Park or Nature Reserve.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RADIATIONLIGHT.NAME: <link="RADIATIONLIGHT">Radiation Lamp</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RADIATIONLIGHT.DESC: Duplicants can become sick if exposed to radiation without protection.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RADIATIONLIGHT.EFFECT: Emits <link="RADIATION">Radiation</link> when <link="POWER">Powered</link> that can be collected by a <link="HIGHENERGYPARTICLESPAWNER">Radbolt Generator</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.REFRIGERATOR.NAME: <link="REFRIGERATOR">Refrigerator</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.REFRIGERATOR.DESC: Food spoilage can be slowed by ambient conditions as well as by refrigerators.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.REFRIGERATOR.EFFECT: Stores <link="FOOD">Food</link> at an ideal <link="HEAT">Temperature</link> to prevent spoilage.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.REFRIGERATOR.FACADES.D: Food spoilage can be slowed by ambient conditions as well as by refrigerators.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.REFRIGERATOR.FACADES.S: Bold on the outside, cold on the inside!
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.REFRIGERATOR.FACADES.B: For food so cold, it brings a tear to the eye.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.REFRIGERATOR.FACADES.G: Honestly, this hue is particularly chilling.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.REFRIGERATOR.FACADES.R: Inspired by the Duplicant poem, "Pretty in Puce."
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.REFRIGERATOR.FACADES.Y: Some Duplicants call it "sunny" yellow, but only because they've never seen the sun.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.REFRIGERATOR.FACADES.P: This fridge makes color-coordination a (cold) snap.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROLESTATION.NAME: <link="ROLESTATION">Skills Board</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROLESTATION.DESC: A skills board can teach special skills to Duplicants they can't learn on their own.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROLESTATION.EFFECT: Allows Duplicants to spend Skill Points to learn new <link="JOBS">Skills</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RESETSKILLSSTATION.DES: Erase skills from a Duplicant's mind, returning them to their default abilities.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RESETSKILLSSTATION.EFF:
Refunds a Duplicant's Skill Points for reassignment.

Duplicants will lose all assigned skills in the process.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RESEARCHCENTER.NAME: <link="RESEARCHCENTER">Research Station</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RESEARCHCENTER.DESC: Research stations are necessary for unlocking all research tiers.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RESEARCHCENTER.EFFECT:
Conducts <link="RESEARCH">Novice Research</link> to unlock new technologies.

Consumes <link="DIRT">Dirt</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ADVANCEDRESEARCHCENTER: Super computers unlock higher technology tiers than research stations alone.

Conducts <link="RESEARCH">Advanced Research</link> to unlock new technologies.

Consumes <link="WATER">Water</link>.

Assigned Duplicants must possess the <link="RESEARCHING1">Advanced Research</link> skill.
Comes with a few ions thrown in, free of charge.

Conducts <link="RESEARCHDLC1">Materials Science Research</link> to unlock new technologies.

Consumes Radbolts.

Assigned Duplicants must possess the <link="ATOMICRESEARCH">Applied Sciences Research</link> skill.
Orbital Data Collection Labs record data while orbiting a Planetoid and write it to a <link="ORBITALRESEARCHDATABANK">Data Bank</link>.

Creates <link="ORBITALRESEARCHDATABANK">Data Banks</link> that can be consumed at a <link="DLC1COSMICRESEARCHCENTER">Virtual Planetarium</link> to unlock new technologies.

Consumes <link="POLYPROPYLENE">Plastic</link> and <link="POWER">Power</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.COSMICRESEARCHCENTER.D: Planetariums allow the simulated exploration of locations discovered with a telescope.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.COSMICRESEARCHCENTER.E:
Conducts <link="RESEARCH">Interstellar Research</link> to unlock new technologies.

Consumes data from <link="RESEARCHMODULE">Research Modules</link>.

Assigned Duplicants must possess the <link="ASTRONOMY">Astronomy</link> skill.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DLC1COSMICRESEARCHCENT: Planetariums allow the simulated exploration of locations recorded in <link="ORBITALRESEARCHDATABANK">Data Banks</link>.

Conducts <link="RESEARCH">Data Analysis Research</link> to unlock new technologies.

Consumes <link="ORBITALRESEARCHDATABANK">Data Banks</link> generated by exploration.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TELESCOPE.NAME: <link="TELESCOPE">Telescope</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TELESCOPE.DESC: Telescopes are necessary for learning starmaps and conducting rocket missions.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TELESCOPE.EFFECT:
Maps Starmap destinations.

Assigned Duplicants must possess the <link="RESEARCHING2">Field Research</link> skill.

Building must be exposed to space to function.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TELESCOPE.REQUIREMENT_: A steady {0} supply is required to sustain working Duplicants.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CLUSTERTELESCOPE.NAME: <link="CLUSTERTELESCOPE">Telescope</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CLUSTERTELESCOPE.DESC: Telescopes are necessary for studying space, allowing rocket travel to other worlds.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CLUSTERTELESCOPE.EFFEC:
Reveals visitable Planetoids in space.

Assigned Duplicants must possess the <link="ASTRONOMY">Astronomy</link> skill.

Building must be exposed to space to function.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CLUSTERTELESCOPE.REQUI: A steady {0} supply is required to sustain working Duplicants.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CLUSTERTELESCOPEENCLOS: Telescopes are necessary for studying space, allowing rocket travel to other worlds.

Reveals visitable Planetoids in space... in comfort!

Assigned Duplicants must possess the <link="ASTRONOMY">Astronomy</link> skill.

Excellent sunburn protection (100%), partial <link="RADIATION">Radiation</link> protection (50%) .

Building must be exposed to space to function.
A steady {0} supply is required to sustain working Duplicants.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MISSIONCONTROL.NAME: <link="MISSIONCONTROL">Mission Control Station</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MISSIONCONTROL.DESC: Like a backseat driver who actually does know better.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MISSIONCONTROL.EFFECT:
Provides guidance data to rocket pilots, to improve rocket speed.

Must be operated by a Duplicant with the <link="ASTRONOMY">Astronomy</link> skill.

Requires a clear line of sight to space in order to function.
Like a backseat driver who actually does know better.

Provides guidance data to rocket pilots within range, to improve rocket speed.

Must be operated by a Duplicant with the <link="ASTRONOMY">Astronomy</link> skill.

Requires a clear line of sight to space in order to function.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SCULPTURE.NAME: <link="SCULPTURE">Large Sculpting Block</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SCULPTURE.DESC: Duplicants who have learned art skills can produce more decorative sculptures.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SCULPTURE.EFFECT:
Moderately increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be sculpted by a Duplicant.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SCULPTURE.FACADES.SCUL: Ode to the bow and arrow, love's equivalent to a mining gun...but for hearts.
A masterful portrayal of an athlete who's been banned from the communal kitchen.
A masterful portrayal of a slingshot-wielding hero.
A masterful portrayal of a gentle, plant-tending critter.
A masterful portrayal of a scientist lost in thought.
No amount of material success will ever fill the void within.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ICESCULPTURE.NAME: <link="ICESCULPTURE">Ice Block</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ICESCULPTURE.EFFECT:
Majorly increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be sculpted by a Duplicant.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ICESCULPTURE.FACADES.I: It's structurally unsound, but otherwise not entirely terrible.
These incisors are the stuff of dental legend.
A charming depiction of the mighty Pokeshell in mid-rampage.
Some aquarists posit that Pacus are the original creators of the game now known as "Tag."
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MARBLESCULPTURE.NAME: <link="MARBLESCULPTURE">Marble Block</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MARBLESCULPTURE.DESC: Duplicants who have learned art skills can produce more decorative sculptures.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MARBLESCULPTURE.EFFECT:
Majorly increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be sculpted by a Duplicant.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MARBLESCULPTURE.FACADE: The artist was a very fungi.
She's not afraid to take up space.
The artist took great pleasure in conveying their displeasure.
A masterful celebration of one of the universe's most mysterious - and flatulent - organisms.
A masterful celebration of the deep bond between a horticulturalist and her prize Bristle Blossom.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.METALSCULPTURE.NAME: <link="METALSCULPTURE">Metal Block</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.METALSCULPTURE.DESC: Duplicants who have learned art skills can produce more decorative sculptures.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.METALSCULPTURE.EFFECT:
Majorly increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be sculpted by a Duplicant.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.METALSCULPTURE.FACADES: Actually, it's a very good likeness.
The Morb's eye is mounted on a swivel that activates at random intervals.
It's quite lovely, until someone stubs their toe on it in the dark.
Not quite expressionist, but undeniably expressive.
It emits no light, but it sure does brighten up a room.
A masterful likeness of the mischievous critter that Duplicants love to love.
What if the entire head is one big bump?
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SMALLSCULPTURE.NAME: <link="SMALLSCULPTURE">Sculpting Block</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SMALLSCULPTURE.DESC: Duplicants who have learned art skills can produce more decorative sculptures.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SMALLSCULPTURE.EFFECT:
Minorly increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be sculpted by a Duplicant.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SMALLSCULPTURE.FACADES: It must be a moon, because there are no bananas in space.
A masterful celebration of the Sweepy's unbeatable work ethic and cheerful, can-clean attitude.
A three-dimensional rebellion against the rules of Euclidean space.
Tribute to the artist's friend, who once attempted to catch a meteor with their bare hands.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WOODSCULPTURE.NAME: <link="WOODSCULPTURE">Wood Block</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WOODSCULPTURE.DESC: A great fit for smaller spaces.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WOODSCULPTURE.EFFECT:
Moderately increases <link="DECOR">Decor</link>, contributing to <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

Must be sculpted by a Duplicant.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SHEARINGSTATION.NAME: <link="SHEARINGSTATION">Shearing Station</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SHEARINGSTATION.DESC: Those critters aren't gonna shear themselves.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SHEARINGSTATION.EFFECT:
Shearing stations allow eligible <link="CREATURES">Critters</link> to be safely sheared for useful raw materials.

Visiting this building restores <link="CREATURES">Critters'</link> physical and emotional well-being.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXYGENMASKSTATION.NAME: <link="OXYGENMASKSTATION">Oxygen Mask Station</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXYGENMASKSTATION.DESC: Duplicants can't pass by a station if it lacks enough oxygen to fill a mask.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXYGENMASKSTATION.EFFE:
Uses designated <link="METAL">Metal Ores</link> from filter settings to create <link="OXYGENMASK">Oxygen Masks</link>.

Automatically draws in ambient <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link> to fill masks.

Marks a threshold where Duplicants must put on or take off a mask.

Can be rotated before construction.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SWEEPBOTSTATION.NAME: <link="SWEEPBOTSTATION">Sweepy's Dock</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SWEEPBOTSTATION.DESC: The cute little face comes pre-installed.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SWEEPBOTSTATION.EFFECT:
Deploys an automated <link="SWEEPBOT">Sweepy Bot</link> to sweep up <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> debris and <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> spills.

Dock stores <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquids</link> and <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solids</link> gathered by the Sweepy.

Uses <link="POWER">Power</link> to recharge the Sweepy.

Duplicants will empty Dock storage into available storage bins.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXYGENMASKMARKER.NAME: <link="OXYGENMASKMARKER">Oxygen Mask Checkpoint</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXYGENMASKMARKER.DESC: A checkpoint must have a correlating dock built on the opposite side its arrow faces.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXYGENMASKMARKER.EFFEC:
Marks a threshold where Duplicants must put on or take off an <link="OXYGENMASK">Oxygen Mask</link>.

Must be built next to an <link="OXYGENMASKLOCKER">Oxygen Mask Dock</link>.

Can be rotated before construction.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXYGENMASKLOCKER.NAME: <link="OXYGENMASKLOCKER">Oxygen Mask Dock</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXYGENMASKLOCKER.DESC: An oxygen mask dock will store and refill masks while they're not in use.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OXYGENMASKLOCKER.EFFEC:
Stores <link="OXYGENMASK">Oxygen Masks</link> and refuels them with <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link>.

Build next to an <link="OXYGENMASKMARKER">Oxygen Mask Checkpoint</link> to make Duplicants put on masks when passing by.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUITMARKER.NAME: <link="SUITMARKER">Atmo Suit Checkpoint</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUITMARKER.DESC: A checkpoint must have a correlating dock built on the opposite side its arrow faces.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUITMARKER.EFFECT:
Marks a threshold where Duplicants must change into or out of <link="ATMOSUIT">Atmo Suits</link>.

Must be built next to an <link="SUITLOCKER">Atmo Suit Dock</link>.

Can be rotated before construction.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUITLOCKER.NAME: <link="SUITLOCKER">Atmo Suit Dock</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUITLOCKER.DESC: An atmo suit dock will empty atmo suits of waste, but only one suit can charge at a time.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUITLOCKER.EFFECT:
Stores <link="ATMOSUIT">Atmo Suits</link> and refuels them with <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link>.

Empties suits of <link="DIRTYWATER">Polluted Water</link>.

Build next to an <link="SUITMARKER">Atmo Suit Checkpoint</link> to make Duplicants change into suits when passing by.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.JETSUITMARKER.NAME: <link="JETSUITMARKER">Jet Suit Checkpoint</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.JETSUITMARKER.DESC: A checkpoint must have a correlating dock built on the opposite side its arrow faces.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.JETSUITMARKER.EFFECT:
Marks a threshold where Duplicants must change into or out of <link="JETSUIT">Jet Suits</link>.

Must be built next to a <link="JETSUITLOCKER">Jet Suit Dock</link>.

Can be rotated before construction.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.JETSUITLOCKER.NAME: <link="JETSUITLOCKER">Jet Suit Dock</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.JETSUITLOCKER.DESC: Jet suit docks can refill jet suits with air and fuel, or empty them of waste.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.JETSUITLOCKER.EFFECT:
Stores <link="JETSUIT">Jet Suits</link> and refuels them with <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link> and <link="PETROLEUM">Petroleum</link>.

Empties suits of <link="DIRTYWATER">Polluted Water</link>.

Build next to a <link="JETSUITMARKER">Jet Suit Checkpoint</link> to make Duplicants change into suits when passing by.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LEADSUITMARKER.NAME: <link="LEADSUITMARKER">Lead Suit Checkpoint</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LEADSUITMARKER.DESC: A checkpoint must have a correlating dock built on the opposite side its arrow faces.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LEADSUITMARKER.EFFECT:
Marks a threshold where Duplicants must change into or out of <link="LEADSUIT">Lead Suits</link>.

Must be built next to a <link="LEADSUITLOCKER">Lead Suit Dock</link>

Can be rotated before construction.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LEADSUITLOCKER.NAME: <link="LEADSUITLOCKER">Lead Suit Dock</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LEADSUITLOCKER.DESC: Lead suit docks can refill lead suits with air and empty them of waste.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LEADSUITLOCKER.EFFECT:
Stores <link="LEADSUIT">Lead Suits</link> and refuels them with <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link>.

Empties suits of <link="DIRTYWATER">Polluted Water</link>.

Build next to a <link="LEADSUITMARKER">Lead Suit Checkpoint</link> to make Duplicants change into suits when passing by.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CRAFTINGTABLE.NAME: <link="CRAFTINGTABLE">Crafting Station</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CRAFTINGTABLE.DESC: Crafting stations allow Duplicants to make oxygen masks to wear in low breathability areas.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CRAFTINGTABLE.EFFECT:
Produces items and equipment for Duplicant use.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
Soldering stations allow Duplicants to build helpful Flydo retriever bots.

Produces advanced electronics and bionic <link="BIONICUPGRADE">Boosters</link>.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
My colony has no Bionic Duplicants with this booster assigned
My colony has {0} Bionic Duplicant(s) with this booster assigned
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DATAMINER.NAME: <link="DATAMINER">Data Miner</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DATAMINER.DESC: Data banks can also be used to program robo-pilot rocket modules.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DATAMINER.EFFECT:
Mass-produces <link="DATABANK">Data Banks</link> that can be processed into <link="RESEARCH">Interstellar Research</link> points.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.REMOTEWORKTERMINAL.DES: Remote controllers cut down on colony commute times.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.REMOTEWORKTERMINAL.EFF: Enables Duplicants to operate machinery remotely via a connected <link="REMOTEWORKERDOCK">Remote Worker Dock</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.REMOTEWORKERDOCK.NAME: <link="REMOTEWORKERDOCK">Remote Worker Dock</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.REMOTEWORKERDOCK.EFFEC:
<link="REMOTEWORKERDOCK">Remote Worker Docks</link> deploy automatons that operate machinery based on instructions received from a connected <link="REMOTEWORKTERMINAL">Remote Controller</link>.

Must be placed within range of its target building.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUITFABRICATOR.NAME: <link="SUITFABRICATOR">Exosuit Forge</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUITFABRICATOR.DESC: Exosuits can be filled with oxygen to allow Duplicants to safely enter hazardous areas.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SUITFABRICATOR.EFFECT:
Forges protective <link="EQUIPMENT">Exosuits</link> for Duplicants to wear.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CLOTHINGALTERATIONSTAT: Allows skilled Duplicants to add extra personal pizzazz to their wardrobe.

Upgrades <link="FUNKYVEST">Snazzy Suits</link> into <link="CUSTOMCLOTHING">Primo Garb</link>.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CLOTHINGFABRICATOR.DES: A textile loom can be used to spin Reed Fiber into wearable Duplicant clothing.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CLOTHINGFABRICATOR.EFF:
Tailors Duplicant <link="EQUIPMENT">Clothing</link> items.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLIDBOOSTER.NAME: <link="SOLIDBOOSTER">Solid Fuel Thruster</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLIDBOOSTER.DESC: Additional thrusters allow rockets to reach far away space destinations.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLIDBOOSTER.EFFECT: Burns <link="IRON">Iron</link> and <link="OXYROCK">Oxylite</link> to increase rocket exploration distance.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SPACEHEATER.NAME: <link="SPACEHEATER">Space Heater</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SPACEHEATER.DESC: Space heaters are a welcome cure for cold, soggy feet.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SPACEHEATER.EFFECT:
Radiates a moderate amount of <link="HEAT">Heat</link>.

Requires <link="POWER">Power</link> in order to function.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SPICEGRINDER.NAME: <link="SPICEGRINDER">Spice Grinder</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SPICEGRINDER.DESC: Crushed seeds and other edibles make excellent meal-enhancing additives.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SPICEGRINDER.EFFECT: Produces ingredients that add benefits to <link="FOOD">foods</link> prepared at skilled cooking stations.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SMOKER.NAME: <link="SMOKER">Smoker</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SMOKER.DESC: With a little patience, even tough meat can become deliciously edible.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SMOKER.EFFECT:
Cooks improved <link="FOOD">foods</link> over low, slow heat.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STORAGELOCKER.NAME: <link="STORAGELOCKER">Storage Bin</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STORAGELOCKER.DESC: Resources left on the floor become "debris" and lower decor when not put away.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STORAGELOCKER.EFFECT: Stores the <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid Materials</link> of your choosing.
Resources left on the floor become "debris" and lower decor when not put away.
Color-coded storage makes things easier to find.
Color-coded storage makes things easier to find.
Color-coded storage makes things easier to find.
Color-coded storage makes things easier to find.
Color-coded storage makes things easier to find.
A fun storage solution for fun-damental materials.
Groovy storage, because messy colonies are such a drag.
It's the merriest storage bin of all.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STORAGELOCKERSMART.DES: Smart storage bins can automate resource organization based on type and mass.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STORAGELOCKERSMART.EFF: Stores the Solid Materials of your choosing. Sends a Green Signal when bin is full.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OBJECTDISPENSER.NAME: <link="OBJECTDISPENSER">Automatic Dispenser</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OBJECTDISPENSER.DESC: Automatic dispensers will store and drop resources in small quantities.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OBJECTDISPENSER.EFFECT: Stores any Solid Materials delivered to it by Duplicants. Dumps stored materials back into the world when it receives a Green Signal.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDRESERVOIR.NAME: <link="LIQUIDRESERVOIR">Liquid Reservoir</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDRESERVOIR.DESC: Reservoirs cannot receive manually delivered resources.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDRESERVOIR.EFFECT: Stores any <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> resources piped into it.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASRESERVOIR.NAME: <link="GASRESERVOIR">Gas Reservoir</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASRESERVOIR.DESC: Reservoirs cannot receive manually delivered resources.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASRESERVOIR.EFFECT: Stores any <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> resources piped into it.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASRESERVOIR.FACADES.D: Reservoirs cannot receive manually delivered resources.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASRESERVOIR.FACADES.L: A colorful reservoir keeps gases neatly organized.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASRESERVOIR.FACADES.P: A colorful reservoir keeps gases neatly organized.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASRESERVOIR.FACADES.L: A colorful reservoir keeps gases neatly organized.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASRESERVOIR.FACADES.P: It sports the cheeriest of paint jobs. What a gas!
Safe gas storage doesn't have to be dull.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASRESERVOIR.FACADES.B: A colorful reservoir keeps gases neatly organized.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASRESERVOIR.FACADES.Y: A colorful reservoir keeps gases neatly organized.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASRESERVOIR.FACADES.G: A colorful reservoir keeps gases neatly organized.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASRESERVOIR.FACADES.R: A colorful reservoir keeps gases neatly organized.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GASRESERVOIR.FACADES.P: A colorful reservoir keeps gases neatly organized.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SMARTRESERVOIR.LOGIC_P: Sends a Green Signal when reservoir is less than Low Threshold full, until High Threshold is reached again
Sends a Red Signal when reservoir is High Threshold full, until Low Threshold is reached again
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SMARTRESERVOIR.ACTIVAT: Sends a Green Signal when reservoir is less than {0}% full, until it is {1}% (High Threshold) full
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SMARTRESERVOIR.DEACTIV: Sends a Red Signal when reservoir is {0}% full, until it is less than {1}% (Low Threshold) full
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDHEATER.NAME: <link="LIQUIDHEATER">Liquid Tepidizer</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDHEATER.DESC: Tepidizers heat liquid which can kill waterborne germs.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LIQUIDHEATER.EFFECT:
Warms large bodies of <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link>.

Must be fully submerged.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SWITCH.NAME: <link="SWITCH">Switch</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SWITCH.DESC: Switches can only affect buildings that come after them on a circuit.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SWITCH.EFFECT:
Turns <link="POWER">Power</link> on or off.

Does not affect circuitry preceding the switch.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICPOWERRELAY.NAME: <link="LOGICPOWERRELAY">Power Shutoff</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICPOWERRELAY.DESC: Automated systems save power and time by removing the need for Duplicant input.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICPOWERRELAY.EFFECT:
Connects to an <link="LOGIC">Automation</link> grid to automatically turn <link="POWER">Power</link> on or off.

Does not affect circuitry preceding the switch.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICPOWERRELAY.LOGIC_: Red Signal: Prevent Power from flowing through connected circuits
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICINTERASTEROIDSEND: Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal to an Automation Receiver over vast distances in space. Both the Automation Broadcaster and the Automation Receiver must be exposed to space to function.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICINTERASTEROIDRECE: Receives a Green Signal or a Red Signal from an Automation Broadcaster over vast distances in space. Both the Automation Receiver and the Automation Broadcaster must be exposed to space to function.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TEMPERATURECONTROLLEDS: Automated switches can be used to manage circuits in areas where Duplicants cannot enter.

Automatically turns <link="POWER">Power</link> on or off using ambient <link="HEAT">Temperature</link>.

Does not affect circuitry preceding the switch.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PRESSURESWITCHLIQUID.D: A hydro switch shuts off power when the liquid pressure surrounding it surpasses the set threshold.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PRESSURESWITCHLIQUID.E:
Automatically turns <link="POWER">Power</link> on or off using ambient <link="PRESSURE">Liquid Pressure</link>.

Does not affect circuitry preceding the switch.

Must be submerged in <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PRESSURESWITCHGAS.NAME: <link="PRESSURESWITCHGAS">Atmo Switch</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PRESSURESWITCHGAS.DESC: An atmo switch shuts off power when the air pressure surrounding it surpasses the set threshold.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.PRESSURESWITCHGAS.EFFE:
Automatically turns <link="POWER">Power</link> on or off using ambient <link="PRESSURE">Gas Pressure</link> .

Does not affect circuitry preceding the switch.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TILE.NAME: <link="TILE">Tile</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TILE.DESC: Tile can be used to bridge gaps and get to unreachable areas.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TILE.EFFECT:
Used to build the walls and floors of rooms.

Increases Duplicant runspeed.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WALLTOILET.NAME: <link="WALLTOILET">Wall Toilet</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WALLTOILET.DESC: Wall Toilets transmit fewer germs to Duplicants and require no emptying.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WALLTOILET.EFFECT:
Gives Duplicants a place to relieve themselves. Empties directly on the other side of the wall.

Spreads very few <link="DISEASE">Germs</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WATERPURIFIER.NAME: <link="WATERPURIFIER">Water Sieve</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WATERPURIFIER.DESC: Sieves cannot kill germs and pass any they receive into their waste and water output.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WATERPURIFIER.EFFECT:
Produces clean <link="WATER">Water</link> from <link="DIRTYWATER">Polluted Water</link> using <link="SAND">Sand</link>.

Produces <link="TOXICSAND">Polluted Dirt</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DISTILLATIONCOLUMN.EFF: Separates any <link="DIRTYWATER">Contaminated Water</link> piped through it into <link="STEAM">Steam</link> and <link="TOXICSAND">Polluted Dirt</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIRE.NAME: <link="WIRE">Wire</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIRE.DESC: Electrical wire is used to connect generators, batteries, and buildings.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIRE.EFFECT:
Connects buildings to <link="POWER">Power</link> sources.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIREBRIDGE.NAME: <link="WIREBRIDGE">Wire Bridge</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIREBRIDGE.DESC: Splitting generators onto separate grids can prevent overloads and wasted electricity.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIREBRIDGE.EFFECT:
Runs one wire section over another without joining them.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HIGHWATTAGEWIRE.NAME: <link="HIGHWATTAGEWIRE">Heavi-Watt Wire</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HIGHWATTAGEWIRE.DESC: Higher wattage wire is used to avoid power overloads, particularly for strong generators.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HIGHWATTAGEWIRE.EFFECT:
Carries more <link="POWER">Wattage</link> than regular <link="WIRE">Wire</link> without overloading.

Cannot be run through wall and floor tile.
Joint plates can run Heavi-Watt wires through walls without leaking gas or liquid.

Allows <link="HIGHWATTAGEWIRE">Heavi-Watt Wire</link> to be run through wall and floor tile.

Functions as regular tile.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIREREFINED.NAME: <link="WIREREFINED">Conductive Wire</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIREREFINED.DESC: My Duplicants prefer the look of conductive wire to the regular raggedy stuff.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIREREFINED.EFFECT:
Connects buildings to <link="POWER">Power</link> sources.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIREREFINEDBRIDGE.NAME: <link="WIREREFINEDBRIDGE">Conductive Wire Bridge</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIREREFINEDBRIDGE.DESC: Splitting generators onto separate systems can prevent overloads and wasted electricity.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIREREFINEDBRIDGE.EFFE:
Carries more <link="POWER">Wattage</link> than a regular <link="WIREBRIDGE">Wire Bridge</link> without overloading.

Runs one wire section over another without joining them.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIREREFINEDHIGHWATTAGE: Higher wattage wire is used to avoid power overloads, particularly for strong generators.

Carries more <link="POWER">Wattage</link> than regular <link="WIRE">Wire</link> without overloading.

Cannot be run through wall and floor tile.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WIREREFINEDBRIDGEHIGHW: Joint plates can run Heavi-Watt wires through walls without leaking gas or liquid.

Carries more <link="POWER">Wattage</link> than a regular <link="WIREBRIDGEHIGHWATTAGE">Heavi-Watt Joint Plate</link> without overloading.

Allows <link="HIGHWATTAGEWIRE">Heavi-Watt Wire</link> to be run through wall and floor tile.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HANDSANITIZER.NAME: <link="HANDSANITIZER">Hand Sanitizer</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HANDSANITIZER.DESC: Hand sanitizers kill germs more effectively than wash basins.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.HANDSANITIZER.EFFECT:
Removes most <link="DISEASE">Germs</link> from Duplicants.

Germ-covered Duplicants use Hand Sanitizers when passing by in the selected direction.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WASHBASIN.NAME: <link="WASHBASIN">Wash Basin</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WASHBASIN.DESC: Germ spread can be reduced by building these where Duplicants often get dirty.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WASHBASIN.EFFECT:
Removes some <link="DISEASE">Germs</link> from Duplicants.

Germ-covered Duplicants use Wash Basins when passing by in the selected direction.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WASHSINK.NAME: <link="WASHSINK">Sink</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WASHSINK.DESC: Sinks are plumbed and do not need to be manually emptied or refilled.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WASHSINK.EFFECT:
Removes <link="DISEASE">Germs</link> from Duplicants.

Germ-covered Duplicants use Sinks when passing by in the selected direction.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WASHSINK.FACADES.DEFAU: Sinks are plumbed and do not need to be manually emptied or refilled.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WASHSINK.FACADES.PURPL: A refreshing splash of color for the light-headed.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WASHSINK.FACADES.BLUE_: A calm, colorful sink for heavy-hearted Duplicants.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WASHSINK.FACADES.YELLO: The juxtaposition of 'ick' and 'clean' can be very satisfying.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.WASHSINK.FACADES.RED_R: Some Duplicants say it looks like a germ-devouring mouth.
Don't forget to decontaminate behind your ears.

Uses <link="WATER">Water</link> to remove <link="DISEASE">Germs</link> and <link="RADIATION">Radiation</link>.

Decontaminates both Duplicants and their <link="EQUIPMENT">Clothing</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TILEPOI.NAME: <link="TILEPOI">Tile</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.TILEPOI.EFFECT: Used to build the walls and floor of rooms.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.POLYMERIZER.NAME: <link="POLYMERIZER">Polymer Press</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.POLYMERIZER.DESC: Plastic can be used to craft unique buildings and goods.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.DIRECTIONALWORLDPUMPLI: Channels move more volume than pumps and require no power, but need sufficient pressure to function.

Directionally moves large volumes of <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">LIQUID</link> through a channel.

Can be used as floor tile and rotated before construction.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STEAMTURBINE.NAME: <link="STEAMTURBINE">[DEPRECATED] Steam Turbine</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STEAMTURBINE.DESC: Useful for converting the geothermal energy of magma into usable power.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STEAMTURBINE.EFFECT:
THIS BUILDING HAS BEEN DEPRECATED AND CANNOT BE BUILT.

Generates exceptional electrical <link="POWER">Power</link> using pressurized, <link="HEAT">Scalding</link> <link="STEAM">Steam</link>.

Outputs significantly cooler <link="STEAM">Steam</link> than it receives.

Air pressure beneath this building must be higher than pressure above for air to flow.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STEAMTURBINE2.NAME: <link="STEAMTURBINE2">Steam Turbine</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STEAMTURBINE2.DESC: Useful for converting the geothermal energy into usable power.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STEAMTURBINE2.EFFECT:
Draws in <link="STEAM">Steam</link> from the tiles directly below the machine's foundation and uses it to generate electrical <link="POWER">Power</link>.

Outputs <link="WATER">Water</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STEAMENGINE.NAME: <link="STEAMENGINE">Steam Engine</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STEAMENGINE.DESC: Rockets can be used to send Duplicants into space and retrieve rare resources.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STEAMENGINE.EFFECT:
Utilizes <link="STEAM">Steam</link> to propel rockets for space exploration.

The engine of a rocket must be built first before more rocket modules may be added.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STEAMENGINECLUSTER.DES: Rockets can be used to send Duplicants into space and retrieve rare resources.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.STEAMENGINECLUSTER.EFF:
Utilizes <link="STEAM">Steam</link> to propel rockets for space exploration.

Engine must be built via <link="LAUNCHPAD">Rocket Platform</link>. 

Once the engine has been built, more rocket modules can be added.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLARPANEL.NAME: <link="SOLARPANEL">Solar Panel</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLARPANEL.DESC: Solar panels convert high intensity sunlight into power and produce zero waste.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SOLARPANEL.EFFECT:
Converts <link="LIGHT">Sunlight</link> into electrical <link="POWER">Power</link>.

Must be exposed to space.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.COMETDETECTOR.NAME: <link="COMETDETECTOR">Space Scanner</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.COMETDETECTOR.DESC: Networks of many scanners will scan more efficiently than one on its own.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.COMETDETECTOR.EFFECT: Sends a Green Signal to its automation circuit when it detects incoming objects from space. Can be configured to detect incoming meteor showers or returning space rockets.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OILREFINERY.NAME: <link="OILREFINERY">Oil Refinery</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OILREFINERY.DESC: Petroleum can only be produced from the refinement of crude oil.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OILWELLCAP.NAME: <link="OILWELLCAP">Oil Well</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OILWELLCAP.DESC: Water pumped into an oil reservoir cannot be recovered.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.OILWELLCAP.EFFECT:
Extracts <link="CRUDEOIL">Crude Oil</link> using clean <link="WATER">Water</link>.

Must be built atop an <link="OILWELL">Oil Reservoir</link>.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.METALREFINERY.NAME: <link="METALREFINERY">Metal Refinery</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.METALREFINERY.DESC: Refined metals are necessary to build advanced electronics and technologies.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.METALREFINERY.EFFECT:
Produces <link="REFINEDMETAL">Refined Metals</link> from raw <link="RAWMETAL">Metal Ore</link>.

Significantly <link="HEAT">Heats</link> and outputs the <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> piped into it.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MISSILEFABRICATOR.NAME: <link="MISSILEFABRICATOR">Blastshot Maker</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MISSILEFABRICATOR.DESC: Blastshot shells are an effective defense against incoming meteor showers.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MISSILEFABRICATOR.EFFE:
Produces <link="MISSILELAUNCHER">Blastshot</link> from <link="REFINEDMETAL">Refined Metals</link> combined with <link="PETROLEUM">Petroleum</link>.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GLASSFORGE.NAME: <link="GLASSFORGE">Glass Forge</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GLASSFORGE.DESC: Glass can be used to construct window tile.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.GLASSFORGE.EFFECT:
Produces <link="MOLTENGLASS">Molten Glass</link> from raw <link="SAND">Sand</link>.

Outputs <link="HEAT">High Temperature</link> <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link>.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKCRUSHER.NAME: <link="ROCKCRUSHER">Rock Crusher</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKCRUSHER.DESC: Rock Crushers loosen nuggets from raw ore and can process many different resources.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKCRUSHER.EFFECT:
Inefficiently produces refined materials from raw resources.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKCRUSHER.LIME_FROM_: Crushes {0} into {1} and a small amount of pure {2}
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKCRUSHER.RESIN_FROM: Crushes {0} into {1} and {2}, and a small amount of {3}
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKCRUSHER.FACADES.DE: Rock Crushers loosen nuggets from raw ore and can process many different resources.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKCRUSHER.FACADES.TE: Not designed to handle overcooked food waste.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKCRUSHER.FACADES.RO: Inspired by the traditional mortar and pestle.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKCRUSHER.FACADES.CH: Buffs rough ore into smooth little nuggets.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKCRUSHER.FACADES.GE: Uncrushed ore really grinds its gears.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.ROCKCRUSHER.FACADES.BA: Wherever there's raw ore, there's a rock crusher lurking nearby.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SLUDGEPRESS.NAME: <link="SLUDGEPRESS">Sludge Press</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SLUDGEPRESS.DESC: What Duplicant doesn't love playing with mud?
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.SLUDGEPRESS.EFFECT:
Separates <link="MUD">Mud</link> and other sludges into their base elements.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CHEMICALREFINERY.NAME: <link="CHEMICALREFINERY">Emulsifier</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CHEMICALREFINERY.DESC: It's like a blender, but better.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CHEMICALREFINERY.EFFEC:
Combines <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquids</link> and other inputs into fluid compounds.

Duplicants will not fabricate emulsions unless recipes are queued.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CHEMICALREFINERY.REFIN: Biodiesel is a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> used in <link="POWER">Power</link> production.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.CHEMICALREFINERY.SALTW: Salt Water is a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> with insulating and radiation-absorbing properties.
Rare materials can be procured through rocket missions into space.

Processes <link="RAREMATERIALS">Rare Materials</link> into advanced industrial goods.

Rare materials can be retrieved from space missions.

Duplicants will not fabricate items unless recipes are queued.
Super Coolant is an industrial-grade <link="FULLERENE">Fullerene</link> coolant.
Insulite reduces <link="HEAT">Heat Transfer</link> and is composed of recrystallized <link="KATAIRITE">Abyssalite</link>.
Thermium is an industrial metal alloy formulated to maximize <link="HEAT">Heat Transfer</link> and thermal dispersion.
Visco-Gel Fluid is a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> polymer with high surface tension.
Yellowcake is a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid Material</link> used in uranium enrichment.
Fullerene is a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid Material</link> used in the production of <link="SUPERCOOLANT">Super Coolant</link>.
Plastium is a highly heat-resistant, plastic-like <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid Material</link> used for space buildings.
Atomic Power Banks are portable, self-charging units used for isolated <link="POWER">Power</link> grids.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.THERMALBLOCK.NAME: <link="THERMALBLOCK">Tempshift Plate</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.THERMALBLOCK.DESC: The thermal properties of construction materials determine their heat retention.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.THERMALBLOCK.EFFECT:
Accelerates or buffers <link="HEAT">Heat</link> dispersal based on the construction material used.

Has a small area of effect.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.POWERCONTROLSTATION.DE: Only one Duplicant may be assigned to a station at a time.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.POWERCONTROLSTATION.EF:
Produces <link="POWERSTATIONTOOLS">Microchip</link> to increase the <link="POWER">Power</link> output of generators.

Assigned Duplicants must possess the <link="TECHNICALS2">Tune Up</link> trait.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FARMSTATION.NAME: <link="FARMSTATION">Farm Station</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FARMSTATION.DESC: This station only has an effect on crops grown within the same room.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FARMSTATION.EFFECT:
Produces <link="FARMSTATIONTOOLS">Micronutrient Fertilizer</link> to increase <link="PLANTS">Plant</link> growth rates.

Assigned Duplicants must possess the <link="FARMING2">Crop Tending</link> trait.

This building is a necessary component of the Greenhouse room.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FISHDELIVERYPOINT.NAME: <link="FISHDELIVERYPOINT">Fish Release</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FISHDELIVERYPOINT.DESC: A fish release must be built in liquid to prevent released fish from suffocating.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FISHDELIVERYPOINT.EFFE:
Releases trapped <link="PACU">Pacu</link> back into the world.

Can be used multiple times.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FISHFEEDER.NAME: <link="FISHFEEDER">Fish Feeder</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FISHFEEDER.DESC: Build this feeder above a body of water to feed the fish within.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FISHFEEDER.EFFECT:
Automatically dispenses stored <link="CREATURES">Critter</link> food into the area below.

Dispenses continuously as food is consumed.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FISHTRAP.NAME: <link="FISHTRAP">Fish Trap</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FISHTRAP.DESC: Trapped fish will automatically be bagged for transport.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.FISHTRAP.EFFECT:
Attracts and traps swimming <link="PACU">Pacu</link>.

Single use.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RANCHSTATION.NAME: <link="RANCHSTATION">Grooming Station</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RANCHSTATION.DESC: A groomed critter is a happy, healthy, productive critter.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.RANCHSTATION.EFFECT:
Allows the assigned <link="RANCHER">Rancher</link> to care for <link="CREATURES">Critters</link>.

Assigned Duplicants must possess the <link="RANCHING1">Critter Ranching</link> skill.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MACHINESHOP.NAME: <link="MACHINESHOP">Mechanics Station</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MACHINESHOP.DESC: Duplicants will only improve the efficiency of buildings in the same room as this station.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.MACHINESHOP.EFFECT:
Allows the assigned <link="MACHINETECHNICIAN">Engineer</link> to improve building production efficiency.

This building is a necessary component of the Machine Shop room.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICWIRE.NAME: <link="LOGICWIRE">Automation Wire</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICWIRE.DESC: Automation wire is used to connect building ports to automation gates.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICWIRE.EFFECT:
Connects buildings to <link="LOGIC">Sensors</link>.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICRIBBON.NAME: <link="LOGICRIBBON">Automation Ribbon</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICRIBBON.DESC: Logic ribbons use significantly less space to carry multiple automation signals.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICRIBBON.EFFECT:
A 4-Bit <link="LOGICWIRE">Automation Wire</link> which can carry up to four automation signals.

Use a <link="LOGICRIBBONWRITER">Ribbon Writer</link> to output to multiple Bits, and a <link="LOGICRIBBONREADER">Ribbon Reader</link> to input from multiple Bits.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICWIREBRIDGE.NAME: <link="LOGICWIREBRIDGE">Automation Wire Bridge</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICWIREBRIDGE.DESC: Wire bridges allow multiple automation grids to exist in a small area without connecting.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICWIREBRIDGE.EFFECT:
Runs one <link="LOGICWIRE">Automation Wire</link> section over another without joining them.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICRIBBONBRIDGE.NAME: <link="LOGICRIBBONBRIDGE">Automation Ribbon Bridge</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICRIBBONBRIDGE.DESC: Wire bridges allow multiple automation grids to exist in a small area without connecting.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICRIBBONBRIDGE.EFFE:
Runs one <link="LOGICRIBBON">Automation Ribbon</link> section over another without joining them.

Can be run through wall and floor tile.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEAND.NAME: <link="LOGICGATEAND">AND Gate</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEAND.DESC: This gate outputs a Green Signal when both its inputs are receiving Green Signals at the same time.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEAND.EFFECT: Outputs a Green Signal when both Input A AND Input B are receiving Green. Outputs a Red Signal when even one Input is receiving Red.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEAND.OUTPUT_AC: Sends a Green Signal if both Inputs are receiving Green
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEAND.OUTPUT_IN: Sends a Red Signal if any Input is receiving Red
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEOR.NAME: <link="LOGICGATEOR">OR Gate</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEOR.DESC: This gate outputs a Green Signal if receiving one or more Green Signals.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEOR.EFFECT: Outputs a Green Signal if at least one of Input A OR Input B is receiving Green. Outputs a Red Signal when neither Input A or Input B are receiving Green.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEOR.OUTPUT_ACT: Sends a Green Signal if any Input is receiving Green
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEOR.OUTPUT_INA: Sends a Red Signal if both Inputs are receiving Red
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATENOT.NAME: <link="LOGICGATENOT">NOT Gate</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATENOT.DESC: This gate reverses automation signals, turning a Green Signal into a Red Signal and vice versa.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATENOT.EFFECT: Outputs a Green Signal if the Input is receiving a Red Signal. Outputs a Red Signal when its Input is receiving a Green Signal.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEXOR.NAME: <link="LOGICGATEXOR">XOR Gate</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEXOR.DESC: This gate outputs a Green Signal if exactly one of its Inputs is receiving a Green Signal.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEXOR.EFFECT: Outputs a Green Signal if exactly one of its Inputs is receiving Green. Outputs a Red Signal if both or neither Inputs are receiving a Green Signal.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEXOR.OUTPUT_AC: Sends a Green Signal if exactly one of its Inputs is receiving Green
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEXOR.OUTPUT_IN: Sends a Red Signal if both Input signals match (any color)
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEBUFFER.NAME: <link="LOGICGATEBUFFER">BUFFER Gate</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEBUFFER.DESC: This gate continues outputting a Green Signal for a short time after the gate stops receiving a Green Signal.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEBUFFER.EFFECT: Outputs a Green Signal if the Input is receiving a Green Signal. Continues sending a Green Signal for an amount of buffer time after the Input receives a Red Signal.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEBUFFER.OUTPUT: Sends a Green Signal while receiving Green. After receiving Red, will continue sending Green until the timer has expired
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEFILTER.NAME: <link="LOGICGATEFILTER">FILTER Gate</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEFILTER.DESC: This gate only lets a Green Signal through if its Input has received a Green Signal that lasted longer than the selected filter time.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEFILTER.EFFECT: Only lets a Green Signal through if the Input has received a Green Signal for longer than the selected filter time. Will continue outputting a Red Signal if the Green Signal did not last long enough.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEFILTER.OUTPUT: Sends a Green Signal after receiving Green for longer than the selected filter timer
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICMEMORY.NAME: <link="LOGICMEMORY">Memory Toggle</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICMEMORY.DESC: A Memory stores a Green Signal received in the Set Port (S) until the Reset Port (R) receives a Green Signal.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICMEMORY.EFFECT: Contains an internal Memory, and will output whatever signal is stored in that Memory. Signals sent to the Inputs only affect the Memory, and do not pass through to the Output. Sending a Green Signal to the Set Port (S) will set the memory to Green. Sending a Green Signal to the Reset Port (R) will reset the memory back to Red.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICMEMORY.READ_PORT_: Outputs a Green Signal if the internal Memory is set to Green
Outputs a Red Signal if the internal Memory is set to Red
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICMEMORY.SET_PORT_A: Green Signal: Set the internal Memory to Green
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICMEMORY.RESET_PORT: Green Signal: Reset the internal Memory to Red
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEMULTIPLEXER.D: Signal Selectors can be used to select which automation signal is relevant to pass through to a given circuit
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEMULTIPLEXER.E: Select which one of four Input signals should be sent out the Output, using Control Inputs. Send a Green Signal or a Red Signal to the two Control Inputs to determine which Input is selected.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEMULTIPLEXER.O: Receives a Green or Red signal from the selected input
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICGATEDEMULTIPLEXER: Signal Distributors can be used to choose which circuit should receive a given automation signal.

Route a single Input signal out one of four possible Outputs, based on the selection made by the Control Inputs. Send a Green Signal or a Red Signal to the two Control Inputs to determine which Output is selected.
Sends a Green or Red signal to the selected output
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICSWITCH.NAME: <link="LOGICSWITCH">Signal Switch</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICSWITCH.DESC: Signal switches don't turn grids on and off like power switches, but add an extra signal.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICSWITCH.EFFECT: Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal on an Automation grid.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICSWITCH.LOGIC_PORT: Sends a Green Signal if toggled ON
Sends a Red Signal if toggled OFF
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICPRESSURESENSORGAS: Atmo sensors can be used to prevent excess oxygen production and overpressurization.
Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal when Gas pressure enters the chosen range.
Sends a Green Signal if Gas pressure is within the selected range
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICPRESSURESENSORLIQ: A hydro sensor can tell a pump to refill its basin as soon as it contains too little liquid.
Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal when Liquid pressure enters the chosen range. Must be submerged in Liquid.
Sends a Green Signal if Liquid pressure is within the selected range
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICTEMPERATURESENSOR: Thermo sensors can disable buildings when they approach dangerous temperatures.
Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal when ambient Temperature enters the chosen range.
Sends a Green Signal if ambient Temperature is within the selected range
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICLIGHTSENSOR.NAME: <link="LOGICLIGHTSENSOR">Light Sensor</link>
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICLIGHTSENSOR.DESC: Light sensors can tell surface bunker doors above solar panels to open or close based on solar light levels.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICLIGHTSENSOR.EFFEC: Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal when ambient Brightness enters the chosen range.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICLIGHTSENSOR.LOGIC: Sends a Green Signal if ambient Brightness is within the selected range
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICWATTAGESENSOR.DES: Wattage sensors can send a signal when a building has switched on or off.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICWATTAGESENSOR.EFF: Sends a Green Signal or a Red Signal when Wattage consumed enters the chosen range.
BUILDINGS.BUILDINGS.PREFABS.LOGICWATTAGESENSOR.LOG: Sends a Green Signal if current Wattage is within the selected range
