DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.CANTDIG.NAME: Trypophobia
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.CANTDIG.DESC: This Duplicant's fear of holes makes it impossible for them to dig
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.HEMOPHOBIA.NAME: Squeamish
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.HEMOPHOBIA.DESC: This Duplicant is of delicate disposition and cannot tend to the sick
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BEDSIDEMANNER.NAME: Caregiver
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BEDSIDEMANNER.DESC: This Duplicant has good bedside manner and a healing touch
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.MOUTHBREATHER.NAME: Mouth Breather
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.MOUTHBREATHER.DESC: This Duplicant sucks up way more than their fair share of <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.FUSSY.NAME: Fussy
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.FUSSY.DESC: Nothing's ever quite good enough for this Duplicant
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.TWINKLETOES.NAME: Twinkletoes
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.TWINKLETOES.DESC: This Duplicant is light as a feather on their feet
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.STRONGARM.NAME: Buff
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.STRONGARM.DESC: This Duplicant has muscles on their muscles
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.NOODLEARMS.NAME: Noodle Arms
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.NOODLEARMS.DESC: This Duplicant's arms have all the tensile strength of overcooked linguine
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.AGGRESSIVE.NAME: Destructive
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.AGGRESSIVE.DESC: This Duplicant handles stress by taking their frustrations out on defenseless machines
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.AGGRESSIVE.NOREPAIR: • Will not repair buildings while above 60% <style="KKeyword">Stress</style>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.UGLYCRIER.NAME: Ugly Crier
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.UGLYCRIER.DESC: If this Duplicant gets too <style="KKeyword">Stressed</style> it won't be pretty
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BINGEEATER.NAME: Binge Eater
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BINGEEATER.DESC: This Duplicant will dangerously overeat when <style="KKeyword">Stressed</style>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.ANXIOUS.NAME: Anxious
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.ANXIOUS.DESC: This Duplicant collapses when put under too much pressure
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.STRESSVOMITER.NAME: Vomiter
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.STRESSVOMITER.DESC: This Duplicant is liable to puke everywhere when <style="KKeyword">Stressed</style>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.STRESSSHOCKER.NAME: Stunner
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.STRESSSHOCKER.DESC: This Duplicant emits electrical shocks when <style="KKeyword">Stressed</style>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BANSHEE.NAME: Banshee
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BALLOONARTIST.NAME: Balloon Artist
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BALLOONARTIST.DESC: This Duplicant hands out balloons when they are <style="KKeyword">Overjoyed</style>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.SPARKLESTREAKER.NAME: Sparkle Streaker
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.SPARKLESTREAKER.DESC: This Duplicant leaves a trail of happy sparkles when they are <style="KKeyword">Overjoyed</style>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.STICKERBOMBER.NAME: Sticker Bomber
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.STICKERBOMBER.DESC: This Duplicant will spontaneously redecorate a room when they are <style="KKeyword">Overjoyed</style>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.SUPERPRODUCTIVE.NAME: Super Productive
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.SUPERPRODUCTIVE.DESC: This Duplicant is super productive when they are <style="KKeyword">Overjoyed</style>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.HAPPYSINGER.NAME: Yodeler
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.HAPPYSINGER.DESC: This Duplicant belts out catchy tunes when they are <style="KKeyword">Overjoyed</style>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.DATARAINER.NAME: Rainmaker
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.DATARAINER.DESC: This Duplicant distributes microchips when they are <style="KKeyword">Overjoyed</style>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.ROBODANCER.NAME: Flash Mobber
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.ROBODANCER.DESC: This Duplicant breaks into dance when they are <style="KKeyword">Overjoyed</style>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.IRONGUT.NAME: Iron Gut
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.IRONGUT.DESC: This Duplicant can eat just about anything without getting sick
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.IRONGUT.SHORT_DESC_TOO: Eating food contaminated with <link="FOODSICKNESS">Food Poisoning</link> Germs will not affect this Duplicant
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.STRONGIMMUNESYSTEM.DES: This Duplicant's immune system bounces back faster than most
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.SCAREDYCAT.NAME: Pacifist
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.ALLERGIES.NAME: Allergies
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.ALLERGIES.DESC: This Duplicant will sneeze uncontrollably when exposed to the pollen present in <link="POLLENGERMS">Floral Scent</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.WEAKIMMUNESYSTEM.NAME: Biohazardous
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.WEAKIMMUNESYSTEM.DESC: All the vitamin C in space couldn't stop this Duplicant from getting sick
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.IRRITABLEBOWEL.NAME: Irritable Bowel
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.IRRITABLEBOWEL.DESC: This Duplicant needs a little extra time to "do their business"
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.CALORIEBURNER.NAME: Bottomless Stomach
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.CALORIEBURNER.DESC: This Duplicant might actually be several black holes in a trench coat
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.SMALLBLADDER.NAME: Small Bladder
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.SMALLBLADDER.DESC: This Duplicant has a tiny, pea-sized <style="KKeyword">Bladder</style>. Adorable!
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.ANEMIC.NAME: Anemic
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.ANEMIC.DESC: This Duplicant has trouble keeping up with the others
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.GREASEMONKEY.NAME: Grease Monkey
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.GREASEMONKEY.DESC: This Duplicant likes to throw a wrench into the colony's plans... in a good way
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.MOLEHANDS.NAME: Mole Hands
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.MOLEHANDS.DESC: They're great for tunneling, but finding good gloves is a nightmare
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.FASTLEARNER.NAME: Quick Learner
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.FASTLEARNER.DESC: This Duplicant's sharp as a tack and learns new skills with amazing speed
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.SLOWLEARNER.NAME: Slow Learner
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.SLOWLEARNER.DESC: This Duplicant's a little slow on the uptake, but gosh do they try
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.DIVERSLUNG.NAME: Diver's Lungs
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.DIVERSLUNG.DESC: This Duplicant could have been a talented opera singer in another life
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.FLATULENCE.NAME: Flatulent
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.FLATULENCE.DESC: Some Duplicants are just full of it
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.SNORER.NAME: Loud Sleeper
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.SNORER.DESC: In space, everyone can hear you snore
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.SNORER.SHORT_DESC_TOOL: This Duplicant's snoring will rudely awake nearby friends
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.NARCOLEPSY.NAME: Narcoleptic
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.NARCOLEPSY.DESC: This Duplicant can and will fall asleep anytime, anyplace
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.NARCOLEPSY.SHORT_DESC_: This Duplicant's work will be periodically interrupted by naps
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.INTERIORDECORATOR.NAME: Interior Decorator
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.INTERIORDECORATOR.DESC: "Move it a little to the left..."
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.UNCULTURED.NAME: Uncultured
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.UNCULTURED.DESC: This Duplicant has simply no appreciation for the arts
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.EARLYBIRD.NAME: Early Bird
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.EARLYBIRD.DESC: This Duplicant always wakes up feeling fresh and efficient!
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.EARLYBIRD.EXTENDED_DES: • Morning: {0} bonus to all Attributes • Duration: 5 Schedule Blocks
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.EARLYBIRD.SHORT_DESC_T: Morning: +2 bonus to all Attributes • Duration: 5 Schedule Blocks
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.NIGHTOWL.NAME: Night Owl
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.NIGHTOWL.DESC: This Duplicant does their best work when they'd ought to be sleeping
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.NIGHTOWL.EXTENDED_DESC: • Nighttime: {0} bonus to all Attributes • Duration: All Night
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.NIGHTOWL.SHORT_DESC_TO: Nighttime: +3 bonus to all Attributes • Duration: All Night
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.METEORPHILE.NAME: Rock Fan
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.METEORPHILE.DESC: Meteor showers get this Duplicant really, really hyped
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.METEORPHILE.EXTENDED_D: • During meteor showers: {0} bonus to all Attributes
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.METEORPHILE.SHORT_DESC: Gains Attribute bonuses during meteor showers.
During meteor showers: +3 bonus to all Attributes
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.REGENERATION.NAME: Regenerative
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.REGENERATION.DESC: This robust Duplicant is constantly regenerating health
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.DEEPERDIVERSLUNGS.NAME: Deep Diver's Lungs
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.DEEPERDIVERSLUNGS.DESC: This Duplicant has a frankly impressive ability to hold their breath
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.SUNNYDISPOSITION.NAME: Sunny Disposition
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.SUNNYDISPOSITION.DESC: This Duplicant has an unwaveringly positive outlook on life
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.ROCKCRUSHER.NAME: Beefsteak
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.ROCKCRUSHER.DESC: This Duplicant's got muscles on their muscles!
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.SIMPLETASTES.NAME: Shrivelled Tastebuds
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.SIMPLETASTES.DESC: This Duplicant could lick a Puft's backside and taste nothing
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.FOODIE.NAME: Gourmet
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.FOODIE.DESC: This Duplicant's refined palate demands only the most luxurious dishes the colony can offer
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.ARCHAEOLOGIST.NAME: Relic Hunter
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.ARCHAEOLOGIST.DESC: This Duplicant was never taught the phrase "take only pictures, leave only footprints"
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.DECORUP.NAME: Innately Stylish
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.DECORUP.DESC: This Duplicant's radiant self-confidence makes even the rattiest outfits look trendy
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.DECORDOWN.NAME: Shabby Dresser
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.DECORDOWN.DESC: This Duplicant's clearly never heard of ironing
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.THRIVER.NAME: Duress to Impress
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.THRIVER.DESC: This Duplicant kicks into hyperdrive when the stress is on
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.THRIVER.SHORT_DESC_TOO: More than 60% Stress: +7 bonus to all Attributes
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.LONER.NAME: Loner
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.LONER.SHORT_DESC_TOOLT: Only Duplicant on a world: +4 bonus to all Attributes
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.STARRYEYED.NAME: Starry Eyed
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.STARRYEYED.DESC: This Duplicant loves being in space
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.GLOWSTICK.NAME: Glow Stick
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.GLOWSTICK.SHORT_DESC: Emits low amounts of rads and light
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.GLOWSTICK.SHORT_DESC_T: Emits low amounts of rads and light
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.RADIATIONEATER.NAME: Radiation Eater
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.RADIATIONEATER.DESC: This Duplicant eats radiation for breakfast (and dinner)
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.NIGHTLIGHT.NAME: Nyctophobic

DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.NIGHTLIGHT.SHORT_DESC_: This Duplicant can't sleep in complete darkness
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.GREENTHUMB.NAME: Green Thumb
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.GREENTHUMB.DESC: This Duplicant regards every plant as a potential friend
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.FROSTPROOF.NAME: Frost Proof
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.FROSTPROOF.DESC: This Duplicant is too cool to be bothered by the cold
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.CONSTRUCTIONUP.NAME: Handy
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.CONSTRUCTIONUP.DESC: This Duplicant is a swift and skilled builder
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.RANCHINGUP.NAME: Animal Lover

DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.CONSTRUCTIONDOWN.NAME: Building Impaired
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.CONSTRUCTIONDOWN.DESC: This Duplicant has trouble constructing anything besides meaningful friendships
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.RANCHINGDOWN.NAME: Critter Aversion
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.RANCHINGDOWN.DESC: This Duplicant just doesn't trust those beady little eyes
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.DIGGINGDOWN.NAME: Undigging
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.DIGGINGDOWN.DESC: This Duplicant couldn't dig themselves out of a paper bag
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.MACHINERYDOWN.NAME: Luddite
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.MACHINERYDOWN.DESC: This Duplicant always invites friends over just to make them hook up their electronics
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.COOKINGDOWN.NAME: Kitchen Menace
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.COOKINGDOWN.DESC: This Duplicant could probably figure out a way to burn ice cream
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.ARTDOWN.NAME: Unpracticed Artist
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.ARTDOWN.DESC: This Duplicant proudly proclaims they "can't even draw a stick figure"
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.CARINGDOWN.NAME: Unempathetic
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.CARINGDOWN.DESC: This Duplicant's lack of bedside manner makes it difficult for them to nurse peers back to health
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BOTANISTDOWN.NAME: Plant Murderer

DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.GRANTSKILL_MEDICINE1.S: This Duplicant receives a free <style="KKeyword">Skill</style> without the drawback of increased <style="KKeyword">Morale Requirements</style>

DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.GRANTSKILL_MEDICINE2.S: This Duplicant receives a free <style="KKeyword">Skill</style> without the drawback of increased <style="KKeyword">Morale Requirements</style>

DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BIONICBUG1.NAME: Bionic Bug: Rigid Thinking
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BIONICBUG1.DESC: This Duplicant's bionic systems are quite inflexible
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BIONICBUG1.SHORT_DESC_:
Does not level up attributes while performing errands

Requires boosters to improve skills
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BIONICBUG2.NAME: Bionic Bug: Dissociative

DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BIONICBUG2.SHORT_DESC_:
Does not level up attributes while performing errands

Requires boosters to improve skills
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BIONICBUG3.NAME: Bionic Bug: All Thumbs
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BIONICBUG3.DESC: This Duplicant's bionic systems aren't designed to operate other systems
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BIONICBUG3.SHORT_DESC_:
Does not level up attributes while performing errands

Requires boosters to improve skills
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BIONICBUG4.NAME: Bionic Bug: Overengineered

DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BIONICBUG4.SHORT_DESC_:

Requires boosters to improve skills
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BIONICBUG5.NAME: Bionic Bug: Late Bloomer
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BIONICBUG5.DESC: This Duplicant's bionic systems weren't built for speed
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BIONICBUG5.SHORT_DESC_:
Does not level up attributes while performing errands

Requires boosters to improve skills
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BIONICBUG6.NAME: Bionic Bug: Urbanite
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BIONICBUG6.DESC: This Duplicant's bionic systems were designed by someone who'd never seen a plant in real life
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BIONICBUG6.SHORT_DESC_:

Requires boosters to improve skills
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BIONICBUG7.NAME: Bionic Bug: Error Prone
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.TRAITS.BIONICBUG7.DESC: This Duplicant's bionic systems err on the side of erring

DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.CATALINA.NAME: Catalina
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.CATALINA.DESC: A {0} is admired by all for her seemingly tireless work ethic. Little do people know, she's dying on the inside.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.NISBET.NAME: Nisbet
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.NISBET.DESC: This {0} likes to punch people to show her affection. Everyone's too afraid of her to tell her it hurts.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.ELLIE.NAME: Ellie
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.ELLIE.DESC: Nothing makes an {0} happier than a big tin of glitter and a pack of unicorn stickers.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.RUBY.NAME: Ruby
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.RUBY.DESC: This {0} asks the pressing questions, like "Where can I get a leather jacket in space?"
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.LEIRA.NAME: Leira
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.LEIRA.DESC: {0}s just want everyone to be happy.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.BUBBLES.NAME: Bubbles
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.BUBBLES.DESC: This {0} is constantly challenging others to fight her, regardless of whether or not she can actually take them.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.MIMA.NAME: Mi-Ma
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.MIMA.DESC: Ol' {0} here can't stand lookin' at people's knees.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.NAILS.NAME: Nails
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.NAILS.DESC: People often expect a Duplicant named "{0}" to be tough, but they're all pretty huge wimps.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.MAE.NAME: Mae
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.MAE.DESC: There's nothing a {0} can't do if she sets her mind to it.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.GOSSMANN.NAME: Gossmann
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.GOSSMANN.DESC: {0}s are major goofballs who can make anyone laugh.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.MARIE.NAME: Marie
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.MARIE.DESC: This {0} is positively glowing! What's her secret? Radioactive isotopes, of course.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.LINDSAY.NAME: Lindsay
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.LINDSAY.DESC: A {0} is a charming woman, unless you make the mistake of messing with one of her friends.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.DEVON.NAME: Devon
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.DEVON.DESC: This {0} dreams of owning their own personal computer so they can start a blog full of pictures of toast.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.REN.NAME: Ren
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.REN.DESC: Every {0} has this unshakable feeling that his life's already happened and he's just watching it unfold from a memory.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.FRANKIE.NAME: Frankie
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.FRANKIE.DESC: There's nothing {0}s are more proud of than their thick, dignified eyebrows.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.BANHI.NAME: Banhi
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.BANHI.DESC: The "cool loner" vibes that radiate off a {0} never fail to make the colony swoon.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.ADA.NAME: Ada
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.ADA.DESC: {0}s enjoy writing poetry in their downtime. Dark poetry.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.HASSAN.NAME: Hassan
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.HASSAN.DESC: If someone says something nice to a {0} he'll think about it nonstop for no less than three weeks.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.STINKY.NAME: Stinky
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.STINKY.DESC: This {0} has never been invited to a party, which is a shame. His dance moves are incredible.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.JOSHUA.NAME: Joshua
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.JOSHUA.DESC: {0}s are precious goobers. Other Duplicants are strangely incapable of cursing in a {0}'s presence.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.LIAM.NAME: Liam
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.LIAM.DESC: No matter how much this {0} scrubs, he can never truly feel clean.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.ABE.NAME: Abe
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.ABE.DESC: {0}s are sweet, delicate flowers. They need to be treated gingerly, with great consideration for their feelings.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.BURT.NAME: Burt
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.BURT.DESC: This {0} always feels great after a bubble bath and a good long cry.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.TRAVALDO.NAME: Travaldo
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.TRAVALDO.DESC: A {0}'s monotonous voice and lack of facial expression makes it impossible for others to tell when he's messing with them.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.HAROLD.NAME: Harold
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.HAROLD.DESC: Get a bunch of {0}s together in a room, and you'll have... a bunch of {0}s together in a room.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.MAX.NAME: Max
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.MAX.DESC: At any given moment a {0} is viscerally reliving ten different humiliating memories.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.ROWAN.NAME: Rowan
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.ROWAN.DESC: {0}s have exceptionally large hearts and express their emotions most efficiently by yelling.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.OTTO.NAME: Otto
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.OTTO.DESC: {0}s always insult people by accident and generally exist in a perpetual state of deep regret.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.TURNER.NAME: Turner
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.TURNER.DESC: This {0} is paralyzed by the knowledge that others have memories and perceptions of them they can't control.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.NIKOLA.NAME: Nikola
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.NIKOLA.DESC: This {0} once claimed he could build a laser so powerful it would rip the colony in half. No one asked him to prove it.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.MEEP.NAME: Meep
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.MEEP.DESC: {0}s have a face only a two tonne Printing Pod could love.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.ARI.NAME: Ari
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.ARI.DESC: {0}s tend to space out from time to time, but they always pay attention when it counts.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.JEAN.NAME: Jean
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.JEAN.DESC: Just because {0}s are a little slow doesn't mean they can't suffer from soul-crushing existential crises.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.CAMILLE.NAME: Camille
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.CAMILLE.DESC: This {0} loves anything that makes her feel nostalgic, including things that haven't aged well.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.ASHKAN.NAME: Ashkan
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.ASHKAN.DESC: {0}s have what can only be described as a "seriously infectious giggle".
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.STEVE.NAME: Steve
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.STEVE.DESC: This {0} is convinced that he has psychic powers. And he knows exactly what his friends think about that.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.AMARI.NAME: Amari
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.AMARI.DESC: {0}s likes to keep the peace. Ironically, they're a riot at parties.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.PEI.NAME: Pei
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.PEI.DESC: Every {0} spends at least half the day pretending that they remember what they came into this room for.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.QUINN.NAME: Quinn
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.QUINN.DESC: This {0}'s favorite genre of music is "festive power ballad".
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.JORGE.NAME: Jorge
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.JORGE.DESC: {0} loves his new colony, even if their collective body odor makes his eyes water.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.FREYJA.NAME: Freyja
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.FREYJA.DESC: This {0} has never stopped anyone from eating yellow snow.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.CHIP.NAME: Chip
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.CHIP.DESC: This {0} is extremely good at guessing their friends' passwords.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.EDWIREDO.NAME: Edwiredo
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.EDWIREDO.DESC: This {0} once rolled his eye so hard that he powered himself off and on again.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.GIZMO.NAME: Gizmo
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.GIZMO.DESC: {0}s love nothing more than a big juicy info dump.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.STEELA.NAME: Steela
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.STEELA.DESC: {0}s aren't programmed to put up with nonsense, but they do enjoy the occasional shenanigan.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.SONYAR.NAME: Sonyar
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.SONYAR.DESC: {0}s would sooner burn down the colony than read an instruction manual.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.ULTI.NAME: Ulti
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.ULTI.DESC: This {0}'s favorite dance move is The Robot. They don't get why others think that's funny.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.HIGBY.NAME: Higby
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.HIGBY.DESC: This {0}'s got a song in his heart. Now if only he could remember how it goes.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.MAYA.NAME: Maya
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.PERSONALITIES.MAYA.DESC: This {0} got her hand crushed in a pneumatic door once. It was the most alive she's ever felt.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.NEEDS.DECOR.NAME: Decor Expectation
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.NEEDS.DECOR.EXPECTATION_TOOLT: Most objects have Decor values that alter Duplicants' opinions of their surroundings. This Duplicant desires Decor values of {0} or higher, and becomes Stressed in areas with lower Decor.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.NEEDS.FOOD_QUALITY.NAME: Food Quality
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.NEEDS.FOOD_QUALITY.EXPECTATIO:
Each Duplicant has a minimum quality of <style="KKeyword">Food</style> they'll tolerate eating.
This Duplicant desires <b>Tier {0}<b> or better <style="KKeyword">Food</style>, and becomes <style="KKeyword">Stressed</style> when they eat meals of lower quality.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.NEEDS.FOOD_QUALITY.FOODQUALIT: This Duplicant is content to eat Food with a Food Quality of {0} or higher
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.NEEDS.QUALITYOFLIFE.NAME: Morale Requirements
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.NEEDS.QUALITYOFLIFE.EXPECTATI:
The more responsibilities and stressors a Duplicant has, the more they will desire additional leisure time and improved amenities.

Failing to keep a Duplicant's <style="KKeyword">Morale</style> at or above their <style="KKeyword">Morale Need</style> means they will not be able to unwind, causing them <style="KKeyword">Stress</style> over time.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.NEEDS.NOISE.NAME: Noise Expectation
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.UNPROFESSIONAL_DES: This Duplicant has no discernible skills
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.PROFESSION_DESC:
Expertise is determined by a Duplicant's highest <style="KKeyword">Attribute</style>

Duplicants develop higher expectations as their Expertise level increases
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.CONSTRUCTION.NAME: Construction
Determines the <style="KKeyword">Temperature</style> at which a Duplicant will get burned.
Determines the <style="KKeyword">Temperature</style> at which a Duplicant will get frostbitten.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.DIGGING.NAME: Excavation
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.MACHINERY.NAME: Machinery
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.MACHINERY.DESC: Determines how quickly a Duplicant uses machines.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.LIFESUPPORT.NAME: Life Support
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.LIFESUPPORT.DESC: Determines how efficiently a Duplicant maintains <link="ALGAEHABITAT">Algae Terrarium</link>s, <link="AIRFILTER">Deodorizer</link>s, and <link="WATERPURIFIER">Water Sieve</link>s
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.TOGGLE.NAME: Toggle
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.TOGGLE.DESC: Determines how efficiently a Duplicant tunes machinery, flips switches, and sets sensors.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.ATHLETICS.NAME: Athletics
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.LUMINESCENCE.NAME: Luminescence
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.LUMINESCENCE.DESC: Determines how much light a Duplicant emits.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.TRANSITTUBETRAVELS: Determines a Duplicant's default <link="TRAVELTUBE">Transit Tube</link> travel speed.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.DOCTOREDLEVEL.NAME: <link="MEDICINE">Treatment Received</link> Effect
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.DOCTOREDLEVEL.DESC:
Duplicants who receive medical care while in a <link="DOCTORSTATION">Sick Bay</link> or <link="ADVANCEDDOCTORSTATION">Disease Clinic</link> will gain the <style="KKeyword">Treatment Received</style> effect

This effect reduces the severity of <style="KKeyword">Disease</style> symptoms
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.SNEEZYNESS.NAME: Sneeziness
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.SNEEZYNESS.DESC: Determines how frequently a Duplicant sneezes.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.GERMRESISTANCE.DES: Duplicants with a higher <style="KKeyword">Germ Resistance</style> rating are less likely to contract germ-based <style="KKeyword">Diseases</style>.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.LEARNING.NAME: Science
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.LEARNING.DESC: Determines how quickly a Duplicant conducts <style="KKeyword">Research</style> and gains <style="KKeyword">Skill Points</style>.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.COOKING.NAME: Cuisine
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.COOKING.DESC: Determines how quickly a Duplicant prepares <style="KKeyword">Food</style>.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.HAPPINESSDELTA.DES: Contented <link="CREATURES">Critters</link> produce usable materials with increased frequency.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.RADIATIONBALANCEDE: Duplicants accumulate Rads in areas with Radiation and recover at very slow rates Open the Radiation Overlay {Hotkey/Overlay15} to view current Rad readings
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.INSULATION.NAME: Insulation
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.INSULATION.DESC: Highly <style="KKeyword">Insulated</style> Duplicants retain body heat easily, while low <style="KKeyword">Insulation</style> Duplicants are easier to keep cool.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.STRENGTH.NAME: Strength
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.STRENGTH.DESC: Determines a Duplicant's <style="KKeyword">Carrying Capacity</style> and cleaning speed.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.CARING.NAME: Medicine
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.CARING.DESC: Determines a Duplicant's ability to care for sick peers.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.IMMUNITY.NAME: Immunity
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.IMMUNITY.DESC: Determines a Duplicant's <style="KKeyword">Disease</style> susceptibility and recovery time.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.BOTANIST.NAME: Agriculture
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.BOTANIST.DESC: Determines how quickly and efficiently a Duplicant cultivates <style="KKeyword">Plants</style>.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.RANCHING.NAME: Husbandry
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.RANCHING.DESC: Determines how efficiently a Duplicant tends <link="CREATURES">Critters</link>.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.ART.NAME: Creativity
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.ART.DESC: Determines how quickly a Duplicant produces <style="KKeyword">Artwork</style>.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.DECOR.NAME: Decor
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.DECOR.DESC: Affects a Duplicant's <style="KKeyword">Morale</style> and their opinion of their surroundings.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.THERMALCONDUCTIVIT:
Determines how quickly a Duplicant retains or loses body <style="KKeyword">Heat</style> in any given area.

It is the sum of a Duplicant's <style="KKeyword">Equipment</style> and their natural <style="KKeyword">Insulation</style> values.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.DECORRADIUS.NAME: Decor Radius
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.DECORRADIUS.DESC: The influence range of an object's <style="KKeyword">Decor</style> value.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.DECOREXPECTATION.D:
A Decor Morale Bonus allows Duplicants to receive <style="KKeyword">Morale</style> boosts from lower <style="KKeyword">Decor</style> values.

Maintaining high <style="KKeyword">Morale</style> will allow Duplicants to learn more <style="KKeyword">Skills</style>.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.FOODEXPECTATION.DE:
A Food Morale Bonus allows Duplicants to receive <style="KKeyword">Morale</style> boosts from lower quality <style="KKeyword">Food</style>.

Maintaining high <style="KKeyword">Morale</style> will allow Duplicants to learn more <style="KKeyword">Skills</style>.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.QUALITYOFLIFEEXPEC: Dictates how high a Duplicant's <style="KKeyword">Morale</style> must be kept to prevent them from gaining <style="KKeyword">Stress</style>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.HYGIENE.NAME: Hygiene
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.HYGIENE.DESC: Affects a Duplicant's sense of cleanliness.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.CARRYAMOUNT.NAME: Carrying Capacity
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.CARRYAMOUNT.DESC: Determines the maximum weight that a Duplicant can carry.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.SPACENAVIGATION.DE: Determines how long it takes a Duplicant to complete a space mission.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.SPACENAVIGATION.DL: Determines how much of a speed bonus a Duplicant provides to a rocket they are piloting.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.QUALITYOFLIFE.NAME: Morale
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.QUALITYOFLIFE.DESC:
A Duplicant's <style="KKeyword">Morale</style> must exceed their <style="KKeyword">Morale Need</style>, or they'll begin to accumulate <style="KKeyword">Stress</style>.

<style="KKeyword">Morale</style> can be increased by providing Duplicants higher quality <style="KKeyword">Food</style>, allotting more <style="KKeyword">Downtime</style> in
the colony schedule, or building better <style="KKeyword">Bathrooms</style> and <style="KKeyword">Bedrooms</style> for them to live in.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.QUALITYOFLIFE.TOOL: This Duplicant's low <style="KKeyword">Morale</style> will cause <style="KKeyword">Stress</style> over time
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.AIRCONSUMPTIONRATE: Air Consumption determines how much <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link> a Duplicant requires per minute to live.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.RADIATIONRESISTANC: Determines how easily a Duplicant repels <style="KKeyword">Radiation Sickness</style>.
The rate at which <style="KKeyword">Radiation</style> is neutralized within a Duplicant body.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.STRESSDELTA.NAME: Stress
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.STRESSDELTA.DESC: Determines how quickly a Duplicant gains or reduces <style="KKeyword">Stress</style>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.BREATHDELTA.NAME: Breath
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.BREATHDELTA.DESC: Determines how quickly a Duplicant gains or reduces <style="KKeyword">Breath</style>.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.BIONICOILDELTA.DES: Determines how quickly a Duplicant's bionic parts lose <style="KKeyword">Gear Oil</style>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.BLADDERDELTA.NAME: Bladder
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.BLADDERDELTA.DESC: Determines how quickly a Duplicant's <style="KKeyword">Bladder</style> fills or depletes.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.CALORIESDELTA.NAME: Calories
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.CALORIESDELTA.DESC: Determines how quickly a Duplicant burns or stores <style="KKeyword">Calories</style>.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.STAMINADELTA.NAME: Stamina
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.TOXICITYDELTA.NAME: Toxicity
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.TOILETEFFICIENCY.D: Determines how long a Duplicant needs to do their "business".
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.METABOLISM.NAME: Critter Metabolism
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.METABOLISM.DESC: Affects the rate at which a critter burns <style="KKeyword">Calories</style> and produces materials
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.ROOMTEMPERATUREPRE: Determines the minimum body <style="KKeyword">Temperature</style> a Duplicant prefers to maintain.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.MAXUNDERWATERTRAVE: Determines a Duplicant's runspeed when submerged in <style="KKeyword">Liquid</style>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.OVERHEATTEMPERATUR: A building at Overheat <style="KKeyword">Temperature</style> will take damage and break down if not cooled
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.FATALTEMPERATURE.D: A building at break down <style="KKeyword">Temperature</style> will lose functionality and take damage
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.HITPOINTSDELTA.DES: Health regeneration is increased when another Duplicant provides medical care to the patient
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.DISEASECURESPEED.D: Recovery speed bonus is increased when another Duplicant provides medical care to the patient
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.ROCKETBURDEN.NAME: Burden
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.HEIGHT.NAME: Height
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.WILTTEMPRANGEMOD.D: Variance growth temperature relative to the base crop
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.YIELDAMOUNT.NAME: Yield Amount
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.YIELDAMOUNT.DESC: Plant production relative to the base crop
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.HARVESTTIME.NAME: Harvest Duration
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.HARVESTTIME.DESC: Time it takes an unskilled Duplicant to harvest this plant
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.DECORBONUS.NAME: Decor Bonus
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.DECORBONUS.DESC: Change in Decor value relative to the base crop
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.MINLIGHTLUX.NAME: Light
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.MINLIGHTLUX.DESC: Minimum lux this plant requires for growth
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.FERTILIZERUSAGEMOD: Fertilizer and irrigation amounts this plant requires relative to the base crop
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.MINRADIATIONTHRESH: Smallest amount of ambient Radiation required for this plant to grow
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.MAXRADIATIONTHRESH: Largest amount of ambient Radiation this plant can tolerate
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.BIONICBOOSTERSLOTS: The number of boosters this Bionic Duplicant can install at once
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ATTRIBUTES.BIONICBATTERYCOUNT: The number of power banks this Bionic Duplicant can store

{2} This Duplicant will gain +{1} Morale when learning {0} Skills

DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.ARTIST.DESCRIPTION: Allows moderately attractive art to be created

DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.MASTER_ARTIST.DESCRIPTI: Enables the painting and sculpting of masterpieces

DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.BUILDER.DESCRIPTION: Further increases a Duplicant's construction speeds

DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.SENIOR_BUILDER.DESCRIPT: Enables a Duplicant to deconstruct Gravitas buildings
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.JUNIOR_RESEARCHER.NAME: <link="RESEARCHING1">Advanced Research</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.JUNIOR_RESEARCHER.DESCR: Allows Duplicants to perform research using a <link="ADVANCEDRESEARCHCENTER">Super Computer</link>

DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.RESEARCHER.DESCRIPTION: Duplicants can perform studies on <style="KKeyword">Geysers</style>, Planetoid, and other geographical phenomena

DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.SPACE_RESEARCHER.NAME: <link="SPACERESEARCH">Data Analysis Researcher</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.SPACE_RESEARCHER.DESCRI: Enables Duplicants to conduct research using the <link="DLC1COSMICRESEARCHCENTER">Virtual Planetarium</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.JUNIOR_COOK.NAME: <link="COOKING1">Grilling</link>

DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.COOK.NAME: <link="COOKING2">Grilling II</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.JUNIOR_MEDIC.NAME: <link="MEDICINE1">Medicine Compounding</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.JUNIOR_MEDIC.DESCRIPTIO: Allows Duplicants to produce medicines at the <link="APOTHECARY">Apothecary</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.MEDIC.NAME: <link="MEDICINE2">Bedside Manner</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.MEDIC.DESCRIPTION: Trains Duplicants to administer medicine at the <link="DOCTORSTATION">Sick Bay</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.SENIOR_MEDIC.NAME: <link="MEDICINE3">Advanced Medical Care</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.SENIOR_MEDIC.DESCRIPTIO: Trains Duplicants to operate the <link="ADVANCEDDOCTORSTATION">Disease Clinic</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.MACHINE_TECHNICIAN.NAME: <link="TECHNICALS1">Improved Tinkering</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.MACHINE_TECHNICIAN.DESC: Marginally improves a Duplicant's tinkering speeds
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.OIL_TECHNICIAN.NAME: <link="OILTECHNICIAN">Oil Engineering</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.OIL_TECHNICIAN.DESCRIPT: Allows the extraction and refinement of <link="CRUDEOIL">Crude Oil</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.HAULER.NAME: <link="HAULING1">Improved Carrying I</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.HAULER.DESCRIPTION: Minorly increase a Duplicant's strength and carrying capacity
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.MATERIALS_MANAGER.NAME: <link="HAULING2">Improved Carrying II</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.MATERIALS_MANAGER.DESCR: Further increases a Duplicant's strength and carrying capacity for even swifter deliveries
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.JUNIOR_FARMER.NAME: <link="FARMING1">Improved Farming I</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.JUNIOR_FARMER.DESCRIPTI: Minorly increase a Duplicant's farming skills, increasing their chances of harvesting new plant <style="KKeyword">Seeds</style>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.FARMER.NAME: <link="FARMING2">Crop Tending</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.FARMER.DESCRIPTION: Enables tending <style="KKeyword">Plants</style>, which will increase their growth speed
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.SENIOR_FARMER.NAME: <link="FARMING3">Improved Farming II</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.SENIOR_FARMER.DESCRIPTI: Further increases a Duplicant's farming skills
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.JUNIOR_MINER.NAME: <link="MINING1">Hard Digging</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.JUNIOR_MINER.DESCRIPTIO: Allows the excavation of <style="KKeyword">Very Firm</style> materials such as <link="GRANITE">Granite</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.MINER.NAME: <link="MINING2">Superhard Digging</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.MINER.DESCRIPTION: Allows the excavation of the element <link="KATAIRITE">Abyssalite</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.SENIOR_MINER.NAME: <link="MINING3">Super-Duperhard Digging</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.SENIOR_MINER.DESCRIPTIO: Allows the excavation of <style="KKeyword">Nearly Impenetrable</style> elements, including <link="DIAMOND">Diamond</link> and <link="OBSIDIAN">Obsidian</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.MASTER_MINER.NAME: <link="MINING4">Hazmat Digging</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.MASTER_MINER.DESCRIPTIO: Allows the excavation of dangerous materials like <link="CORIUM">Corium</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.SUIT_DURABILITY.NAME: <link="SUITDURABILITY">Suit Sustainability Training</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.SUIT_DURABILITY.DESCRIP: Suits equipped by this Duplicant lose durability 25% slower.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.SUIT_EXPERT.NAME: <link="SUITS1">Exosuit Training</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.SUIT_EXPERT.DESCRIPTION: Eliminates the runspeed loss experienced while wearing exosuits
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.POWER_TECHNICIAN.NAME: <link="TECHNICALS2">Electrical Engineering</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.POWER_TECHNICIAN.DESCRI: Enables generator <style="KKeyword">Tune-Up</style>, which will temporarily provide improved <style="KKeyword">Power</style> output
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.MECHATRONIC_ENGINEER.DE: Allows the construction and maintenance of <link="SOLIDCONDUIT">Conveyor Rail</link> systems
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.HANDYMAN.NAME: <link="BASEKEEPING1">Improved Strength</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.HANDYMAN.DESCRIPTION: Minorly improves a Duplicant's physical strength

DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.PLUMBER.DESCRIPTION: Allows a Duplicant to empty <style="KKeyword">Pipes</style> without making a mess

DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.PYROTECHNIC.DESCRIPTION: Allows a Duplicant to make <style="KKeyword">Blastshot</style> for the <style="KKeyword">Meteor Blaster</style>
