DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.SENIOR_RANCHER.NAME: <link="RANCHING2">Critter Ranching II</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.ASTRONAUTTRAINEE.NAME: <link="ASTRONAUTING1">Rocket Piloting</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.ASTRONAUTTRAINEE.DESCRI: Allows a Duplicant to operate a <link="COMMANDMODULE">Command Capsule</link> to pilot a rocket ship
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.ASTRONAUT.NAME: <link="ASTRONAUTING2">Rocket Navigation</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.ASTRONAUT.DESCRIPTION: Improves the speed that space missions are completed
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.ROCKETPILOT.NAME: <link="ROCKETPILOTING1">Rocket Piloting</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.ROCKETPILOT.DESCRIPTION: Allows a Duplicant to operate a <link="ROCKETCONTROLSTATION">Rocket Control Station</link> and pilot rockets
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.SENIOR_ROCKETPILOT.NAME: <link="ROCKETPILOTING2">Rocket Piloting II</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.SENIOR_ROCKETPILOT.DESC: Allows Duplicants to pilot rockets at faster speeds
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.USELESSSKILL.NAME: W.I.P. Skill
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.USELESSSKILL.DESCRIPTIO: This skill doesn't really do anything right now.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.BIONICS_A1.NAME: <link="BIONICSA1">Booster Processing I</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.BIONICS_A1.DESCRIPTION: Allows Bionic Duplicants to install an additional booster.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.BIONICS_A2.NAME: <link="BIONICSA2">Booster Processing II</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.BIONICS_A2.DESCRIPTION: Allows Bionic Duplicants to install an additional booster, and increases runspeed.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.BIONICS_A3.NAME: <link="BIONICSA3">Complex Processing</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.BIONICS_A3.DESCRIPTION: Allows Bionic Duplicants to install an additional booster, and reduces the runspeed loss experienced while wearing exosuits.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.BIONICS_B1.NAME: <link="BIONICSB1">Improved Gears I</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.BIONICS_B1.DESCRIPTION: Significantly reduces the negative impacts of low <link="LUBRICATINGOIL">Gear Oil</link>.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.BIONICS_B2.NAME: <link="BIONICSB2">Improved Gears II</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.BIONICS_B2.DESCRIPTION: Allows Bionic Duplicants to install an additional booster.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.BIONICS_B3.NAME: <link="BIONICSB3">Top Gear</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.BIONICS_B3.DESCRIPTION: Allows Bionic Duplicants to install an additional booster, and eliminates the runspeed loss experienced while wearing exosuits.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.BIONICS_C1.NAME: <link="BIONICSC1">Schematics</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.BIONICS_C1.DESCRIPTION: Allows Bionic Duplicants to perform research using a <link="ADVANCEDRESEARCHCENTER">Super Computer</link>, and craft items at the <link="ADVANCEDCRAFTINGTABLE">Soldering Station</link>.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.BIONICS_C2.NAME: <link="BIONICSC2">Advanced Schematics</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.BIONICS_C2.DESCRIPTION: Allows Bionic Duplicants to install an additional booster and increase their runspeed.
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.BIONICS_C3.NAME: <link="BIONICSC3">Power Banking</link>
DUPLICANTS.DUPLICANTS.ROLES.BIONICS_C3.DESCRIPTION: Increases <link="ELECTROBANK">Power Bank</link> storage capacity to maximize work time between replacements.

ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MATERIAL_MODIFIERS.TOOLTIP.EFFE: Buildings constructed from this material will have these properties
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MATERIAL_MODIFIERS.TOOLTIP.DECO: This material will add {0} to the finished building's Decor
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MATERIAL_MODIFIERS.TOOLTIP.OVER: This material will add {0} to the finished building's Overheat Temperature
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MATERIAL_MODIFIERS.TOOLTIP.HIGH: This material disperses Heat because energy transfers quickly through materials with high Thermal Conductivity Between two objects, the rate of Heat transfer will be determined by the object with the lowest Thermal Conductivity Thermal Conductivity: {1} W per degree K difference (Oxygen: 0.024 W)
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MATERIAL_MODIFIERS.TOOLTIP.LOW_: This material retains Heat because energy transfers slowly through materials with low Thermal Conductivity Between two objects, the rate of Heat transfer will be determined by the object with the lowest Thermal Conductivity Thermal Conductivity: {1} W per degree K difference (Oxygen: 0.024 W)

<style="KKeyword">Thermally Reactive</style> materials require little energy to raise in <style="KKeyword">Temperature</style>, and therefore heat and cool quickly

Specific Heat Capacity: {1} DTU to raise 1g by 1K
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MATERIAL_MODIFIERS.TOOLTIP.HIGH:
<style="KKeyword">Slow Heating</style> materials require a large amount of energy to raise in <style="KKeyword">Temperature</style>, and therefore heat and cool slowly

Specific Heat Capacity: {1} DTU to raise 1g by 1K
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MATERIAL_MODIFIERS.TOOLTIP.EXCE:
<style="KKeyword">Excellent Radiation Shield</style> radiation has a hard time passing through materials with a high <style="KKeyword">Radiation Absorption Factor</style> value. 

Radiation Absorption Factor: {1}
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.AEROGEL.NAME: <link="AEROGEL">Aerogel</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.ALGAE.NAME: <link="ALGAE">Algae</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.ALGAE.DESC:
Algae is a cluster of non-motile, single-celled lifeforms.

It can be used to produce <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link> when used in an <link="MINERALDEOXIDIZER">Oxygen Diffuser</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.ALUMINUMORE.NAME: <link="ALUMINUMORE">Aluminum Ore</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.ALUMINUMORE.DESC:
Aluminum ore, also known as Bauxite, is a sedimentary rock high in metal content.

It can be refined into <link="ALUMINUM">Aluminum</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.ALUMINUM.NAME: <link="ALUMINUM">Aluminum</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.ALUMINUM.DESC:
(Al) Aluminum is a low density <link="REFINEDMETAL">Metal</link>.

It has high Thermal Conductivity and is suitable for building <link="POWER">Power</link> systems.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENALUMINUM.NAME: <link="MOLTENALUMINUM">Molten Aluminum</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENALUMINUM.DESC: (Al) Molten Aluminum is a low density <link="REFINEDMETAL">Metal</link> heated into a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.ALUMINUMGAS.NAME: <link="ALUMINUMGAS">Aluminum Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.ALUMINUMGAS.DESC: (Al) Aluminum Gas is a low density <link="REFINEDMETAL">Metal</link> heated into a <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gaseous</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.BLEACHSTONE.NAME: <link="BLEACHSTONE">Bleach Stone</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.BLEACHSTONE.DESC:
Bleach stone is an unstable compound that emits unbreathable <link="CHLORINEGAS">Chlorine Gas</link>.

It is often used in <link="HANDSANITIZER">Hygienic</link> processes.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.BITUMEN.NAME: <link="BITUMEN">Bitumen</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.BITUMEN.DESC: Bitumen is a sticky viscous residue left behind from <link="PETROLEUM">Petroleum</link> production.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.BOTTLEDWATER.NAME: <link="BOTTLEDWATER">Water</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.BRINEICE.NAME: <link="BRINEICE">Brine Ice</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.BRINEICE.DESC:
Brine Ice is a natural, highly concentrated solution of <link="SALT">Salt</link> dissolved in <link="WATER">Water</link> and frozen into a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> state.

It can be used in desalination processes, separating out usable salt.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MILKICE.NAME: <link="MILKICE">Frozen Brackene</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MILKICE.DESC: Frozen Brackene is <link="MILK">Brackene</link> frozen into a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.BRINE.NAME: <link="BRINE">Brine</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.BRINE.DESC:
Brine is a natural, highly concentrated solution of <link="SALT">Salt</link> dissolved in <link="WATER">Water</link>.

It can be used in desalination processes, separating out usable salt.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CARBON.NAME: <link="CARBON">Coal</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CARBON.DESC:
(C) Coal is a combustible fossil fuel composed of carbon.

It is useful in <link="POWER">Power</link> production.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.REFINEDCARBON.NAME: <link="REFINEDCARBON">Refined Carbon</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.REFINEDCARBON.DESC: (C) Refined carbon is solid element purified from raw <link="CARBON">Coal</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.PEAT.NAME: <link="PEAT">Peat</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.PEAT.DESC:
Peat is a densely packed material made up of partially decomposed organic matter.

It is a combustible fuel, useful in <link="POWER">Power</link> production.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.ETHANOLGAS.NAME: <link="ETHANOLGAS">Ethanol Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.ETHANOLGAS.DESC: (C<sub>2</sub>H<sub>6</sub>O) Ethanol Gas is an advanced chemical compound heated into a <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gaseous</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.ETHANOL.NAME: <link="ETHANOL">Ethanol</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.ETHANOL.DESC:
(C<sub>2</sub>H<sub>6</sub>O) Ethanol is an advanced chemical compound in a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.

It can be used as a highly effective fuel source when burned.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDETHANOL.NAME: <link="SOLIDETHANOL">Solid Ethanol</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDETHANOL.DESC:
(C<sub>2</sub>H<sub>6</sub>O) Solid Ethanol is an advanced chemical compound.

It can be used as a highly effective fuel source when burned.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CARBONDIOXIDE.NAME: <link="CARBONDIOXIDE">Carbon Dioxide</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CARBONDIOXIDE.DESC:
(CO<sub>2</sub>) Carbon Dioxide is an atomically heavy chemical compound in a <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gaseous</link> state.

It tends to sink below other gases.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CARBONFIBRE.NAME: <link="CARBONFIBRE">Carbon Fiber</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CARBONFIBRE.DESC: Carbon Fiber is a <link="REFINEDMINERAL">Manufactured Material</link> with high tensile strength.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CARBONGAS.NAME: <link="CARBONGAS">Carbon Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CARBONGAS.DESC: (C) Carbon is an abundant, versatile element heated into a <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gaseous</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CHLORINE.NAME: <link="CHLORINE">Liquid Chlorine</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CHLORINE.DESC: (Cl) Chlorine is a natural <link="DISEASE">Germ</link>-killing element in a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CHLORINEGAS.NAME: <link="CHLORINEGAS">Chlorine Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CHLORINEGAS.DESC: (Cl) Chlorine is a natural <link="DISEASE">Germ</link>-killing element in a <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gaseous</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CLAY.NAME: <link="CLAY">Clay</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CLAY.DESC: Clay is a soft, naturally occurring composite of stone and soil that hardens at high Temperatures. It is a reliable Construction Material.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.BRICK.NAME: <link="BRICK">Brick</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.BRICK.DESC: Brick is a hard, brittle material formed from heated Clay. It is a reliable Construction Material.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CERAMIC.NAME: <link="CERAMIC">Ceramic</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CERAMIC.DESC: Ceramic is a hard, brittle material formed from heated Clay. It is a reliable Construction Material.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CEMENT.NAME: <link="CEMENT">Cement</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CEMENT.DESC: Cement is a refined building material used for assembling advanced buildings.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CEMENTMIX.NAME: <link="CEMENTMIX">Cement Mix</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CEMENTMIX.DESC: Cement Mix can be used to create <link="CEMENT">Cement</link> for advanced building assembly.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CONTAMINATEDOXYGEN.NAME: <link="CONTAMINATEDOXYGEN">Polluted Oxygen</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CONTAMINATEDOXYGEN.DESC:
(O<sub>2</sub>) Polluted Oxygen is dirty, unfiltered air.

It is breathable.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.COPPER.NAME: <link="COPPER">Copper</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.COPPER.DESC:
(Cu) Copper is a conductive <link="METAL">Metal</link>.

It is suitable for building <link="POWER">Power</link> systems.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.COPPERGAS.NAME: <link="COPPERGAS">Copper Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.COPPERGAS.DESC: (Cu) Copper Gas is a conductive <link="METAL">Metal</link> heated into a <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.NICKELORE.NAME: <link="NICKELORE">Nickel Ore</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.NICKELORE.DESC:
(Ni) Nickel Ore is a conductive <link="RAWMETAL">Metal</link>.

It can be refined into <link="NICKEL">Nickel</link> and is suitable for building <link="POWER">Power</link> systems.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.NICKEL.NAME: <link="NICKEL">Nickel</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.NICKEL.DESC:
(Ni) Nickel is a conductive <link="METAL">Metal</link>.

It is suitable for building <link="POWER">Power</link> systems.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENNICKEL.NAME: <link="MOLTENNICKEL">Molten Nickel</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENNICKEL.DESC: (Ni) Molten Nickel is a conductive <link="RAWMETAL">Metal</link> heated into a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.NICKELGAS.NAME: <link="NICKELGAS">Nickel Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.NICKELGAS.DESC: (Ni) Nickel Gas is a conductive <link="METAL">Metal</link> heated into a <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CREATURE.NAME: <link="CREATURE">Genetic Ooze</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CREATURE.DESC:
(DuPe) Ooze is a slurry of water, carbon, and dozens and dozens of trace elements.

Duplicants are printed from pure Ooze.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.PHYTOOIL.NAME: <link="PHYTOOIL">Phyto Oil</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.PHYTOOIL.DESC: Phyto Oil is a thick, slippery <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> extracted from pureed <link="SLIME">Slime</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.REFINEDLIPID.NAME: <link="REFINEDLIPID">Biodiesel</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.REFINEDLIPID.DESC: Biodiesel is a a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> composed of highly processed fatty acids derived from purified natural oils.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.FROZENPHYTOOIL.NAME: <link="FROZENPHYTOOIL">Frozen Phyto Oil</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.FROZENPHYTOOIL.DESC: Frozen Phyto Oil is thick, slippery <link="SLIME">Slime</link> extract, frozen into a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CRUDEOIL.NAME: <link="CRUDEOIL">Crude Oil</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CRUDEOIL.DESC:
Crude Oil is a raw potential <link="POWER">Power</link> source composed of billions of dead, primordial organisms.

It is also a useful lubricant for certain types of machinery.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.PETROLEUM.NAME: <link="PETROLEUM">Petroleum</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.PETROLEUM.DESC:
Petroleum is a <link="POWER">Power</link> source refined from <link="CRUDEOIL">Crude Oil</link>.

It is also an essential ingredient in the production of <link="POLYPROPYLENE">Plastic</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOURGAS.NAME: <link="SOURGAS">Sour Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOURGAS.DESC:
Sour Gas is a hydrocarbon <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> containing high concentrations of hydrogen sulfide.

It is a byproduct of highly heated <link="PETROLEUM">Petroleum</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CRUSHEDICE.NAME: <link="CRUSHEDICE">Crushed Ice</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CRUSHEDICE.DESC: (H<sub>2</sub>O) A slush of crushed, semi-solid ice.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CRUSHEDROCK.NAME: <link="CRUSHEDROCK">Crushed Rock</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CRUSHEDROCK.DESC: Crushed Rock is <link="IGNEOUSROCK">Igneous Rock</link> crushed into a mechanical mixture.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CUPRITE.NAME: <link="CUPRITE">Copper Ore</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CUPRITE.DESC:
(Cu<sub>2</sub>O) Copper Ore is a conductive <link="RAWMETAL">Metal</link>.

It is suitable for building <link="POWER">Power</link> systems.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.DEPLETEDURANIUM.NAME: <link="DEPLETEDURANIUM">Depleted Uranium</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.DEPLETEDURANIUM.DESC:
(U) Depleted Uranium is <link="URANIUMORE">Uranium</link> with a low U-235 content.

It is created as a byproduct of <link="ENRICHEDURANIUM">Enriched Uranium</link> and is no longer suitable as fuel.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.DIAMOND.NAME: <link="DIAMOND">Diamond</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.DIAMOND.DESC:
(C) Diamond is industrial-grade, high density carbon.

It is very difficult to excavate.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.DIRT.NAME: <link="DIRT">Dirt</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.DIRT.DESC:
Dirt is a soft, nutrient-rich substance capable of supporting life.

It is necessary in some forms of <link="FOOD">Food</link> production.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.DIRTYICE.NAME: <link="DIRTYICE">Polluted Ice</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.DIRTYICE.DESC: Polluted Ice is dirty, unfiltered water frozen into a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.DIRTYWATER.NAME: <link="DIRTYWATER">Polluted Water</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.DIRTYWATER.DESC:
Polluted Water is dirty, unfiltered <link="WATER">Water</link>.

It is not fit for consumption.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.ELECTRUM.NAME: <link="ELECTRUM">Electrum</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.ELECTRUM.DESC:
Electrum is a conductive <link="RAWMETAL">Metal</link> alloy composed of gold and silver.

It is suitable for building <link="POWER">Power</link> systems.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.ENRICHEDURANIUM.NAME: <link="ENRICHEDURANIUM">Enriched Uranium</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.ENRICHEDURANIUM.DESC:
(U) Enriched Uranium is a refined substance primarily used to <link="POWER">Power</link> potent research reactors.

It becomes highly <link="RADIATION">Radioactive</link> when consumed.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.FERTILIZER.NAME: <link="FERTILIZER">Fertilizer</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.FERTILIZER.DESC:
Fertilizer is a processed mixture of biological nutrients.

It aids in the growth of certain <link="PLANTS">Plants</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.PONDSCUM.NAME: <link="PONDSCUM">Pondscum</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.PONDSCUM.DESC:
Pondscum is a soft, naturally occurring composite of biological nutrients.

It may be processed into <link="FERTILIZER">Fertilizer</link> and aids in the growth of certain <link="PLANTS">Plants</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.FALLOUT.NAME: <link="FALLOUT">Nuclear Fallout</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.FALLOUT.DESC: Nuclear Fallout is a highly toxic gas full of <link="RADIATION">Radioactive Contaminants</link>. Condenses into <link="NUCLEARWASTE">Liquid Nuclear Waste</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.FOOLSGOLD.NAME: <link="FOOLSGOLD">Pyrite</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.FOOLSGOLD.DESC:
(FeS<sub>2</sub>) Pyrite is a conductive <link="RAWMETAL">Metal</link>.

Also known as "Fool's Gold", is suitable for building <link="POWER">Power</link> systems.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.FULLERENE.NAME: <link="FULLERENE">Fullerene</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.FULLERENE.DESC: (C<sub>60</sub>) Fullerene is a form of <link="CARBON">Coal</link> consisting of spherical molecules.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.GLASS.NAME: <link="GLASS">Glass</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.GLASS.DESC: Glass is a brittle, transparent substance formed from <link="SAND">Sand</link> fired at high temperatures.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.GOLD.NAME: <link="GOLD">Gold</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.GOLD.DESC:
(Au) Gold is a conductive precious <link="RAWMETAL">Metal</link>.

It is suitable for building <link="POWER">Power</link> systems.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.GOLDAMALGAM.NAME: <link="GOLDAMALGAM">Gold Amalgam</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.GOLDAMALGAM.DESC:
Gold Amalgam is a conductive amalgam of gold and mercury.

It is suitable for building <link="POWER">Power</link> systems.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.GOLDGAS.NAME: <link="GOLDGAS">Gold Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.GOLDGAS.DESC: (Au) Gold Gas is a conductive precious <link="RAWMETAL">Metal</link>, heated into a <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gaseous</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.GRANITE.NAME: <link="GRANITE">Granite</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.GRANITE.DESC: Granite is a dense composite of Igneous Rock. It is useful as a Construction Material.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.GRAPHITE.NAME: <link="GRAPHITE">Graphite</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.GRAPHITE.DESC: (C) Graphite is the most stable form of carbon. It has high thermal conductivity and is useful as a Construction Material.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LIQUIDGUNK.NAME: <link="LIQUIDGUNK">Gunk</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LIQUIDGUNK.DESC:
Gunk is the built-up grime and grit produced by Duplicants' bionic mechanisms.

It is unpleasantly viscous.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.GUNK.NAME: <link="GUNK">Solid Gunk</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.GUNK.DESC: Solid Gunk is the built-up grime and grit produced by Duplicants' bionic mechanisms, which has been frozen into a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDNUCLEARWASTE.NAME: <link="SOLIDNUCLEARWASTE">Solid Nuclear Waste</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDNUCLEARWASTE.DESC: Highly toxic solid full of <link="RADIATION">Radioactive Contaminants</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.HELIUM.NAME: <link="HELIUM">Helium</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.HELIUM.DESC: (He) Helium is an atomically lightweight, chemical <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.HYDROGEN.NAME: <link="HYDROGEN">Hydrogen Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.HYDROGEN.DESC: (H) Hydrogen Gas is the universe's most common and atomically light element in a <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gaseous</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.ICE.NAME: <link="ICE">Ice</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.ICE.DESC: (H<sub>2</sub>O) Ice is clean water frozen into a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.IGNEOUSROCK.NAME: <link="IGNEOUSROCK">Igneous Rock</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.IGNEOUSROCK.DESC: Igneous Rock is a composite of solidified volcanic rock. It is useful as a Construction Material.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.IRIDIUM.NAME: <link="IRIDIUM">Iridium</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.IRIDIUM.DESC: (Ir) Iridium is a firm and highly conductive <link="METAL">Metal</link> that can withstand extreme  <link="HEAT">Heat</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENIRIDIUM.NAME: <link="MOLTENIRIDIUM">Molten Iridium</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENIRIDIUM.DESC: (Ir) Molten Iridium is a highly conductive <link="METAL">Metal</link> heated to a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link>  state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.IRIDIUMGAS.NAME: <link="IRIDIUMGAS">Iridium Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.IRIDIUMGAS.DESC: (Ir) Iridium Gas is a highly conductive <link="METAL">Metal</link> heated into a  <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.AMBER.NAME: <link="AMBER">Amber</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.AMBER.DESC: Amber is a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> organic composite of <link="NATURALRESIN">Resin</link> and <link="FOSSIL">Fossil</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.NATURALRESIN.NAME: <link="NATURALRESIN">Resin</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.NATURALRESIN.DESC:
Resin is a viscous organic <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link>.

It can be treated to become <link="POLYPROPYLENE">Plastic</link> in the <link="POLYMERIZER">Polymer Press</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.NATURALSOLIDRESIN.NAME: <link="NATURALSOLIDRESIN">Solid Resin</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.NATURALSOLIDRESIN.DESC:
Resin that has been cooled to a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> state.

It can be treated to become <link="POLYPROPYLENE">Plastic</link> in the <link="POLYMERIZER">Polymer Press</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.ISORESIN.NAME: <link="ISORESIN">Isosap</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.ISORESIN.DESC:
Isosap is a crystallized sap composed of long-chain polymers.

It is used in the production of rare, high grade materials.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.RESIN.NAME: <link="RESIN">Sap</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.RESIN.DESC:
Sticky goo harvested from a grumpy tree.

It can be polymerized into <link="ISORESIN">Isosap</link> by boiling away its excess moisture.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDRESIN.NAME: <link="SOLIDRESIN">Solid Sap</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDRESIN.DESC:
Solidified goo harvested from a grumpy tree.

It is used in the production of <link="ISORESIN">Isosap</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.IRON.NAME: <link="IRON">Iron</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.IRONGAS.NAME: <link="IRONGAS">Iron Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.IRONGAS.DESC: (Fe) Iron Gas is a common industrial <link="RAWMETAL">Metal</link>, heated into a <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.IRONORE.NAME: <link="IRONORE">Iron Ore</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.IRONORE.DESC:
(Fe) Iron Ore is a soft <link="RAWMETAL">Metal</link>.

It is suitable for building <link="POWER">Power</link> systems.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.COBALTGAS.NAME: <link="COBALTGAS">Cobalt Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.COBALTGAS.DESC: (Co) Cobalt is a <link="REFINEDMETAL">Refined Metal</link>, heated into a <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.COBALT.NAME: <link="COBALT">Cobalt</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.COBALT.DESC: (Co) Cobalt is a <link="REFINEDMETAL">Refined Metal</link> made from <link="COBALTITE">Cobalt Ore</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.COBALTITE.NAME: <link="COBALTITE">Cobalt Ore</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.COBALTITE.DESC:
(Co) Cobalt Ore is a blue-hued <link="BUILDINGMATERIALCLASSES">Metal</link>.

It is suitable for building <link="POWER">Power</link> systems.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.KATAIRITE.NAME: <link="KATAIRITE">Abyssalite</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.KATAIRITE.DESC: (Ab) Abyssalite is a resilient, crystalline element.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LIME.NAME: <link="LIME">Lime</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LIME.DESC: (CaCO3) Lime is a mineral commonly found in Critter egg shells. It is useful as a Construction Material.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.FOSSIL.NAME: <link="FOSSIL">Fossil</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.FOSSIL.DESC: Fossil is organic matter, highly compressed and hardened into a mineral state. It is useful as a Construction Material.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LEADGAS.NAME: <link="LEADGAS">Lead Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LEADGAS.DESC: (Pb) Lead Gas is a soft yet extremely dense <link="REFINEDMETAL">Refined Metal</link> heated into a <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gaseous</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LEAD.NAME: <link="LEAD">Lead</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LEAD.DESC:
(Pb) Lead is a soft yet extremely dense <link="REFINEDMETAL">Refined Metal</link>.

It has a low Overheat Temperature and is suitable for building <link="POWER">Power</link> systems.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LIQUIDCARBONDIOXIDE.NAME: <link="LIQUIDCARBONDIOXIDE">Liquid Carbon Dioxide</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LIQUIDCARBONDIOXIDE.DESC:
(CO<sub>2</sub>) Carbon Dioxide is an unbreathable chemical compound.

This selection is currently in a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LIQUIDHELIUM.NAME: <link="LIQUIDHELIUM">Helium</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LIQUIDHELIUM.DESC: (He) Helium is an atomically lightweight chemical element cooled into a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LIQUIDHYDROGEN.NAME: <link="LIQUIDHYDROGEN">Liquid Hydrogen</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LIQUIDHYDROGEN.DESC:
(H) Hydrogen in its <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.

It freezes most substances that come into contact with it.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LIQUIDOXYGEN.NAME: <link="LIQUIDOXYGEN">Liquid Oxygen</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LIQUIDOXYGEN.DESC:
(O<sub>2</sub>) Oxygen is a breathable chemical.

This selection is in a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LIQUIDMETHANE.NAME: <link="LIQUIDMETHANE">Liquid Methane</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LIQUIDMETHANE.DESC:
(CH<sub>4</sub>) Methane is an alkane.

This selection is in a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LIQUIDPHOSPHORUS.NAME: <link="LIQUIDPHOSPHORUS">Liquid Phosphorus</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LIQUIDPHOSPHORUS.DESC:
(P) Phosphorus is a chemical element.

This selection is in a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LIQUIDPROPANE.NAME: <link="LIQUIDPROPANE">Liquid Propane</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LIQUIDPROPANE.DESC:
(C<sub>3</sub>H<sub>8</sub>) Propane is an alkane.

This selection is in a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.

It is useful in <link="POWER">Power</link> production.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LIQUIDSULFUR.NAME: <link="LIQUIDSULFUR">Liquid Sulfur</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.LIQUIDSULFUR.DESC:
(S) Sulfur is a common chemical element and byproduct of <link="METHANE">Natural Gas</link> production.

This selection is in a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MAFICROCK.NAME: <link="MAFICROCK">Mafic Rock</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MAFICROCK.DESC: Mafic Rock is a variation of Igneous Rock that is rich in Iron. It is useful as a Construction Material.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MAGMA.NAME: <link="MAGMA">Magma</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MAGMA.DESC: Magma is a composite of <link="IGNEOUSROCK">Igneous Rock</link> heated into a molten, <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.WOODLOG.NAME: <link="WOOD">Wood</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.WOODLOG.DESC: Wood is a good source of Heat and Power. Its insulation properties and positive Decor also make it a useful Construction Material.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CINNABAR.NAME: <link="CINNABAR">Cinnabar Ore</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CINNABAR.DESC:
(HgS) Cinnabar Ore, also known as mercury sulfide, is a conductive <link="RAWMETAL">Metal</link> that can be refined into <link="MERCURY">Mercury</link>.

It is suitable for building <link="POWER">Power</link> systems.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.TALLOW.NAME: <link="TALLOW">Tallow</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.TALLOW.DESC: A chunk of raw grease that can be used in <link="FOOD">Food</link> production or industrial processes.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MERCURY.NAME: <link="MERCURY">Mercury</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MERCURYGAS.NAME: <link="MERCURYGAS">Mercury Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MERCURYGAS.DESC: (Hg) Mercury Gas is a <link="RAWMETAL">Metal</link> heated into a <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gaseous</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.METHANE.NAME: <link="METHANE">Natural Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.METHANE.DESC:
Natural Gas is a mixture of various alkanes in a <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gaseous</link> state.

It is useful in <link="POWER">Power</link> production.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MILK.NAME: <link="MILK">Brackene</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MILK.DESC:
Brackene is a sodium-rich <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link>.

It is useful in <link="RANCHING">Ranching</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MILKFAT.NAME: <link="MILKFAT">Brackwax</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENCARBON.NAME: <link="MOLTENCARBON">Liquid Carbon</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENCARBON.DESC: (C) Liquid Carbon is an abundant, versatile element heated into a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENCOPPER.NAME: <link="MOLTENCOPPER">Molten Copper</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENCOPPER.DESC: (Cu) Molten Copper is a conductive <link="RAWMETAL">Metal</link> heated into a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENGLASS.NAME: <link="MOLTENGLASS">Molten Glass</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENGLASS.DESC: Molten Glass is a composite of granular rock, heated into a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENGOLD.NAME: <link="MOLTENGOLD">Molten Gold</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENGOLD.DESC: (Au) Gold, a conductive precious <link="RAWMETAL">Metal</link>, heated into a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENIRON.NAME: <link="MOLTENIRON">Molten Iron</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENIRON.DESC: (Fe) Molten Iron is a common industrial <link="RAWMETAL">Metal</link> heated into a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENCOBALT.NAME: <link="MOLTENCOBALT">Molten Cobalt</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENCOBALT.DESC: (Co) Molten Cobalt is a <link="REFINEDMETAL">Refined Metal</link> heated into a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENLEAD.NAME: <link="MOLTENLEAD">Molten Lead</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENLEAD.DESC: (Pb) Lead is an extremely dense <link="REFINEDMETAL">Refined Metal</link> heated into a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENNIOBIUM.NAME: <link="MOLTENNIOBIUM">Molten Niobium</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENNIOBIUM.DESC: (Nb) Molten Niobium is a rare metal heated into a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENTUNGSTEN.NAME: <link="MOLTENTUNGSTEN">Molten Tungsten</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENTUNGSTEN.DESC: (W) Molten Tungsten is a crystalline <link="RAWMETAL">Metal</link> heated into a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENTUNGSTENDISELENIDE.NAME: <link="MOLTENTUNGSTENDISELENIDE">Tungsten Diselenide</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENTUNGSTENDISELENIDE.DESC: (WSe<sub>2</sub>) Tungsten Diselenide is an inorganic <link="RAWMETAL">Metal</link> compound heated into a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENSTEEL.NAME: <link="MOLTENSTEEL">Molten Steel</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENSTEEL.DESC: Molten Steel is a <link="RAWMETAL">Metal</link> alloy of iron and carbon, heated into a hazardous <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENURANIUM.NAME: <link="MOLTENURANIUM">Liquid Uranium</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENURANIUM.DESC:
(U) Liquid Uranium is a highly <link="RADIATION">Radioactive</link> substance, heated into a hazardous <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.

It is a byproduct of <link="ENRICHEDURANIUM">Enriched Uranium</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.NIOBIUM.NAME: <link="NIOBIUM">Niobium</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.NIOBIUM.DESC: (Nb) Niobium is a rare metal with many practical applications in metallurgy and superconductor <link="RESEARCH">Research</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.NIOBIUMGAS.NAME: <link="NIOBIUMGAS">Niobium Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.NIOBIUMGAS.DESC:
(Nb) Niobium Gas is a rare metal.

This selection is in a <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gaseous</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.NUCLEARWASTE.NAME: <link="NUCLEARWASTE">Liquid Nuclear Waste</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.NUCLEARWASTE.DESC: Highly toxic liquid full of <link="RADIATION">Radioactive Contaminants</link> which emit <link="RADIATION">Radiation</link> that can be absorbed by <link="HIGHENERGYPARTICLESPAWNER">Radbolt Generators</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.OBSIDIAN.NAME: <link="OBSIDIAN">Obsidian</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.OBSIDIAN.DESC: Obsidian is a brittle composite of volcanic <link="GLASS">Glass</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.OXYGEN.NAME: <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.OXYGEN.DESC:
(O<sub>2</sub>) Oxygen is an atomically lightweight and breathable <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link>, necessary for sustaining life.

It tends to rise above other gases.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.OXYROCK.NAME: <link="OXYROCK">Oxylite</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.OXYROCK.DESC:
(Ir<sub>3</sub>O<sub>2</sub>) Oxylite is a chemical compound that slowly emits breathable <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link>.

Excavating <link="OXYROCK">Oxylite</link> increases its emission rate, but depletes the ore more rapidly.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.PHOSPHATENODULES.NAME: <link="PHOSPHATENODULES">Phosphate Nodules</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.PHOSPHATENODULES.DESC: (PO<sup>3-</sup><sub>4</sub>) Nodules of sedimentary rock containing high concentrations of phosphate.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.PHOSPHORITE.NAME: <link="PHOSPHORITE">Phosphorite</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.PHOSPHORITE.DESC: Phosphorite is a composite of sedimentary rock, saturated with phosphate.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.PHOSPHORUS.NAME: <link="PHOSPHORUS">Refined Phosphorus</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.PHOSPHORUS.DESC: (P) Refined Phosphorus is a chemical element in its <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.PHOSPHORUSGAS.NAME: <link="PHOSPHORUSGAS">Phosphorus Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.PHOSPHORUSGAS.DESC: (P) Phosphorus Gas is the <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gaseous</link> state of <link="PHOSPHORUS">Refined Phosphorus</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.PROPANE.NAME: <link="PROPANE">Propane Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.PROPANE.DESC:
(C<sub>3</sub>H<sub>8</sub>) Propane Gas is a natural alkane.

This selection is in a <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gaseous</link> state.

It is useful in <link="POWER">Power</link> production.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.RADIUM.NAME: <link="RADIUM">Radium</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.RADIUM.DESC:
(Ra) Radium is a <link="LIGHT">Light</link> emitting radioactive substance.

It is useful as a <link="POWER">Power</link> source.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.YELLOWCAKE.NAME: <link="YELLOWCAKE">Yellowcake</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.YELLOWCAKE.DESC:
(U<sub>3</sub>O<sub>8</sub>) Yellowcake is a byproduct of <link="URANIUM">Uranium</link> mining.

It is useful in preparing fuel for <link="NUCLEARREACTOR">Research Reactors</link>.

Note: Do not eat.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.ROCKGAS.NAME: <link="ROCKGAS">Rock Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.ROCKGAS.DESC: Rock Gas is rock that has been superheated into a <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gaseous</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.RUST.NAME: <link="RUST">Rust</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.RUST.DESC:
Rust is an iron oxide that forms from the breakdown of <link="IRON">Iron</link>.

It is useful in some <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link> production processes.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.REGOLITH.NAME: <link="REGOLITH">Regolith</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.REGOLITH.DESC:
Regolith is a sandy substance composed of the various particles that collect atop terrestrial objects.

It is useful as a <link="FILTER">Filtration Medium</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SALTGAS.NAME: <link="SALTGAS">Salt Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SALTGAS.DESC: (NaCl) Salt Gas is an edible chemical compound that has been superheated into a <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gaseous</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENSALT.NAME: <link="MOLTENSALT">Molten Salt</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENSALT.DESC: (NaCl) Molten Salt is an edible chemical compound that has been heated into a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SALT.NAME: <link="SALT">Salt</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SALT.DESC:
(NaCl) Salt, also known as sodium chloride, is an edible chemical compound.

When refined, it can be eaten with meals to increase Duplicant <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SALTWATER.NAME: <link="SALTWATER">Salt Water</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SALTWATER.DESC:
Salt Water is a natural, lightly concentrated solution of <link="SALT">Salt</link> dissolved in <link="WATER">Water</link>.

It can be used in desalination processes, separating out usable salt.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SAND.NAME: <link="SAND">Sand</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SAND.DESC:
Sand is a composite of granular rock.

It is useful as a <link="FILTER">Filtration Medium</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SANDCEMENT.NAME: <link="SANDCEMENT">Sand Cement</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SANDSTONE.NAME: <link="SANDSTONE">Sandstone</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SANDSTONE.DESC: Sandstone is a composite of relatively soft sedimentary rock. It is useful as a Construction Material.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SEDIMENTARYROCK.NAME: <link="SEDIMENTARYROCK">Sedimentary Rock</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SEDIMENTARYROCK.DESC: Sedimentary Rock is a hardened composite of sediment layers. It is useful as a Construction Material.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SHALE.NAME: <link="SHALE">Shale</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SHALE.DESC: Shale is a brittle composite of sediment layers. It is useful as a Construction Material.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SLIMEMOLD.NAME: <link="SLIMEMOLD">Slime</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SLIMEMOLD.DESC:
Slime is a thick biomixture of algae, fungi, and mucopolysaccharides.

It can be distilled into <link="ALGAE">Algae</link> and emits <link="CONTAMINATEDOXYGEN">Polluted Oxygen</link> once dug up.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SNOW.NAME: <link="SNOW">Snow</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SNOW.DESC:
(H<sub>2</sub>O) Snow is a mass of loose, crystalline ice particles.

It becomes <link="WATER">Water</link> when melted.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.STABLESNOW.NAME: Packed <link="SNOW">Snow</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.STABLESNOW.DESC:
(H<sub>2</sub>O) Snow is a mass of loose, crystalline ice particles.

It becomes <link="WATER">Water</link> when melted.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDCARBONDIOXIDE.NAME: <link="SOLIDCARBONDIOXIDE">Solid Carbon Dioxide</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDCARBONDIOXIDE.DESC: (CO<sub>2</sub>) Carbon Dioxide is an unbreathable compound in a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDCHLORINE.NAME: <link="SOLIDCHLORINE">Solid Chlorine</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDCHLORINE.DESC: (Cl) Chlorine is a natural <link="DISEASE">Germ</link>-killing element in a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDCRUDEOIL.NAME: <link="SOLIDCRUDEOIL">Solid Crude Oil</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDHYDROGEN.NAME: <link="SOLIDHYDROGEN">Solid Hydrogen</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDHYDROGEN.DESC: (H) Solid Hydrogen is the universe's most common element in a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDMERCURY.NAME: <link="SOLIDMERCURY">Mercury</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDMERCURY.DESC: (Hg) Mercury is a rare <link="RAWMETAL">Metal</link> in a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDOXYGEN.NAME: <link="SOLIDOXYGEN">Solid Oxygen</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDOXYGEN.DESC: (O<sub>2</sub>) Solid Oxygen is a breathable element in a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDMETHANE.NAME: <link="SOLIDMETHANE">Solid Methane</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDMETHANE.DESC: (CH<sub>4</sub>) Methane is an alkane in a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDNAPHTHA.NAME: <link="SOLIDNAPHTHA">Solid Naphtha</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDNAPHTHA.DESC: Naphtha is a distilled hydrocarbon mixture in a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CORIUM.NAME: <link="CORIUM">Corium</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.CORIUM.DESC:
A radioactive mixture of nuclear waste and melted reactor materials.

Releases <link="FALLOUT">Nuclear Fallout</link> gas.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDPETROLEUM.NAME: <link="SOLIDPETROLEUM">Solid Petroleum</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDPETROLEUM.DESC:
Petroleum is a <link="POWER">Power</link> source.

This selection is in a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDPROPANE.NAME: <link="SOLIDPROPANE">Solid Propane</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDPROPANE.DESC: (C<sub>3</sub>H<sub>8</sub>) Solid Propane is a natural gas in a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDSUPERCOOLANT.NAME: <link="SOLIDSUPERCOOLANT">Solid Super Coolant</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDSUPERCOOLANT.DESC:
Super Coolant is an industrial-grade <link="FULLERENE">Fullerene</link> coolant.

This selection is in a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDVISCOGEL.NAME: <link="SOLIDVISCOGEL">Solid Visco-Gel</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDVISCOGEL.DESC:
Visco-Gel is a polymer that has high surface tension when in <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> form.

This selection is in a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SYNGAS.NAME: <link="SYNGAS">Synthesis Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SYNGAS.DESC:
Synthesis Gas is an artificial, unbreathable <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link>.

It can be converted into an efficient fuel.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENSYNGAS.NAME: <link="SYNGAS">Molten Synthesis Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENSYNGAS.DESC:
Molten Synthesis Gas is an artificial, unbreathable <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link>.

It can be converted into an efficient fuel.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDSYNGAS.NAME: <link="SYNGAS">Solid Synthesis Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SOLIDSYNGAS.DESC:
Solid Synthesis Gas is an artificial, unbreathable <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link>.

It can be converted into an efficient fuel.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.STEAM.NAME: <link="STEAM">Steam</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.STEAM.DESC: (H<sub>2</sub>O) Steam is <link="WATER">Water</link> that has been heated into a scalding <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.STEEL.NAME: <link="STEEL">Steel</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.STEEL.DESC: Steel is a <link="REFINEDMETAL">Metal Alloy</link> composed of iron and carbon.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.STEELGAS.NAME: <link="STEELGAS">Steel Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.STEELGAS.DESC: Steel Gas is a superheated <link="RAWMETAL">Metal</link> <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gas</link> composed of iron and carbon.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SUGARWATER.NAME: <link="SUGARWATER">Nectar</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SUGARWATER.DESC: Nectar is a natural, lightly concentrated solution of <link="SUCROSE">Sucrose</link> dissolved in <link="WATER">Water</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SULFUR.NAME: <link="SULFUR">Sulfur</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SULFUR.DESC:
(S) Sulfur is a common chemical element and byproduct of <link="METHANE">Natural Gas</link> production.

This selection is in a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SULFURGAS.NAME: <link="SULFURGAS">Sulfur Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SULFURGAS.DESC:
(S) Sulfur is a common chemical element and byproduct of <link="METHANE">Natural Gas</link> production.

This selection is in a <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gaseous</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SUPERCOOLANT.NAME: <link="SUPERCOOLANT">Super Coolant</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SUPERCOOLANT.DESC:
Super Coolant is an industrial-grade coolant that utilizes the unusual energy states of <link="FULLERENE">Fullerene</link>.

This selection is in a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SUPERCOOLANTGAS.NAME: <link="SUPERCOOLANTGAS">Super Coolant Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SUPERCOOLANTGAS.DESC:
Super Coolant is an industrial-grade <link="FULLERENE">Fullerene</link> coolant.

This selection is in a <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gaseous</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SUPERINSULATOR.NAME: <link="SUPERINSULATOR">Insulite</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SUPERINSULATOR.DESC: Insulite reduces <link="HEAT">Heat Transfer</link> and is composed of recrystallized <link="KATAIRITE">Abyssalite</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.TEMPCONDUCTORSOLID.NAME: <link="TEMPCONDUCTORSOLID">Thermium</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.TEMPCONDUCTORSOLID.DESC: Thermium is an industrial metal alloy formulated to maximize <link="HEAT">Heat Transfer</link> and thermal dispersion.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.TUNGSTEN.NAME: <link="TUNGSTEN">Tungsten</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.TUNGSTEN.DESC:
(W) Tungsten is an extremely tough crystalline <link="RAWMETAL">Metal</link>.

It is suitable for building <link="POWER">Power</link> systems.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.TUNGSTENGAS.NAME: <link="TUNGSTENGAS">Tungsten Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.TUNGSTENGAS.DESC:
(W) Tungsten is a superheated crystalline <link="RAWMETAL">Metal</link>.

This selection is in a <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gaseous</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.TUNGSTENDISELENIDE.NAME: <link="TUNGSTENDISELENIDE">Tungsten Diselenide</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.TUNGSTENDISELENIDE.DESC:
(WSe<sub>2</sub>) Tungsten Diselenide is an inorganic <link="RAWMETAL">Metal</link> compound with a crystalline structure.

It is suitable for building <link="POWER">Power</link> systems.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.TUNGSTENDISELENIDEGAS.NAME: <link="TUNGSTENDISELENIDEGAS">Tungsten Diselenide Gas</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.TUNGSTENDISELENIDEGAS.DESC: (WSe<sub>2</sub>) Tungsten Diselenide Gasis a superheated <link="RAWMETAL">Metal</link> compound in a <link="ELEMENTSGAS">Gaseous</link> state.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.TOXICSAND.NAME: <link="TOXICSAND">Polluted Dirt</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.TOXICSAND.DESC:
Polluted Dirt is unprocessed biological waste.

It emits <link="CONTAMINATEDOXYGEN">Polluted Oxygen</link> over time.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.UNOBTANIUM.NAME: <link="UNOBTANIUM">Neutronium</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.UNOBTANIUM.DESC:
(Nt) Neutronium is a mysterious and extremely resilient element.

It cannot be excavated by any Duplicant mining tool.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.URANIUMORE.NAME: <link="URANIUMORE">Uranium Ore</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.URANIUMORE.DESC:
(U) Uranium Ore is a highly <link="RADIATION">Radioactive</link> substance.

It can be refined into fuel for research reactors.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.VACUUM.NAME: <link="VACUUM">Vacuum</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.VACUUM.DESC: A vacuum is a space devoid of all matter.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.VISCOGEL.NAME: <link="VISCOGEL">Visco-Gel Fluid</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.VISCOGEL.DESC: Visco-Gel Fluid is a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> polymer with high surface tension, preventing typical liquid flow and allowing for unusual configurations.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.VOID.NAME: <link="VOID">Void</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.COMPOSITION.NAME: <link="COMPOSITION">Composition</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.COMPOSITION.DESC: A mixture of two or more elements.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.WATER.NAME: <link="WATER">Water</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.WOLFRAMITE.NAME: <link="WOLFRAMITE">Wolframite</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.WOLFRAMITE.DESC:
((Fe,Mn)WO<sub>4</sub>) Wolframite is a dense Metallic element in a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> state.

It is a source of <link="TUNGSTEN">Tungsten</link> and is suitable for building <link="POWER">Power</link> systems.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.TESTELEMENT.NAME: <link="TESTELEMENT">Test Element</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.TESTELEMENT.DESC:
((Fe,Mn)WO<sub>4</sub>) Wolframite is a dense Metallic element in a <link="ELEMENTSSOLID">Solid</link> state.

It is a source of <link="TUNGSTEN">Tungsten</link> and is suitable for building <link="POWER">Power</link> systems.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.POLYPROPYLENE.NAME: <link="POLYPROPYLENE">Plastic</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.POLYPROPYLENE.DESC:
(C<sub>3</sub>H<sub>6</sub>)<sub>n</sub> <link="POLYPROPYLENE">Plastic</link> is a thermoplastic polymer.

It is useful for constructing a variety of advanced buildings and equipment.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.POLYPROPYLENE.BUILD_DESC: Buildings made of this <link="POLYPROPYLENE">Plastic</link> have antiseptic properties
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.HARDPOLYPROPYLENE.NAME: <link="HARDPOLYPROPYLENE">Plastium</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.HARDPOLYPROPYLENE.DESC:
<link="HARDPOLYPROPYLENE">Plastium</link> is an advanced thermoplastic polymer made from <link="TEMPCONDUCTORSOLID">Thermium</link>, <link="POLYPROPYLENE">Plastic</link> and <link="MILKFAT">Brackwax</link>.

It is highly heat-resistant and suitable for use in space buildings.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.NAPHTHA.NAME: <link="NAPHTHA">Liquid Naphtha</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.NAPHTHA.DESC: Naphtha a distilled hydrocarbon mixture produced from the burning of <link="POLYPROPYLENE">Plastic</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SLABS.NAME: <link="SLABS">Building Slab</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SLABS.DESC: Slabs are a refined mineral building block used for assembling advanced buildings.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.TOXICMUD.NAME: <link="TOXICMUD">Polluted Mud</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.TOXICMUD.DESC:
A mixture of <link="TOXICSAND">Polluted Dirt</link> and <link="DIRTYWATER">Polluted Water</link>.

Can be separated into its base elements using a <link="SLUDGEPRESS">Sludge Press</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MUD.NAME: <link="MUD">Mud</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MUD.DESC:
A mixture of <link="DIRT">Dirt</link> and <link="WATER">Water</link>.

Can be separated into its base elements using a <link="SLUDGEPRESS">Sludge Press</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SUCROSE.NAME: <link="SUCROSE">Sucrose</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.SUCROSE.DESC:
(C<sub>12</sub>H<sub>22</sub>O<sub>11</sub>) Sucrose is the raw form of sugar.

It can be used for cooking higher-quality <link="FOOD">Food</link>.
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENSUCROSE.NAME: <link="MOLTENSUCROSE">Liquid Sucrose</link>
ELEMENTS.ELEMENTS.MOLTENSUCROSE.DESC: (C<sub>12</sub>H<sub>22</sub>O<sub>11</sub>) Liquid Sucrose is the raw form of sugar, heated into a <link="ELEMENTSLIQUID">Liquid</link> state.

EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.OXYGEN_MASK.NAME: <link="OXYGENMASK">Oxygen Mask</link>
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.OXYGEN_MASK.DESC: Ensures my Duplicants can breathe easy... for a little while, anyways.
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.OXYGEN_MASK.EFFECT:
Supplies Duplicants with <style="oxygen">Oxygen</style> in toxic and low breathability environments.

Must be refilled with oxygen at an <link="OXYGENMASKLOCKER">Oxygen Mask Dock</link> when depleted.
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.OXYGEN_MASK.RECIPE_DES: Supplies Duplicants with <style="oxygen">Oxygen</style> in toxic and low breathability environments.
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.OXYGEN_MASK.WORN_DESC:
A worn out <link="OXYGENMASK">Oxygen Mask</link>.

Masks can be repaired at a <link="CRAFTINGTABLE">Crafting Station</link>.
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.ATMO_SUIT.NAME: <link="ATMOSUIT">Atmo Suit</link>
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.ATMO_SUIT.DESC: Ensures my Duplicants can breathe easy, anytime, anywhere.
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.ATMO_SUIT.EFFECT:
Supplies Duplicants with <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link> in toxic and low breathability environments, and protects against extreme temperatures.

Must be refilled with oxygen at an <link="SUITLOCKER">Atmo Suit Dock</link> when depleted.
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.ATMO_SUIT.RECIPE_DESC: Supplies Duplicants with <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link> in toxic and low breathability environments.
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.ATMO_SUIT.WORN_DESC:
A worn out <link="ATMOSUIT">Atmo Suit</link>.

Suits can be repaired at an <link="SUITFABRICATOR">Exosuit Forge</link>.
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.ATMO_SUIT.REPAIR_WORN_: Restore a <link="ATMOSUIT">Worn Atmo Suit</link> to working order.
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.ATMO_SUIT_SET.PUFT.DES:
Critter-forward protective gear for the intrepid explorer!
Released for Klei Fest 2023.
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.HOLIDAY_2023_CRATE.DES: An unaddressed package has been discovered near the Printing Pod. It exudes seasonal cheer, and trace amounts of Neutronium have been detected.
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.ATMO_SUIT_HELMET.NAME: Default Atmo Helmet
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.ATMO_SUIT_HELMET.FACAD: Fresh, fruity and full of breathable air.

Convincing enough to fool most Pufts and even a few Duplicants.
Released for Klei Fest 2023.
It is neither an egg, nor a plant. But it is a functional helmet.
Abstract geometrics are both hip and square.
The twin antennae serve as an early warning system for low ceilings.
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.ATMO_SUIT_BODY.NAME: Default Atmo Uniform
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.ATMO_SUIT_BODY.DESC: Default top and bottom of an atmo suit.
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.ATMO_SUIT_BODY.FACADES: Protects the wearer from hostile environments and drab fashion.
Protects the wearer from hostile environments and drab fashion.

Designed by the Primary Colors Appreciation Society.
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.ATMO_SUIT_GLOVES.NAME: Default Atmo Gloves

EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.ATMO_SUIT_BELT.NAME: Default Atmo Belt
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.ATMO_SUIT_BELT.FACADES: It's red! It's shiny! It keeps atmo suit pants on!
It's green! It's shiny! It keeps atmo suit pants on!
It's blue! It's shiny! It keeps atmo suit pants on!

If critters wore belts...

EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.ATMO_SUIT_SHOES.NAME: Default Atmo Boots

EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.AQUA_SUIT.NAME: <link="AQUASUIT">Aqua Suit</link>
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.AQUA_SUIT.DESC: Because breathing underwater is better than... not.

Supplies Duplicants with <style="oxygen">Oxygen</style> in underwater environments.

Must be refilled with <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link> at an <link="SUITLOCKER">Atmo Suit Dock</link> when depleted.

A worn out <link="AQUASUIT">Aqua Suit</link>.

EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.TEMPERATURE_SUIT.NAME: <link="TEMPERATURESUIT">Thermo Suit</link>
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.TEMPERATURE_SUIT.DESC: Keeps my Duplicants cool in case things heat up.
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.TEMPERATURE_SUIT.EFFEC:
Provides insulation in regions with extreme <style="heat">Temperatures</style>.

Must be powered at a Thermo Suit Dock when depleted.
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.TEMPERATURE_SUIT.RECIP: Provides insulation in regions with extreme <style="heat">Temperatures</style>.

EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.JET_SUIT.NAME: <link="JETSUIT">Jet Suit</link>

EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.JET_SUIT.EFFECT:
Supplies Duplicants with <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link> in toxic and low breathability environments.

Supplies Duplicants with <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link> in toxic and low breathability environments.

A worn out <link="JETSUIT">Jet Suit</link>.

Suits can be repaired at an <link="SUITFABRICATOR">Exosuit Forge</link>.

Supplies Duplicants with <link="OXYGEN">Oxygen</link> and protection in areas with <link="RADIATION">Radiation</link>.

A juicy lime-scented bunch of balloons.
A juicy satsuma-scented bunch of balloons.
A juicy strawberry-scented bunch of balloons.
A juicy watermelon-scented bunch of balloons.
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.SLEEPCLINICPAJAMAS.DES: A soft, fleecy ticket to dreamland.
EQUIPMENT.EQUIPMENT.PREFABS.SLEEPCLINICPAJAMAS.EFF:
Helps Duplicants fall asleep by reducing <link="HEALTH">Stamina</link>.

Enables the wearer to dream and produce Dream Journals.

GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.CHAIN_EVENT_TOOLTIP: This event is a chain event
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.EVENT_TYPES.PARTY.NAME: Party
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.EVENT_TYPES.PARTY.DESCRI:
THIS EVENT IS NOT WORKING
{host} is throwing a birthday party for {dupe}. Make sure there is an available Recreation Room for the party.

Social events are good for Duplicant morale. Rejecting this party will hurt {host} and {dupe}'s fragile ego.
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.EVENT_TYPES.PARTY.CANCEL: The party was canceled because no Recreation Room was available.
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.EVENT_TYPES.PARTY.ACCEPT: A cake must be built for this event to take place.
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.EVENT_TYPES.ECLIPSE.NAME: Eclipse
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.EVENT_TYPES.ECLIPSE.DESC: A celestial object has obscured the sunlight
A solar flare is headed this way
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.EVENT_TYPES.CREATURE_SPA: There was a massive influx of destructive critters
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.EVENT_TYPES.SATELLITE_CR:
Mysterious space junk has crashed into the surface.

It may contain useful resources or information, but it may also be dangerous. Approach with caution.
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.EVENT_TYPES.FOOD_FIGHT.D:
Duplicants will throw food at each other for recreation

It may be wasteful, but everyone who participates will benefit from a major stress reduction.
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.EVENT_TYPES.FOOD_FIGHT.U: There is a food fight happening now
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.EVENT_TYPES.PLANT_BLIGHT:
Our {plant} crops have been afflicted by a fungal sickness!

I must get the Duplicants to uproot and compost the sick plants to save our farms.
All the blighted {plant} plants have been dealt with, halting the infection.
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.EVENT_TYPES.CRYOFRIEND.D:
{dupe} has made an amazing discovery! A barely working <link="CRYOTANK">Cryotank 3000</link> has been uncovered containing a {friend} inside in a frozen state.

{dupe} was successful in thawing {friend} and this encounter has filled both Duplicants with a sense of hope, something they will desperately need to keep their <link="MORALE">Morale</link> up when facing the dangers ahead.
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.EVENT_TYPES.WARPWORLDREV:
I've discovered a functioning teleportation device with a pre-programmed destination.

It appears to go to another Planetoid, and I'm fairly certain there's a return device on the other end.

I could send a Duplicant through safely if I desired.
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.EVENT_TYPES.ARTIFACT_REV:
An artifact from a past civilization was analyzed.

{desc}
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSDREAM1.NAME: Good Dream
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSDREAM1.DESCRI:
I've observed many improvements to {dupe}'s demeanor today. Analysis indicates unusually high amounts of dopamine in their system. There's a good chance this is due to an exceptionally good dream and analysis indicates that current sleeping conditions may have contributed to this occurrence.

Further improvements to sleeping conditions may have additional positive effects to the <link="MORALE">Morale</link> of {dupe} and other Duplicants.
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSDREAM1.CHAIN_: Improving the living conditions of {dupe} will lead to more good dreams.
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSDREAM2.NAME: Really Good Dream
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSDREAM2.DESCRI:
{dupe} had another really good dream and the resulting release of dopamine has made this Duplicant energetic and full of possibilities! This is an encouraging byproduct of improving the living conditions of the colony.

Based on these observations, building a better sleeping area for my Duplicants will have a similar effect on their <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSDREAM3.NAME: Great Dream
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSDREAM3.DESCRI:
I have detected a distinct spring in {dupe}'s step today. There is a good chance that this Duplicant had another great dream last night. Such incidents are further indications that working on the care and comfort of the colony is not a waste of time.

I do wonder though: What do Duplicants dream of?
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSDREAM4.NAME: Amazing Dream
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSDREAM4.DESCRI:
{dupe}'s dream last night must have been simply amazing! Their dopamine levels are at an all time high. Based on these results, it can be safely assumed that improving the living conditions of my Duplicants will reduce <link="STRESS">Stress</link> and have similar positive effects on their well-being.

Observations such as this are an integral and enjoyable part of science. When I see my Duplicants happy, I can't help but share in some of their joy.
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSTOILET1.NAME: Small Comforts
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSTOILET1.DESCR:
{dupe} recently visited an Outhouse and appears to have appreciated the small comforts based on the marked increase to their <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

High <link="MORALE">Morale</link> has been linked to a better work ethic and greater enthusiasm for complex jobs, which are essential in building a successful new colony.
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSTOILET2.NAME: Greater Comforts
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSTOILET2.DESCR:
{dupe} used a Lavatory and analysis shows a decided improvement to this Duplicant's <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

As my colony grows and expands, it's important not to ignore the benefits of giving my Duplicants a pleasant place to relieve themselves.
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSTOILET3.NAME: Small Luxury
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSTOILET3.DESCR:
{dupe} visited a Latrine and experienced luxury unlike they anything this Duplicant had previously experienced as analysis has revealed yet another boost to their <link="MORALE">Morale</link>.

It is unclear whether this development is a result of increased hygiene or whether there is something else inherently about working plumbing which would improve <link="MORALE">Morale</link> in this way. Further analysis is needed.
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSTOILET4.NAME: Greater Luxury
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSTOILET4.DESCR:
{dupe} visited a Washroom and the experience has left this Duplicant with significantly improved <link="MORALE">Morale</link>. Analysis indicates this improvement should continue for many cycles.

The relationship of my Duplicants and their surroundings is an interesting aspect of colony life. I should continue to watch future developments in this department closely.
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSRESEARCH.NAME: Inspired Learner
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSRESEARCH.DESC:
Analysis indicates that the appearance of a <style="KKeyword">Research Station</style> has inspired {dupe} and heightened their brain activity on a cellular level.

Brain stimulation is important if my Duplicants are going to adapt and innovate in their increasingly harsh environment.
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSDIGGING1.NAME: Hot Diggity!
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSDIGGING1.DESC:
Some interesting data has revealed that {dupe} has had a marked increase in physical abilities, an increase that cannot entirely be attributed to the usual improvements that occur after regular physical activity.

Based on previous observations this Duplicant's positive associations with digging appear to account for this additional physical boost.

This would mean the personal preferences of my Duplicants are directly correlated to how hard they work. How interesting...
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSSTORAGE.NAME: Something in Store
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSSTORAGE.DESCR:
Data indicates that {dupe}'s activity in storing something in a Storage Bin has led to an increase in this Duplicant's physical strength as well as an overall improvement to their general demeanor.

There have been many studies connecting organization with an increase in well-being. It is possible this explains {dupe}'s <link="MORALE">Morale</link> improvements.
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSBUILDER.NAME: Accomplished Builder
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSBUILDER.DESCR:
{dupe} has been hard at work building many structures crucial to the future of the colony. It seems this activity has improved this Duplicant's budding construction and mechanical skills beyond what my models predicted.

Whether this increase in ability is due to them learning new skills or simply gaining self-confidence I cannot say, but this unexpected development is a welcome surprise development.
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSOXYGEN.NAME: Fresh Air
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSOXYGEN.DESCRI:
{dupe} is experiencing a sudden unexpected improvement to their physical prowess which appears to be a result of exposure to elevated levels of oxygen from passing by an Oxygen Diffuser.

Observations such as this are important in documenting just how beneficial having access to oxygen is to my colony.
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSALGAE.NAME: Fresh Algae Smell
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSALGAE.DESCRIP:
{dupe}'s recent proximity to an Algae Terrarium has left them feeling refreshed and exuberant and is correlated to an increase in their physical attributes. It is unclear whether these physical improvements came from the excess of oxygen or the invigorating smell of algae.

It's curious that I find myself nostalgic for the smell of algae growing in a lab. But how could this be...?
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSGENERATOR.DES:
{dupe} ran in a Manual Generator and the physical activity appears to have given this Duplicant increased strength and sense of well-being.

While not the primary reason for building Manual Generators, I am very pleased to see my Duplicants reaping the <link="STRESS">Stress</link> relieving benefits to physical activity.
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSDOOR.NAME: Open and Shut
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSDOOR.DESCRIPT:
The act of closing a door has apparently lead to a decrease in the <link="STRESS">Stress</link> levels of {dupe}, as well as decreased the exposure of this Duplicant to harmful <link="GERMS">Germs</link>.

While it may be more efficient to group all my Duplicants together in common sleeping quarters, it's important to remember the mental benefits to privacy and space to express their individuality.
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSHITTHEBOOKS.D:
{dupe}'s recent Research errand has resulted in a significant increase to this Duplicant's brain activity. The discovery of newly found knowledge has given {dupe} an invigorating jolt of excitement.

I am all too familiar with this feeling.
{dupe}'s recent time in a well-lit area has greatly improved this Duplicant's ability to work with, and on, machinery.

This supports the prevailing theory that a well-lit workspace has many benefits beyond just improving my Duplicant's ability to see.
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSTALKER.NAME: Big Small Talker
GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.GAMEPLAY_EVENTS.BONUS.BONUSTALKER.DESCRI:
{dupe}'s recent conversation with another Duplicant shows a correlation to improved serotonin and <link="MORALE">Morale</link> levels in this Duplicant. It is very possible that small talk with a co-worker, however short and seemingly insignificant, will make my Duplicant's feel connected to the colony as a whole.

As the colony gets bigger and more sophisticated, I must ensure that the opportunity for such connections continue, for the good of my Duplicants' mental well being.
